Nowu imedu meartorure Jesus bataruji, uture taci je. 5 Utugarege eridure togi awaraji, egore ji Akonaregedu pemegagodure. 5 Kodi icare unoragodure ei inobadu kejeba pemegagodure. Egore ji Jawuji, meri roi goroci je dukeje biri uru ure tugera ra piji. 5 Icare nowu uo ure boe pa Jesus akore Akonaregedu pemegagodure marigudu oino pudui du kejeie tonaregedu pemegagodure kuri je duji. Du kodi icare meartorure Pao ji, nowu uwobe eiamedu boe emeartorure jamedu. 5 Jesus ure awu turo kurirewu towuje dure pobedu rema, tui tugirimi Judéia piji Galiléia kaedu rekodaji. 

Jesus ure ia pogora birewu imedu pemegago. 1Du keje icare judeudogere tuiagu ia peta towuje, du kodi icare Jesus ruture Jerusalém kae. 2Nono Jerusalém keje, ia pobo aia mugu puredure tu Ovelhadoge ewaiporoji, hebreudoge ewadaru tabo iere Betesda cedu, uwaiporodogere ikera awubodure. 3Nowu baiporodoge ekuda, makarewu kogodureuge emugure: joku bokwareuge, pogora pegareuge, pogora bireuge, tubaga tabo pobo amagadodumode du bogai. 4Paga karega, ia kodiboe keje tu tu je Pao o tupa ure turawuje nowu pobo aia kae dukejere pobore tamagadudo. Cewu ure tuiodo ca boetoji nowu pobo aiato, pobo amagadu rekodajiwu, pemegagodure kuri, ia tugogodae boe piji. 5Ia kogodurewu imedu mugure nono, jorure ji nono ikera pudogidure, iwure pudogidure ikera awubodure pobe ma awu metuia bokware taci je du mugure nono. (8 anos). 6Icare Jesus tuiordui padui nono, tuiorduwai mariguduie padure nonodu jitu keje, unorare ji: - Akaidure apemegagoduwo kuri je? 7Nowu kogodurewu akore ji Ikimejera, ia ure iwu pobo aiato, pobo amagadu keje, boe bokwa, du kodire ikodu kimoi mai to dukeje, iare marigudu ikoda piji. 8Icare Jesus akore ji Aragojedo, akeragu apaji, toro tabo. 9Nowu inodu tonaji kuri je, nowu imedu pemegagodure, ure tugeragu tubaji, uture tabo. Aro kode, nowu meri sabadore jiwu meri. 1 Judeudoge rema emagore nowu imedu pemegagodureuji, egore Amodukare nowu apa rekodudo awu meriji. 1 Akore ei Cewu ure ipemegagowu akore ii akeragu apaji, amerudo. 1 Egore ji Kakoduwu ia imeduba akoino ai akeragu apaji, amerudo ino? 1 Mare cewu pemegagodurewu imedu jorduwakare iogudubaba, mare paga karega, Jesus ure tadawuje nowu boe makareuge eedui nonodu piji kodi. 1 Inodu rekodaji raka dugu je, Jesus jordure ji Pao uwai tada, akore ji Icare apemegagodure. Aro pega kaba pugeje, ia boe pegarewu remawu ukawo ai pugeje du bogai. 1 Du keje icare nowu imedu readodure Jesus koiaie ure tubemegago duji. 1 Nowu inodu koia judeudoge etonare Jesus ji, paga karega, ure awu turo kurirewu towuje sabadore jiwu meri jitu koia. 1 Mare Jesus akore ei Ioga maragodure jii oino rugadu; imi jamedu, imaragodu nure jamedu. 1 Nowu inodu koia judeudoge etagemo raka remawure tuwo bito, paga karega, ukare Sábado pegado tu rugadu, mare akore tuoie Pao rema; ica, nowu inodu tabo unure tudo nono Pao reore dukoia. 
Pao Onaregedu ro raka. 1 Jesus akore pugeje Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai onaregedureboe tui mito tu jedu roiwakare iaboeji iaboeji. Romode tuiordure tuo rore jiboeji tu je. Tuo rore jiboe jamedu boeji, onaregedu romode ino jamedu. 2 Mare paga karega, Uo meardu kurire Tonaregeduji, ure jordudo turore jiboe jamedu boeji; umode jordudo ia turo kurirewu remawuji kimo, duma taebogodu kuriwo. 2 Mare paga karega, Uo magai bireuge ewodudo, ure jereboe maku etai, du reorere Onaregedu umode jereboe maku taidure jiwuge etai jamedu. 2 Nowu inodu reorere, Uo umodukare tugogado iaboe ji iaboe ji, mare ure boe ji tugogadodu jamedu boe mugudo Tonaregedu apo. 2 Du tabowo boe emeartorumode Onaregeduji tumeartoru magai Uo jitu reore. Cewu meartorukare Onaregedu jiwu, Uo koiare ure rojaidu, kode meartorukare Uoji jamedu. 2 Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai meardure iwadaru jiwu, meartorure ure irojaiwu jiwu, boe ewi bokwarewu ure apo, utumodukare boe pegareuto, mare jepadure tuwi piji tuierewo kae. 2 Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai icare boe aregodumode pudae, puredugodu nure, icai bireuge emeardumode Pao mako jitu kae. Meardureuge eemode. 2 Mare paga karega, nono Uo o magai jereboece tu taobiji, ure maku tonaregedu ai owo jereboece taobiji jamedu. 2 Ure ro raka maku tonaregedu ai uwo tugogado boe ji, mare paga karega, Imedu Onareedu rema kodi. 2 Taro kaba ta... Je awu inagoino jiboeji. Boe aregodumode dukeje meture tuiao tadawuge eiamedu boe emeardumode Imedu Onaregedu makoji, emode tuiebu mako padui boe kajeje du kae. 2 Ro pemegareuge eewodumode tuiwo pemegarewu kae. Ro pegareuge eewodumode mare tuiwo pega remawurewu kae. 3 Imi itaobiji ikare iaboe iaboe to. Imeardae tugudure imeardure jiboe reore. Itugure jiboe boe jokodu nure ema. Mare paga karega, iemarukare irowo nono itaidu reore, mare cewu ure irojaiwu aidu reore. 3 Imagomode imi rugaduie iro oino ma, imagoi oinodu umodukare turugadu. 3 Iare tagoi imi rugaduie iro oino, iorduware cewu akoino boe jokodu rugaduie duji. 3 Tare iaboe erojai João ae, makore boe jokoduji boe ewiegai. 3 Iomodukare iaboe iaboe ewugeje. Imagore oino, mare taginorudoduwo du bogaire inagoino. 3 Jorugu ja ururirewu urugurewu nure Joãoce. Tagire tagaidure taegarewo biegatu je nowu urugu tabo. 3 Mare imirema ia iore kejewure du kodure João kori. Paga karega, Iogare iroiagudu jire iro oino, dutabore boere boe pa Iogai irojai duji. 3 Ioga, koiare ure irojaiwu, bataru jore iwugeje jamedu. Tagire tameardu kigodukare makoji, taerdu kigodukare jeji. 3 Bataru metukare tawabo tada, tameartorukare cewu ure rojaiwu jitu kodi. 3 Tare taeku tugu bapera atugoto, tadugu tado taerdumode boe ewi boekwarewu jitu bogai. Kode ica, nowu bapera mitodure makore ii. 4 Mare tagi tagaidukare taduwo itae, taewo du bogai. 4 Ipaga kare imewo inojorodo du bogai. 4 Imire iorduware tai. Pao meardu kuriae metukare tadoda. 4 Itaregodure Ioga ie tabo, mare tagare tageragu ii. Mare ia aregodumode cie tabo ma, tamode tageragu ji. 4 Inobadu taboba tameartorumode? Tagi taemarure pui puwo tugurido du bogai, mare taemarukare tawo Pao Aroe Eimejera mitotu jewu akaru kurido du bogai. 4 Tadugu kaba imago pegamode tai Ioga biegai duji. Okirure taiboere Moisés rema, duwu kejere tare tabagaredu bu. 4 Mare tameartorumode Moisesji ma, boe jokodu jire tameartorumode ii jamedu, ure bapera atugodo iiboe jitu kodi. 4 Mare tameartorukare o bapera atugoji ma, kode, inoba taboba tameartorumode iwadaruji? 

Jesus ure boe makareuge enogwagedo. 1Du keje icare Jesus ure pagado Galiléia kejewu kuruga bakowu kae (Tiberades kejewu kuruga). 2Boe makareuge ekodure rekodaji, eerdure ro kurireui kogodureuge eidu jitu koia. 3Icare Jesus ruture ia torekodu ao kae; nono ure tumugudo ture jorduwadowuge ebo. 4Boe puredugodure judeudoge eno peta iei Páscoa cedu kae. 5Jesus ure tuie aogado nowu kodure pudaewu boe makareuge ei, akore Filipe ji Kaiba pamode akirodo amireuji awuge eiamedu boe ewo kowuje? 6Akore oinono tui turokagado ji dutabo, mare jorduware inoba turomode duji. 7Icare Filipe akore ji Diiero umode 2 0 ma, umodukare turugadu eiamedu boe ekewo ia koboroguce. 8Icare ia nowu ure jorduwadowuge, iere André cedu, Simão Pedro uwie, akore ji 9Ia negedurogu rakojere woe, du o amireure ikera awubodure tu je, kare kugurere pobe tu je, mare inoba nowu inodu rogu umode awu boe emaga inodu ai? 1 Icare Jesus akore Edo tumugudo. Boekarema, boebutu kuricigore nono du imere cinco mil cedu ere tumugudo nono. 1 Icare Jesus ure tugeragu nowu amirewu roguji, makore baruto keje, dukejere ure pedo nowu mugure nonowu boe etai. Du reorere rore cewu kare kugurei pobe tu jeduji, ure maku nowu boe etai etaidu reore. 1 Icare ekuredure. Du kejere icare akore nowu ture jorduwadowugei, akore Nowu kobo jetu onarewu to pui, tawo jetu otorogado ma, ia okwa kawo. 1 Ere to pui. Ica, cewu iro amirewu rogui ikera awubodure tu jedu kobo jetu kimoi tuiagejedu, eiamedu boe enogwage akedu rekodaji, ere kododoge ikera awubodure pobe taci ikare awubowutodu enogorobadudo tabo. 1 Tuiordui nowu Jesus ro kurirewu jitu keje, nowu boe egore Awure cewu aregodumode awu moto kaewu profeta remawu rema. 1 Icare Jesus tui boe pawuje ei tuiagu tugeragu pudui, tuwo boe eimejerado pudumi, dukeje, ure tudawuje epiji pugeje tuginoigodu ia torekodu ao kae. 
Jesus merui pobo ao jitu. 1 Meri rekodure dutabore nowu ure jorduwadowuge ere turawuje kuruga kurirewu jipa kae. 1 Tui taredo ia ika kuireuto dukeje, ere pagado nowu kuruga kurirewu kajeje nowu Cafarnaum bakurirewu kae. Icare boecodure Jesus aregodukai etae dukeje. 1 Du tonajire icare pobo maerewu amagadure, ia bakuru rakarewu buture dukoia. 1 Icare ere turaiga jodo keje jii je, dukejere icare ere boe pa Jesus ui tuburedo nowu ika kurirewu jituji, tumerui pobo aoji dutabo. Du kejere icare epagudugodure. 2 Mare Jesus akore ei Imire iro oino. Tabagudu kaba. 2 Etaidure tuwo tugeragu ji nowu ika kurireuto, mare ika aregodure kuri taregodumodewo kae. 
Boe eemarui Jesus bogaidu. 2 Nowu meri rekodajiwu meriji, jeture bakowu kejewu boe makareuge ere boe pa Jesus mitotu jedu ukai taredo nowu ika kurireuto nowu ture jorduwadowuge ebo, mare awuge etuie tuginoiduji. 2 Icare ia ika kurireuge etaregodure Tiberade bakurirewu piji, puredu tu cewu enogwagere amireuji, cewu Pagimejerare tuwadaru pemegarewu bu kejedu kae. 2 Du karega icare, nowu boe makareuge tui boe pa Jesus mare ure jorduwadowuge edukai nonodu ji, dukoiare icare ere taredo nowu ika kurireuge eto, kodure tai Cafarnaum kae tuiemaru tabo bogai. 
Ure boe eedowu boe eke Jesus rema. 2 Eerdure ji nowu bakowu keje, icare egore ji Cegimejera, inoba boere du kejeba akaregodure woe? 2 Jesus akore ei Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai: taemarure iwogai mare taerdure cewu iro kurirewu jitu koia, tare amirewu kowuje, tagoredure tabo dukoia. 2 Tamaragodudo, mare boe eke akedure kuri jewu koia karega, mare ure boe eedo jii boe ewi bokwarewu kaewu boe eke koia, du Imedu Onaregedu umode maku tagai. Paga karega, Uore to kruca bu keje kodi. 2 Icare enoragodure ji: - Inoba ceromode cerowo nono Pao aidu reore. 2 Jesus akore ei Pao aidure jiboe reo tameartoruwo cewu ure rojaiwuji. 3 Icare enoragodure ji: - Kakoduwu aro kurireumodedu jiba ceerdumode du koiawo cemeartorumode ai? Kaboba amode towuje? 3 Ica, ceomagere maná kowuje toro boe makodu tada, nono bapera atugo reore aregodure baru pijiwu amirewu ure maku etai enogwagewo ji. 3 Icare Jesus akore ei.
Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai Moisés ukare baru pijiwu amirewu maku tagai, mare Ioga koiare ure baru pijiwu boe jokoduwu remawu amirewu maku tagai. 3 Paga karega, Pao o amirewu, cewu ure turawuje baru pijiwu amirewu rema, koiare ure awu moto keje boe eedo. 3 Icare egore ji Cegimejera, nowu amirewu maku jii je cenai. 3 Jesus akore ei Imire ure boe eedowu amireure imi. Cewu utumode itaewu uke boimodukare pudui jii pugeje, cewu meartorure iiwu, pobo boimodukare ji jii je pugeje. 3 Mare imagomode tai: taerdure ii mare tameartorukare ii. 3 Cewu Iogare maku inai boe jamedu boe utumode itae, cewu utumode itaewu imodukare barigu. 3 Paga karega, ire irawuje baru piji, mare irowo nono itaidu reore karega, mare irowo nono ure irojaiwu aidu reore. 3 Mare cewu ure irojaiwu aidure jiboe reo: ikaiagu cewu ture maku inaiboe ia rogu okwadodudo, mare iiagu jewodudo boigoduwu meriji. 4 U! Oinore Ioga aidure. Cewu jordure Onaregeduji, meartorure jiwuge eiamedu boe, boe ewi bokwareuwo etai; imode eewodudo boigoduwu meriji. 4 Du kodi icare judeudoge ewadaru pega kuricigore ji, awu akoinodu koia: - Imire amirewu aregodui baru piji dure imi. 4 Egore Iarema cewu Jesus kanao? Kode, kodiba icare akore. Ire irawuje baru piji oino? 4 Jesus akore Tawadaru pega kaba tadoda. 4 Iaboe iaboe etumodukare itae, ure irojaiwu Ioga ukai utudo itae dukeje. Duwuge imode eewodudo boigoduwu meriji. 4 Profetadogere inodu bu bapera keje eiamedu boe jorduwadodumode Pao Aroe Eimejera koia. Du kodire cewu meardure Pao bataru jiwuge eiamedu boe, jorduwadodure Pao koiawuge eiamedu boe, etumode itae. 4 Mare boe eerdukarega ure Pao ji kodi karega, mare cewu aregodure Pao pijiwu jordure tu Pao ji. 4 Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai: meartorure iiwuge eiamedu boe, ewi bokwarewu makodure etai. 4 Boe eedoduwowu amirewu imireo. 4 Taomage enogwagere manaji boe makodu tada, mare ewire. 5 Ure turawuje baru pijiwu amirewu awureo, umode kowujewuge eiamedu boe ewi kawo. 5 Aregodure baru pijiwu amirewu jerewu imireo. Umode awu amirewu kowujewuge eemaemode jii je. Imode makuwu amirewu ikodu rema, awu moto kejewuge einorudoduwo. 5 Awu bataru keje, judeudoge enorare jice woje, jice woje pui: - Inoba awu imedu romode tuwo pagogwagedo tugoduji? 5 Kodi icare Jesus akore ei Boe jokodu jire inagomde oino tai tamodukare Imedu Onaregedu kodu kowuje, tagudumodukare kuce ma, taemodukare tadoda. 5 Cewu ure ikodu kowujewu, kudure iku cewuge eiamedu boe jemaere jii jeboe jetu nure ebo. Imode eewodudo boigoduwu meriji. 5 Paga karega, boe eke jokoduwure ikodu rema, boe ekudure ceboe jokodu remawurewu iku rema. 5 Cewu okwagere ikodu jiwuge, kudure iku cewuge eiamedu boe, emedure itada, imedure etada jamedu. 5 Ure irojaiwu Ioga jemagadu reorere, iere koia jamedu, du reorere ure ikowujewu jemode igoia jamedu. 5 Awure ure turawuje baru pijiwu amirewu rema. Cewu taomagere kowujewu maná inodu karega, ere kowuje mare ewire, du inodu karega. Umode awu amirewu kowujewu jemode jii je. 5 Awu inodu jire Jesus ure boe eerduwado sinagoga tada, Cafarnaum bakurirewu keje. 6 Nowu ure jorduwadowuge ia makareuge, tumeardui ji tu keje, egore Nowu inodu raka remawu nure. Ioguduba aidumode nowu inoduji? 6 Jesus jorduware nowu ture jorduwadowuge ekorigodui nowu inodu koia duji, icare unoragodure ei: - Nowu inodu jetu pegare tai. 6 Kode, inoba umode taerdumode Imedu Onaregedu rutui turagojere kejewu turagoja kae dukeje? 6 Aroe koiare ure boe eedo, boe karega boe ekodu rema. Imagore tai jiwu iwadaru emare aroe rema, boe eerewu rema. 6 Mare ia tagi tameartorukare. Mare paga karega, kuri boe paruto Jesus jorduware kakoduwuba emeartoru bokware duji, cewu umode tumaguwuji jamedu. 6 Makore kimo pugeje, akore Du kodire inagore iaboe iaboe etumodukae itae Ioga aiduka dukeje. 6 Kuri je nowu kodiwu piji makarewu ia ure jorduwadowuge ere tuiaedo ji, du emerukare apo pugeje. 6 Du kodi icare Jesus unoragodure nuwu ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwureko towugei, akore ei Tagi jamedu tagaidure tawo taiaedo ii jamedu? 6 Icare Simão Pedro akore ji Cegimejera, kode ioguduba ae cedumode? Boe ewi bokwareure awadaru rema. 6 Cegi cemeartorure, ceerduware akie Pao Aroe Eimejera o Imedu Pemegareuie akiduji. 7 Jesus akore pugeje Ikare tado ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwureko todu ire tadawuje tamedage epiji? Mare Aroe pegareure ia tagi kodi karega. 7 Judas Iscariote jire akoino, cewu Simão Iscariote onaregedu, emare umode maku kodi. Ica, nowu ei ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwureko todu ia nure ema kodi karega. 

Jesus mare uwiemage. 1Nowu inodu rekodaji, Jesus kodure jice woje, jice woje Galiléia kao, aidukare tumeruwo Judéia keje, judeudoge ere tuiagu bito dukoia. 2Judeudoge eno peta puredugodu nure du iere Tabernáculos (boe ewadaru ure oino aroia baidoge jiwu peta). 3Icare Jesus uwiemage eegore ji: - Atudo awu piji Judéia kae, nowu are jorduwadowuge eerduwo aro boeji. 4Paga karega, cewu aidure boe eerduwawo puduiwu rokare ia turo jiboe podu tu je. Kode arore oino du kodi, akowadudo awu moto kejewuge eegai. 5Mare uwiemage emeartorukare ji jamedu. 6Icare Jesus akore ei Boe aregodukare pudae ii roga. Mare tagairema boere turugadu tu tu tagai boe jameduji. 7Awu moto kodu kagirimodukare tai, mare iire kodu kagirire, imire ireadodure ro pegareuji kodi. 8Toro, taru toro peta kae, mare imirema, ikodumodukare, boe aregodukare pudae ii roga kodi. 9Tagoi oino dukeje, rakojere Galiléia keje. 
Jesus rutui Aroiabaidoge eiwu peta kaedu. 1 Mare uwiemage erudui toro dukeje, ruture jamedu nowu peta kae, mare tui boe eerdudo pudui dutabo karega, mare podu tabo. 1 Judeudoge eemarure bogai nowu peta keje; enorare bogai, egore Kaiba rakojere? 1 Nowu boe makareuge etada boe emago nure tu ji rugadu. Iage egore Imedu pemegarewu reno. Du kejewuge egore Boro, ukare ino, ure boe eekuri pagado. 1 Mare du inodu tabo, boe emago awadukare ji, tubagudu koia judeudogece. 1 Nowu peta oia bukejere icare Jesus ruture Pao uwaito tui boe eerduwado dutabo. 1 Judeudoge erore ta... Je, egore Awu imedu jorduwadodukare. Kode, kaiba awu jorduware bapera atugo jitu aregodure? 1 Icare Jesus akore ei Awu iorduware oino jiboe, inoe karega, mare ure irojaiwu oe. 1 Iaboe etaidumode turowo nono Pao aidu reore ma, eerduwamode imagore jiboe aregoduie Pao piji duji, iarema ipijie aregodure duji. 1 Makore taobijiwu jemaru nure tuguriwo boe eegai du bogai, mare cewu jemarure tuwo ure rojaiwu kurido du bogaiwu, ure turugadu boe emeartoruwo ji, boe ekuri pagadodurewu ukare apo. 1 Kode, Moisés koia karega ure boe eroiagudu maku tagai? Du inodu tabo ia tagi ia tagi tagodukare ui boe eroiaguduji. 2 Kodiba tagaidre tawo iwido? Nowu boe egore ji Ia Aroe pegarewu mugure akabo! Ioguduba aidure tuwo awido? 2 Jesus akore ei pugeje Ia irore jiboere mito tu je. Ica, taiamedu boe jordu pegare inoduji. 2 Moisés ure kruca maku tagai (mare Moisés oe karega, mare uomage kurireuge enoe), tare kruca bu boe ewugeje jii sabadore jiwu meriji jamedu. 2 Aró, kode, Moisésre boe eroiagudu kadodu kawore kruca padumode ia imedu keje sabadore jiwu meriji ma, kode, kodiba tagorigodure ii ire ia imedu uredu jamedu boe pemegago sabadore jiwu meriji dukoia? 2 Tadugu kaba ure tudo boe eegaiboe rekodaji, mare tadugudo boe jetororewu rekodaji tu rugadu. 
Judeudoge emeardaei Jesus jitu. 2 Jerusalém kejewuge ia boe egore Awu karega cewu eemarure bogai tuwo bito? 2 Kode, emare akore tumago tabo boe etoiabiji oinono, mare boe emagokare ji. Kode, boe eimejerage kana ere boe pa Cristoie ure ema duji? Mare ceerduware kaiba awu imedu buture duji. 2 Mare Cristo aregodumode dukeje, iaboe iaboe eerduwamodukare kaiba aregodure duji. 2 Jesus, tui boe eerduwado Pao uwai tada dutabo, akore Taerduware ii kaiba itaregodure duji. Ipi ji karega itaregodure. Mare cewu ure irojaiwure, boe jokoduwu jamedu boere apo, mare taerduwakare ji. 2 Imirema iorduware ji, itaregodure piji kodi, emare ure irojai jamedu kodi. 3 Icare eemarure tuwo tugeragu ji, mare iaboe iaboe ekare tugera puredudo ji, boe aregodukare pudae ji roga kodi. 3 Mare nowu inodu jamedu boe tada, makarewu boe emeartorure ji, enorare jice woje, jice woje pui: -Kode, Cristo aregodumode dukeje, ro pemegarewu kurirewu kodumode awu ro kori? 3 Fariseudogere boe pa boe egoi Jesus jiboe jituji, du kodi icare ere mare sacerdotedoge eimejerage ere torigaraidoge etudo bogai ewo tugeragu ji. 3 Jesus akore Iragojemode tagabo biega tu je kimo, dukeje itumode ure irojaiwu ae. 3 Taemarumode iwogai, mare taerdumodukare ii, taroiwamodukare taduwo ikodumodewo kae 3 Icare judeudoge enoragodure pui: - Kaiba kodumode paerdukawo pudui? Iarema utu kana umode cewu rakojere gregodoge etadawu judeudoge etae, tuwo nowu moto tuginoiwu kejewuge eerduwado? 3 Inobadu jiba akore oino pai taemarumode iwogai mare taerdumodukare ii, taroiwamodukare taduwo ikodumodewo kae oino? 
Ure boe eedowu pobojari. 3 Nowu peta jiwu boigoduwu meriji, kodure tumedage ekoriwu meriji, Jesus mako rakare turagojei, akore Ia tagi pobo boimode tai ma, mato itae, taguduwo. 3 Cewu meartorure iiwu, ure nono cewu bapera atugo ako magadu reore pobojari jereuge emode tudawuje piji. 3 Makore awu inoduji, tui inodu jeonado Aroe Pemegarewu jitu tabo, du makudumode meartorumode puduiwuge etai, du jire akoino. Mare Aroe Pemegarewu makudukare roga, Jesus aregodukare tugurimodewo kae roga kodi. 4 Nowu boe makareuge, iage, tumeardui nowu bataru inodu jitu keje, egore Boe jokodu remawu profeta reo. 4 Iage egore Awure Cristo remawure ema. Mare iage egore nowu egoinodu me keje tu oino: - Kode, Galiléia kejewu bai piji kana Cristo aregodumode? 4 Kode, bapera atugo akore oino Davi rekodajiwuge epijire Cristo aregodumode, cewu babuturogu iei Belém cedu piji, Davi o moto piji. Oino karega? 4 Kodire boe ewadaru pegare pui jice woje, jice woje, Jesus koia. 4 Iaboe etaidure tuwo tugeragu ji, mare ekare tugera puredudo ji. 
Judeudoge eimejerage emeartorukare. 4 Torigaraidoge ere tugirimi sacerdotedoge eimejerage, fariseudoge etai tuibagi pugeje, duwuge enoragodure ei, egore Kodiba takare arego? 4 Torigaraidoge egore ei Ia imedu boe makokare awu imedu mako reore. 4 Icare fariseudoge egore ei Kode, boe kana ure tawogado boeto jamedu? 4 Iarema ia boe eimejerage, ia fariseudoge emeartorure ji? 4 Mare awu boe onawuge, eerduwakare boe eroiagudu jitu, boe pegareuge nure emage. 5 Mare ia emage, iei Nicodemo cedu, cewu jemarure bogai boecojiwu, akore ei 5 Ceroiagudu umode ia imedu barigu boe pegareuto tumeardui, tuiordui ro boe jitu otodai? 5 Egore ji Iarema galileu kana ure aki jamedu? Aerduwa pemegado aerduwo ia profeta aregodumodukai Galiléia pijiduji. 5 Du kejere ere tugirimi tu tu tuwai kae. 

Aredu ro pegareudo. 1Jesus kodure Oliveira tadawu torekodu kae. 2Barogwa kododu tabore ure tugirimi Pao uwaito; boe eiamedu boere tudo pui ae. Ure tumugudo tu je, dutabore icare ure eerduwado. 3Icare escribadoge, fariseudoge ere ia boe eerdure ro okeadui aredu reko mto ae. 4Ere rakojedo tu nowu boe makareuge etoiadoda, egore Jesus ji Cegimejera, maigodu boe ere tugeragu awu areduji ro keadu tonaji. 5Moisesre bapera atugodo ceiagu tori to awu rore oinowu areme eiduji. Inoba akagomode awu inoduji? 6Ere tunorado ji tuiaki turoiwawo tuwo tugeragu ji ia bataru kejedu bogai, tagowo, onoie akore. Jesusrema, ure tuie jodo mototo, ure moto atugodo tugerako tabo. 7Enora kimo jitu koiare, ure taogado taci je, akore ei Ia ro pegakarewu ia tagi umode tori to ca boetoji ji. 8Ure tuie jodo gu moto kae pugeje, ure moto atugodo tugerako tabo pugeje. 9Awu bataru keje, tui boe pa pudumiraboduie tuwogware boetodu jitu koia, ere tudawuje, ere tudo mito taci jii boigoduwu ae, tui paru bu codureuge ewugeje dupiji. Du kodire Jesus mugure tuginoigodu, cewu aredu rakojere nono jamedu. 1 Du kejere icare ure taogado taci je. Boekarema, tuiordui cewu aredu ui mito tu jedu jitu keje, unoragodure ji, akore Aredu, kaiba cewu akoino aiwuge ekodure? Iaboe iaboe ekare awarigu boe pegareuto? 1 Akore.
Ikimejera, boe bokwa. 

Kodi icare Jesus akore ji U! Imi jamedu imodukare awarigu boe pegareuto. Toro! Akaba akirimi aro pegareuto pugeje. 
Moto kejewu urugureboe nure Jesusce. 1 Jesus akore ei pugeje Imire moto kejewu urugureboere imi. Cewu kodure itabowu, merumodukare boeco tada, mare jereboe urugumode ji. 1 Nonore icare fariseudoge egore ji Akire amagore aiboeji, nowu akagoi aidu ukare turugadu boe emeartoruwo ji. 1 Jesus akore ei Imire inagomode ii rugadu ma, imagore jiboere turugadu boe emeartoraeji. Paga karega, iorduware kaiba itaregodure duji, kaiba ikodumode duji jamedu. Mare tagi taerduwakare kaiba pijiba itaregodure, kaiba ikodumode duji jamedu. 1 Tare tagogado ure taegaiboeji. Imi ikare ikogado iaboe ji iaboe ji. 1 Imode ikogado boe ji ma, ire ikogado jiboe jetorogodumode jamedu, paga karega, ikare ikinoi tu je du kodi, Ioga mugure itabo jamedu kodi. 1 Ica, taroiagudu akore boe ji pobe tu jedu eioi puwugejedu ure turugadu boe emeartoruwo ji (Deut 1, 1). 1 Imi imagore ii itaobiji rugadu, mare ure irojaiwu Ioga jore iwugeje jamedu. 1 Icare enoragodure ji: - Kaiba Ao rakojere? Jesus akore Taerduwakare ii, taerduwakare Iogaji jamedu. Taerduwamode ii ma, taerduwamode Iogaji jamedu. 2 Makore awu tuwadaruji tui boe eerduwado Pao uwai tada dukeje, puredu tu boere to mearogu tugu towu iraji. Mare iaboe iaboe ekare tugeragu ji, boe aregodukare pudae roga kodi. 2 Jesus akore ei kimo Itumode dukeje, taemarumode iwogai, mare tawimode taro pegarewu tada, paga karega, taroiwamodukare tagoduwo ikodumodewo kae. 2 Icare judeudoge egore Ukana umode tuwido? Akore taroiwamodukare tagoduwo ikodumodewo kae. Kodiba akoino? 2 Icare akore ei Woje comoroiwuge tagireo; cebojewu imireo. Awu moto kejewuge nure tagi, mare imi karega. 2 Inagore tai tawimoduie taro pegarewu tadaduji, mare paga karega, tameartorumodukare imie rugadu ma, tawimode taro pegarewu tada. 2 Du kodi icare enoragodure ji: -Ioguduba akibao? Jesus akore ei.
Cewu inagore tai boe paru toboe nure imi. 2 Imagowo taiboe, iwo ikogado taiboe makaguragare. Mare ure irojaiwu boe rikirewu nure ema; imeardure ji pijiboe imagore ji moto kejewugei. 2 Mare ekare boe pa makoi Tuo jiboeji. 2 Du kodi icare Jesus akore ei Tamode Imedu Onaregedu aogado dukeje, taerduwamode ioguduba imiba; taerduwamode irore jiboe ukae itaobiji, mare imagoi nono Iogare iorduwado jiboe reore duji. 2 Cewu ure irojaiwu ure itabo; ukare ido ikinoi tu je, paga karega, irore nono aidu magai du reore jii je du kodi. 3 Nowu akoi oinono dukeje, makareuge emeartorure ji. 
Jesus mare Abraão. 3 Jesus akore nowu meartorure puduiwu judeudogei Taedumode iwadaru keje ma, ire jorduwadowu boe jokoduwuge rumodedo tagi. 3 Taerduwamode boe rikireuji, boe rikirewu umode taginorudo. 3 Egore ji Abraão ore nure cegi, boe etugarege karega ure cegi jii je, kodiba icare akagore taginorudodumode ino cei? 3 Jesus akore ei Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai ure tumagu turo pegarewu kaiwu ime eiamedu boe, ere turo pegarewu utugarege nure emage. 3 Aró, kode, boe etugare mugumodukare boe etuo uwai keje, mare tu onaregedu mugumode uwai keje jii je. 3 Du kodi icare Onaregedu umode taginorudo ma, boe etugarege emodukare tagi rugadu. 3 Iorduwa pemega nure Abraão oreie tagiduji, mare tagaidure tawo iwido, mare iwadaru remodukare tadoda dukoia. 3 Imire imagore iordure Ioga apo boeji. Tagirema, tarore nono tameardure tao okwabiji boeji. 3 Egore ji Ceore Abraão rema. Jesus akore ei Abraão ore rumode tagi dukeje, taromode nono Abraão rore jiboeji. 4 Imire imagore tai boe jokodure ema boeji imeardui Pao piji duji, macare tagaidure tawo iwido. Abraão rokare ino. 4 Tarore tao roiaji. Egore ji Boe ekera keadu koia kerega ure cedowuje: ceore ia ceoce, dure Pao Aroe Eimejera rema. 4 Jesus akore Taomode Aroe Eimejera ma, tameardu kurimode ii, paga karega, Aroe Eimejera pijire itawujedure, pijire itaregodure. Ipi ji karega itaregodure, mare koiare ure irojai. 4 Kodiba takare iwadaru pawuje? Taroiwakare tamearduwo iwadaru jitu kodi. 4 Taore Aroe pegarewu rema, tagaidure tarowo tao aidure jiboe reore. Boe paru tore boe ewidodu epa rema; rakojekare boe rikirewu tabo, boe rikirewu bokware apo kodi. Tagoi tuwadararodae jitu keje, pudui rugadure akoino, paga karega, batararodu barikare kodi, emare boe ewadararodae uo rema. 4 Mare imi imagore boe rikirewu jitu koia, tameartorukare iwadaruji. 4 Kakoduwu tagiba tamode ikiegi iro pegarewu tabo? 4 Pao ore emawuge emeardure bataruji, tagirema tameardukare ji orekare tagi kodi. 4 Nonore icare judeudoge egore ji Kode cemagokare boe jokoduji akie samaritanore aki, atadaie Aroe pegarewu meture? 4 Jesus akore ei Aroe pegarewu metukare itada, mare ire Ioga kurido. Tagirema, tare iwarigududo. 5 Iemarukare ikuriwo du bogai; mare iare ikurido, du umode tugogado boe ji. 5 Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai iaboe umode iwadaru jetu otorogado ma, bimodukare jii je. 5 Judeudoge egore ji Icare ceerdure Aroe pegarewu metui atoda duji. Abraão bire, profetadoge ewire jamedu. Icare akagore umoduie awadaru jetu otorogadowu bimodukae jii je? 5 Kode, akina akodure paedoga Abraão kori? Ema bire, profetadoge ewire jamedu kaboba ameardaere uwo aki? 5 Jesus akore ei Imode boe kurireudo imi itaobiji ma, boe kurirewu imidu boe karega. Iogare ure ikurido. Cewu tagagore tago Aroe Eimejeraie emawu. 5 Mare taerduwakare ji. Imagomode iorduwakae ji ma, iwadararodumode nono tawadararodu reore. Mare iorduware ji, irore nono bataru reore jamedu. 5 Taedoga Abraão jekarere tumeardui tuiordumode ino meri jituji. Jordure ji, icare jekare kuricigore. 5 Icare judeudoge egore ji Ako joru ukare 50 ce roga, mare icare aerdure Abraão ji? 5 Jesus akore ei Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai Abraão butumodedu otodai, ire marigudu. 5 Nowu akoinodu kejere icare, ere tugeragu toriji tuwo tori to ji. Mare Jesus ure tuwogwado pi tuku je, ure tudawuje nowu Pao uwai piji. 

Jesus ure ia buture tuioku bokwa tabowu pemegago. 1Icare Jesus, tugodui ia tugodu kae dukeje, jordure ia buture tuioku bokwa tabowu imeduji. 2Icare nowu ure jorduwadowuge enoragodure ji: - Cegimejera, ioguduba ro pegare du koiaba awu imedu buture tuioku bokwa tabo? Ema kana, iarema uomage kana? 3Jesus akore ei Awu ro pegarewu koia karega, uomage eigoia karega jamedu, mare Pao uwo turo pemegarewu kurirewu awadudo ji du bogai. 4Meri jetu kimo tabore, ure turugadu iwo ure irojaiwu ro pemegarewu kurireuge eiado. Boeco aregodumode dukeje boe emaragodumodukare pugeje. 5Du kodire, iragojei moto kejedu tonaji, urugure moto jiboe nure imi. 6Tagoinodu tabore, ure todoguru to co mototo, ure moto gurugurudo todoguru tabo, dukejere icare ure nowu moto guruguru rogu reko nowu joku bokwarewu jokuji. 7Du kejere akore ji Toro, akabi boe etaimoda iei Zilo cedu keje (boe ewadaru tabo iere Roiaidodureboe oino). Icare nowu joku bokwarewu uture toro rugadu, icare ure tugirimi taiwo tabo. 8Kodi icare cewu puredure jiwuge, jordure okwamagudui tu tu jedu jiwuge, enorare pui, egore Cewu okwamagudu kigodure tu tu tumugu tabowu karegao? 9Iage egore U! Ema. Iagerema egore Ema karega, mare reorewu. Emarema akore Imi rugadu. 1 Kodi icare enoragodure ji: - Inoba taboba aekure tuiado? 1 Akore ei Cewu iere Jesus cewu imedu ure moto gurugurudo, ure reko iokuji, akore ii toro aia iei Zilo cedu kae, awo kabi. Iture rugadu, ire ikabi, ica, oino itaiwore. 1 Icare enoragodure ji: - Kaiba nowu imedu rakojere? Akore Iorduwa bokwa. 1 Du kodi icare ere cewu joku bokwarewu reko fariseudoge etae. 
Fariseudoge enorai joku bokwarewu jidu. 1 Aró kode, sabadore jiwu meriji Jesus ure moto guruguru towuje, ur nowu imedu jokudo tuiado. 1 Du kodi icare fariseudoge enorare ji pugeje inoba rakuduie aiwore. Akore ei ure moto guruguru maedo ioku joki, dukeje icare ire ikabi, ica, oino itaiwore. 1 Ia fariseudoge egore Pao koia karega ure nowu imedu rojai, mare paga karega, maragodure sabadore jiwu meriji. Iage egore Inobadu kodiba ro pegarewu imedu umode cewu turo kurirewu kuo? Enora korire pui jice woje, jice woje. 1 Enoragodure kimo nowu joku bokwareuji, egore Inoba ameardaere nowu ure aekudo tuiadowuji? Akore ei Ia profeta nure ema. 1 Mare judeudoge emeartorukare nowu imedu joku bokwaie duji, du kaegae icare jokuie duji, icare emago jokodure uomage ewogai. 1 Enoragodure ei: - Tagonaregedu nao? Tagagomode boe jokoduie buture tuioku bokwa tabo? Macare inobadu taboba aiwore oino? 2 Uomage egore Ceerduware awuie cedonaregedu rema duji, butuie tuioku bokwa tabo duji. 2 Mare ceerduwakare inobadu tabore aiwore oino. Tanorado ji nowu inoduji. O joru butu makare du je. Ema rugadure umode kogado tawiegai. 2 Uomage egore oino tubagudu koia judeudogece, mare paga karega, cewu meartorure Cristoie Jesus cedu jiwuge eiamedu boe eire judeudoge egore tumoduie etawuje sinagoga piji tugorigodui ei dutabo. 2 Du kodire uomage egore. O joru butu makare, tanorado ji nowu inoduji, oino. 2 Icare emagore nowu joku bokwarewu bogai kimo pugeje, egore ji Pao kurido. Ceerduware ro pegareuie nowu imeduce duji. 2 Akore ei Iorduwakare ro pegarewu rakuduie, iorduware tu jiboe reo ioku bokware, du karega icare iokure oino. 2 Icare enoragodu pemegare ji pugeje; - Inoba ure turodo ai? Inoba rore tuwo aeku jado? 2 Akore Ire tawie marigudu, mare takare tawiapagado iwadaruji, kodiba tagaidure tamearduwo pugeje? Iarema tagaidukana ure nowu ure jorduwadowuge ia etumedagewo tagi? 2 Nonore icare ere tuwadaru pegarewu rorido joki, egore ji Akire ia ure jorduwadowure aki, cegire Moisesre jorduwadowugere cegi. 2 Ceerduware Pao makoi Moisés jituji, mare awu ceerduwakare kaibawuba ure ema. 3 Icare cewu imedu akore Ie rore ta... Taerduwakai kaibawuba ure ema duji. Mare du inodu tabo ure iokudo tuiado. 3 Jamedu ceerduware Pao biapagakai ro pegareuge eiduji, mare biapagae okwamagudure puduiwugei, rore nono taidu reoreuge eiduji. 3 Iaboe iaboe emeardukare tu iaboe ji ia boture tuioku bokwa tabowu joku jado duji. 3 Pao omodukare awu imeduce ma, romodukare ia turo. 3 Egore ji Awudure aro pegarewu rorii aiogi dutabo, macare are ceerduwado? Du kejere ere barigu tubiji. 3 Jesus jorduware ei barigu duji, icare tuiordui jitu keje, unoragodure ji: - Ameartorure Imedu Onaregeduji? 3 Akore Ioguduba ure ema, ikimejera, imeartoruwo ji? 3 Jesus akore ji Aerdure ji, emare makore oino ai. 3 Akore imeartorure, Ikimejera. Icare ure tubujodo ji, ure boe kurireudo ema. 3 Du kodi icre Jesus akore Itaregodure awu moto kae iwo boe ewu tuwugeje: iwo jordukareuge eerdudo, jordureuge ewo tuioku bokwado. 4 Ia fariseudoge eedure apodu emeardure akoinoduji, egore ji Cegi jamedu kana ceeku bokware? 4 Jesus akore ei Taeku bokwamode ma, taro pegamodukare, macare tameardaere taerduie duji, du kodi icare taro pegarewu uture todobiji. 

Jeture ovelhadoge eiwu pemegarewu. - 1Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai: cewu ukare turemo ovelhadoge ewaiporoji eeda towu, mare ure turemo to boekare turemowo jitu keje, iwogu kigodurewu nure ema, boe ewidodu epa nure ema. 2Mare cewu ure turemo baiporo jiwu, jeture ovelhadoge eiwu nure ema. 3Duwure baiporo epare baiporo jado ai, ovelhadoge emeardumode makoji, makomode etae eie tabo, umode ecedo enogwagemodewo kae. 4Tui ovelhadoge eiamedu boedo tuiebu dukeje, kodumode etododai, nowu ovelhadoge ekodumode rekodaji, eerduware makoji kodi. 5Mare etumodukare ia tuiorduwakare jiboe rekodaji, mare eregodu rumode piji, eerduwakare tuiorduwakare jiwuge emago ji kodi. 6Jesus makore ei awu bakaruji mare ekare boe pa kaba jiba aidure tumagowo nowu tagoino dutabo. 7Icare Jesus makore ei pugeje, akore Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai imire ovelhadoge ewaiporore imi. 8Cewu kodure itododai boetojiwuge eiamedu boere iwogu kigodureugere emage, boe ewidodu epagere emage. 9Imire baiporore imi, iaboe umode turemo ii ma, umode cinorudo: umode turemo, umode tuiebu, jordumode togwagemodewoji. 1 Iwogu kigodureuge etaregodumode ma, cioguwo du bogai, tuwo boe ewidodu bogai, tuwo boe pegadodu bogai tu je. Mare itaregodure ovelhadoge eewo du bogai, jereboe kuriwo ebo du bogai. 1 Imire jeture ovalhadoge eiwu pemegareure imi. Jeture ovelhadoge eiwu pemegarewu ure tumagu ewugeje. 1 Mare maragodure mori bogaiwu, jeture ovelhadogei karega ure emawu, jordumode rie aregoduji ma, umode ovelhadoge epijido, rekodumode, icare nowu rie rugodumode nowu ovelhadogei, umode edo taodo. 1 Paga karega, maragodure tu mori bogai, du kodi icare biapagakare ovelhadogei. 1 Imire jeture ovalhadogeiwu pemegarewu nure imi. Iorduware inagu ovelhadogei, inagu ovelhadoge eerduware ii jamedu. 1 Nono Ioga jorduwa magai ii du reorere, iorduware Iogaji jamedu. Imode imagu inagu ovelhadoge ewugeje. 1 Ia inagu ovalhadoge ere kimo jamedu, duwugere eedukare awu ovelhadoge eeda tada. Ieturumode ei jamedu, emeardumode imago ji, dukejere icere emode mitogodo tu je, jeture eiwu umode mitotu jamedu. 1 Ioga meardu kurire ii, paga karega, imode imagu, mare iewoduwo pugeje, kodi. 1 Iaboe iaboe umodukare itawuje, mare imode imagu itaobiji. Iroiware iwo imagu, iroiware iwo ikeragu ii pugeje. Awu iroiagudu rema, dure Iogare maku inai. 1 Nowu inodu bataru koia judeudoge ewadaru okorirewu padure boe kajeje pugeje. 2 Ia emage makareuge egore Aroe pegarewu metu nure tada, mako nure taora bai bai tabo. Kodiba tawiapagare bataruji? 2 Iage egore Awu bataru ukare nono Aroe pegarewu meture tadawuge ewadarure. Kode Aroe pegarewu umodukana ia joku bokwarewu joku jado? 
Pao Aroe Eimejera Onaregedu Jesus rema. 2 Jerusalém kejewuge enure petado ture makuboeji, biaku buture du kodiwu keje. 2 Jesus boadu nure Pao uwai kejewu Salomão o bororo oiagi. 2 Icare judeudoge ere taiado apo, enoragodure ji: - Jii inobadu kejeba amode cebagado? Cristo nure aki rugadu dukeje, cewiedu awadudo taci je. 2 Jesus akore ei Imagore tai, mare tameartorukare. Ioga ie tabowu iro jamedu boe makore itagaruji. 2 Mare tameartorukare, paga karega, inagu ovelhadoge ia emage karega ure tagi kodi. 2 Inagu ovelhadoge emeardure imago ji, iorduware ei, ekodure itabo. 2 Imode jere jii jeboe maku etai, etagedumodukare tu rugadu, iaboe iaboe eiwogumodukare ei ikera piji. 2 Ioga, koiare ure emagu inaiwu, ro rakare boe eiamedu boe ekori, iaboe iaboe emodukare etaru Ioga iera piji. 3 Imi, Ioga, cere mito tu je. 3 Icare judeudoge ere tugeragu toriji tuwo tori to ji pugeje. 3 Icare Jesus akore ei Ire taerdudo Ioga ie tabowu iro pemegarewu makareuji. Kode kakoduwu ia koiaba tare taiagu tori to ii? 3 Judeudoge egore ji Ia aro pemegarewu koia karega cere ceiagu tori to ai, mare awadaru pegarewu koia. Paga karega, imedui aki dutabo are Aroe Eimejerado aki. 3 Jesus akore ei pugeje Taroiagudu padure kejewu bapera keje atugododukare oino tagire Aroe Eimejeragere tagi, du karega? 3 Kode, nowu taroiagudu padui bapera keje dukeje cewu Paore tuwadaru maku aiwuge eiere Aroe Eimejerage ma, (mare bapera atugo pemegarewu barigududodumodukare pudui), 3 Kodiba icare tagagore mako pegareboe iure ema cewu Paore boe pemegareudo emawu, ure utudo moto kaewuji, mare inagore Aroe Eimejera Onaregedu nure imi oino dukoia? 3 Iromodukare Ioga iroiaguduji ma, tameartorukaba ii. 3 Mare iromode ino ma, tagaidukare tameartoruwo ii ma, tameartorudo iro oino jiboeji, du kejewo taerduware, tameartorure Ioga metui itada duji, imudui Ioga tada duji jamedu. 3 Icare ere tuiagu tugeragu ji pugeje, mare ure cinorudo ekera piji. 4 Icare ure turawuje Jordão po okwa bakowu kae pugeje, cewu Joãore boe etao pegododu paru tugu kudawo kae, torore icare rakojere. 4 Makareuge eture ae, egore Joãokare ia turo kurirewu kuo rugadu. 4 Mare João makore awu jiboe jamedu boe boe jokodu rugadu. Makareuge emeartorure ji. 

Lázaro jewoduidu. 1Lázaro kogodure Betânia keje, Maria mare tuduie Marta rakojerewo keje. 2Maria, koiare ure roreboe tugu Pagimejerato, ure bure kidudo taga tabo. Lázaro, kogoduredu, uwuri rema. 3Uwiemage areme ere boe egoiagu oino Jesus ji: - Cegimejera, cewu ameardu kurire jiwu kogodure. 4Jesus akore awu ewadaru jipagi Nowu kogodae umodukare bito, mare ure turugadu Pao kuriwo du bogai. Du koiare Pao Onaregedu kuridodumode jamedu. 5Jesus meardu kuricigore Marta ji, uwie Maria ji, Lazaro ji jamedu. 6Mare tumeardui nowu kogoduiedu jitu inodu tabo, ure turodo toi meri pobe nono kimo. 7Du kejere icare makore nowu ture jorduwadowugei, akore Pawo pagirimi Judéia kae. 8Egore: - Cegimejera, maigodure judeudogere tuiagu tori to ai, macare amode akirimi toro? 9Jesus akore Meri jiwu horadoge ekare ikera pudogidure pobe taci ikera awubowuto? Merure meri jiwu romodukare cara cara tuwuduwo, paga karega, jordure meri uruguji kodi. 1 Mare merure boeco jiwu romode cara cara je, urugure jiboe bokware kodi. 1 Nowu tuwadaru rekodaji, ure oto tawuje pugeje, akore Pameduia Lázaro unudure, mare imode jetadudo. 1 Icare nowu ure jorduwadowuge egore ji Cegimejera, unuduradure dukeje, pemegagodumode. 1 Mare Jesus mako nure bireduji, emagerema emeardaere boe enuduji rugadu rakuduie akoino. 1 Kodi icare Jesusre inodu awadudo taci rugadu, akore Lázaro bire. 1 Iegarere taigoia, mare paga karega, paedukare toro kodi, duma tameartoruwo. Mare paduwo bogai. 1 Awu inodu keje, Tomé, iei Dídimo cedu, akore tumedage ei Pagoduwo jamedu, pawiwo apo. 1 Mare Jesus aregodu keje, merire pobe puibiji Lázaro metui moto tadadu keje. 1 Betânia padure puredu tu Jerusalemji. 1 Du kodire makarewu judeudoge eture Marta ae, Maria ae, tuwo boe motududo ei etuwuri bokwareduji. 2 Kuri tumeardui Jesus aregodumode duji dukeje, Marta riture togi, Maria rugadure mugure tuwai tada. 2 Icare Marta akore Jesus ji Ikimejera, aragojemode woe ma, iwuri bokwamodukare kodi karega. 2 Mare iorduware akogwamagudumode Pao ji bogaiboe jamedu boe, Pao umode jamedu boe maku akai. 2 Icare Jesus akore ji Awuri jewodumode. 2 Marta akore Iorduware jewodumoduie boe eewodumode boigoduwu meri jituji. 2 Jesus akore ji Imire jewodureboe, jereboere imi. Cewu meartorure iiwu, bimode, mare du inodu tabo jemode. 2 Cewu jere itadawuge, cewu meartorure iiwuge eiamedu boe ewimodukare jii je. Ameartorure nowu inoduji? 2 Akore U! Imeartorure akie Cristore aki duji. Pao Onaregeduie aki duji, cewu aregodumode moto kaewuie ure aki duji. 2 Awu tuwadaru akedu keje, rekodure tuwie bogai, makore ji tumago podu tabo: - Pagimejera rakojere nono, makore awogai. 2 Tumeardui kuri je dukeje, ure turagojedo, riture togi. 3 (Mare paga karega, Jesus aregodukare roga nowu babuturoguto, mare rakoje kimore cewu Marta jordure puduiwo keje). 3 Jeture Maria uwai kejewu judeudoge, eridure aedu tuwo boe motududo jitu bogai, tuiordui ui turagojedo taci ake tabo, ui tuiebu dukeje, ekodure rekodaji, tumeardae tabo utuie ure tuwuri meturewo kae ma, toraguduwo nono du bogai rakuduie ro oinoduji. 3 Maria rema, turegodui Jesus rakojerewo kae dukeje, tuiordui jitu keje, ure tubujodo jice bure paru, akore ji Ikimejera, aragojemode woe ma, iwuri bokwamodukare, kodi karega. 3 Icare Jesus tuiordui oragudui oino dukeje, nowu kodure apowu judeudoge etoragudui jamedu dukeje, kiarigodu kuricigore tudaroe tada, tugiarigodu kuricigo koia. 3 Icare akore Kaiba tare bu? Egore Cegimejera, mato, aerduwo. 3 Icare Jesus oragudure. 3 Du kodire icare judeudoge egore Tagaiwodo inoba meardu kuricigore jituji. 3 Mare ia emage egore Kode, ure joku bokwarewu jokudo tuiado, kode, kodiba roiwamodukare tuwo awu bi kado? 3 Tugiarigodu kuricigo tabo pugeje, Jesus uture nowu meturewo kae. Ia tori padui je kejedu tadare meture. 3 Icare Jesus akore boe ji Tori roto oino. Icare Marta, nowu birewu uwie, akore ji Ikimejera, jerimaga pega remawu nure, merire pobe puibiji metui woe dukeje. 4 Mare Jesus akore ji.
Kode imagokare ai ameartorumode dukeje, aerdumode Pao Aroe Eimejera o boe kurireuji? Du kejere icare ere nowu tori roto oino. 4 Icare Jesus, tui tuioku awogado baruto dukeje, akore Ioga, iegare kuricigore ai, ameardure iwadaruji kodi. 4 Iorduware boe jamedu jie ameardure iwadaru jituji, mare imagore awu boe etoiai woe dukoia, duma emeartoruwo aigoiaie are irojaiduji. 4 Nowu tuwadaru rekodaji, ure tumago rakado, akore Lázaro, aebu mato. 4 Boekarema, nowu birewu ure tuiebu aroia opoi tuwure, tugera tabo kimo dutabo. Du kodi icare Jesus akore Nowu aroia kiwuje piji, merudo. 
Judeudoge etaidure tuwo Jesus bito. 4 Cewu uture Maria aewu judeudoge, duwugere eerdure Jesus roji, ia emage emeartorure ji. 4 Mare iage eture fariseudoge etae, ereadodure ewiegai Jesus ro boeji. 4 Icare sacerdotedoge eimejerage mare fariseudoge ere boe eimejerage eiagu tudo pui, egore Inoba paromode? Awu imedu unure turo kurirewu todudo gu gu je. 4 Pamode roto oino rugadu ma, boe eiamedu boe emeartorumode ji, dukeje icare Roma bakurirewu kejewuge etaregodumode ma, emode pago bakurirewu, pago moto jamedu boe pegado. 4 Mare ia etumeduia iei Caifas cedu, sacerdotedoge eiemejera kurireui ema dutabo nowu joru jitu, akore Takare boe pa iaboeji iaboeji. 5 Taerduwakare ema remawuie tagai, ia imedu bitoduwo mito, boe eiamedu boe etai, duma boe eiamedu bitodu kawo? 5 Mare taobiji karega akoino, mare sacerdotedoge eimejera kurirewu ema nowu joruji, dukoiare ure Jesus bitodumoduie boe eiamedu boe etaidu awadudo. 5 Mare nowu moto kejewuge eiamedu ai mito tu je karega, mare ure taodo jice woje jice wojewu Pao ore eiamedu boe etoduwo pui du bogaire akoino. 5 Du kodi icare, nowu du kodiwu piji, eemarure tuwo bito. 5 Nowu inodu koiare Jesus meru awadukare judeudoge ekao pugeje. Ure tudawuje taci ia boe eeda iei Efrém cedu, padu puredui tu boe eedukare kejewu moto jitu kae. Nonore icare rakoje raire nowu ture jorduwadowuge ebo. 5 Judeudoge eno Páscoa puredugodu nure. Makarewu boe erudure Jerusalém kae, Páscoa otodai, tuwo tubemegado. 5 Eemaru nure Jesus bogai. Tuiedui Pao uwai tada dutabore egore pui Inoba tameardaere, kodiba aregodukare peta kae? 5 Mare sacerdotedoge eiemejerage, fariseudoge ere jordumode jiwuge eiamedu boe ereadoduiagu rakojerewoji, tuwo tugeragu ji. 

Betânia kejewu boe enogwage. 1Meri ikera awubodure mito taci ikera awubowuto Páscoa otodaidu kejere, Jesus uture Betânia kae, cewu ture jewodudowu iei Lázaro cedu kae. 2Nono ere ia boe enogwage towuje tui Jesus kurido du bogai. Marta unure boe eke maku boe etai, Lázaro okwagere nono nowu ira keje jamedu. 3Icare Mariare tugeragu ia roreboe kaguru jaji, ia okureboe ro rakaguragarewu metui tadadu, ure maedo Jesus bure joki, du ure kidudo taga tabo. Nowu bai okorobadure nowu roreboe ro tabo. 4Macare Judas Iscariote, nowu ure jorduwadowuge ia mito tu jedu, cewu umode makuwu, akore 5Kodiba tagare akirodo nowu roreboe tabo diieromode 3 0 ce duji, tuwo maku marenarue etai? 6Akore oino, mare tuwiapagai marenarue eidu koia karega, mare tugiwogu kigodu koia. Apore diiero ja mugure, iwogu kigodure nowu boere tugu nonowu boeji, dukoiare akoino. 7Icare Jesus akore Tagagokaba oino ji. Ure awu roreboe jetu otorogado imedumode moto tadadu paru kae. 8Marenarue emode tagabo jii je, mare imi, imodukare jii tagabo. 9Ia judeudoge makareuge eerduware Jesus rakojei torodu, etaregodure, mare tuiorduwo Jesus ji tu je du bogai karega, mare tuiorduwo nowu Lazaro ji, du bogaire ero oino jamedu. 1 Mare sacerdotedoge eimejerage ere tumeardae bu tugajeje tuwo Lázaro bito jamedu. 1 Paga karega, makarewu judeudoge ere turodo oino epiji, tumeartorui Jesus jitu koia. 
Jesus ui turemo Jerusalém todu. 1 Nowu meri rekodajiwu meriji ia boe makareuge etaregodure Jerusalém kae peta kaedu, emeardure Jesuie ure tuburedo duji. 1 Icare eridure togi kodoro tabo, toiogwari kuricigo tabo, egore Akaru pemegarewu aregodui Pagimejera ie tabodu, Israeldoge eimejera aregodu. 1 Jesus tuiordui ia jumento rogu jitu keje, ure tumugudo keje, uwo nono bakaru padui bapera kejedu reore: 1 Apagudu kaba Sion bakurirewu kejewu aredu. Ica, akimejera aregodu tumugui ia jumenta naregedu keje dutabo. 1 Nowu ure jorduwadowuge ekare boe pawuje nowu inoduji boe paruji, mare Jesus kuridodu kejere icare ewiabuture oinoie bapera atugore, oinoie boe erore jituji. 1 Cewu boe makareuge eedui apo cewu makoi Lázaro bogai meturewoto, ure jewodudo eegaiwuge ere iogwarido ji tuiegare tabo. 1 Du kodire boe eridure togi, mare paga karega, emeardure Jesus ui cewu turo kurirewu kuo du kodi. 1 Mare fariseudoge egore oino pui Tagaiwodo, paroiwa bokwa radure. Boe eiamedu boe eregodu nure rekodaji. 2 Ia gregodoge emugure nowu ruture tumagowo baruto peta kejewuge etada. 2 Duwuge ere tuburedo Filipe ji (cewu Galiléia tadawu Betsaida kejewu), enogwamagudure ji, egore Cegimejera, cedagemo nure ceerduwo Jesus ji. 2 Icare Filipe kodure André ae, ure bie. Icare Filipe mare André, ere Pagimejera bie. 2 Jesus akore ei Icare boe aregodure pudae Imedu Onaregedu kuridodumodedu kae. 2 Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai: ia trigo a butui moto todu, mare bimodukare dukeje, umode mitotu nono rugadu, mare bimode dukeje, a makaguragamode. 2 Cewu meardu kurire puduiwu, umode tuwarigu boeto, mare cewu kodu kagirire puduiwu, ikaruru nure pudui jere jii jeboe kae. 2 Iaboe eromode nono itaidu reore dukeje, ekodumode iregodaji. Cewu iragojemodewo keje, itugare rakojemode nono jamedu. Iaboe itugaremode ma, Ioga umode kuridodudo. 2 Oino, itaroe kiarigodu nure. Inoba inagomode? Ioga, ikinorudo awu du kodiboe piji. Mare awu inodu koia rugadure itaregodure tu oino. 2 Ioga, akie kurido. Nowu inodu keje kuri je, ia boe emago aregodure baru piji, akore Ire kurido marigudu, imode kurido pugeje. 2 Aró, kode, nowu boe makareuge eedure nonodu, tumeardui nowu inodu jitu keje, egore boiarurugoduie. Iage egore Ia tupare akoino ji. 3 Icare Jesus akore Awu makore oinoboe igoia karega akoino, mare taigoia. 3 Ure tugogado awu moto jiboe aregodure; icare awu moto ukimejera barigudumode. 3 Mare icai itaogado moto piji dukeje, imode imugudo ime eiamedu boe keje itae. 3 Akore oino, mare tuwo boe eerduwado inoba tuwimode du jire akoino. 3 Icare egore Cemeardure Pao o bakaru akoi Cristo jemode jii je duji. Kodiba icare akore ure turugadu Imedu Onaregeduwo taogado? Kakoduwuba nowu Imedu Onaregedu rema? 3 Jesus akore Urugureboe mugumode tagabo kimo biega tu je. Tamerudo urugu kimodu otoi, boeco ukawo taroiwa bokwado. Cewu merure boeco kaowu jordukare kaiba tugodumode. 3 Urugureboe ji tagabo kimodu otoi, tameartorudo ji, duma urugureboe orewo tagi. Awu tuwadaru rekodaji, Jesus ure tudawuje nowu piji, ure tuwiado epiji. 
Judeudoge emeartorukare. 3 Ure turo kurirewu kuo du makado, mare du inodu tabo emeartorukare ji. 3 Oinore nowu inodu jia profeta Isaias akore Cegimejera, ioguduba meartorure cereadodure jiboeji? Ioguduba biegaiba Pagimejera ro rakarewu kogadodure? 3 Mare eroiwakare tumeartoruwo, paga karega, ia du kodi, profeta Isaias akore pugeje 4 Ure eeku mi, ure ewabo rakado, duma eerdukawo tuioku tabo, eerduwa kawo tuwabo tada, ekawo tubemegado, ikawo epemegado (Is 6, s). 4 Oinore Isaias akore tuiordui o boe pemegarewu kurirewu jitu keje. 4 Mare ia judeudoge eiemejerage makareuge emeartorure ji, mare fariseudoge eigoia ekare towadudo, duma tuwarigudu kawo sinagoga piji. 4 Paga karega, etaidure boewo tugurido duji, mare tuguridodu aregodui baru piji duji karega. 4 Du kodi icare Jesus ure tumago rakado, akore Cewu meartorure iiwu, ii karega meartorure, mare ure irojaiwu jire meartorure. 4 Jordure iiwu, ure irojaiwu jire jordure. 4 Itaregodure nono urugureboe aregodui moto kaedu reore, nowu inodu tabo, cewu meartorure iiwu rakojemodukare boecorewu tada. 4 Iaboe emeardumode iwadaruji, mare eromodukare nono iwadaru reore ma, imodukare ikogado ji, paga karega, itaregodure moto kae, mare iwo ikogado boe ji du bogai karega, mare iwo boe einorudodu bogaire itaregodure. 4 Cewu ure iwarigududowu, ukare tugeragu iwadaru jiwu, iaboe emode tugogado ji ire awadudowu iwadaru umode tugogado ji boigoduwu meriji. 4 Paga karega, itaobiji karega inagoino, mare ure irojaiwu Ioga, ure inagomodedudo, ure imode boe eerduwadodudo jamedu. 5 Iorduware: ure boe eroiagudu boe ewi bokwarewu rema. Kode, Iogare inagoiagu jiboe, jire inagoino. 

Jesus ure ture jorduwadowuge ewure kabi. 1Páscoa jiwu petamodedu otodai, Jesus tuiorduai icai boe aregodui pudae, icai tudumode Tuo ae awu moto piji duji, meardu kurire awu moto kejewu tuwobei, meardu kurire jii ei rugadu. 2Enogwagei ira kejedu tonaji, Aroe pegareuma urade Judas, cewu Simão Iscariote onaregedu, meardae pegarewu barigu uwaboto, uwo Jesus maku onare jiwuge etai. 3Icare Jesus, tuiorduwai Tuoie boe jamedu boe bu tugera keje, Pao pijie taregodure, du tumoduie tugirimi Pao ae pugeje, 4Ure turagojedo taci ira piji, ure tugudae aroia boarewu tawuje, icare tui tugeragu ia aroia koboji, ure kogudo tu tubeagajeje. 5Icare ure pobo tugu ia ruwoboto, icare ure nowu ture jorduwadowuge ewure kabi, ure ewure kidudo nowu ture kogudo tubeagajejewu aroia tabo. 6Aregodure tu Simão Pedro ae, mare Pedro akore ji Ikimejera, arumode iwure kabi? 7Jesus akore ji Awu irore oino jiboe amodukare pawuje roga, mare dukeje kuri je, amode pawuje. 8Pedro akore ji amodukare iwure kabi rugadu. Icare Jesus akore ji Imodukare akabi ma, aragojemodukare itabo 9Kodi icare Simão Pedro akore Ikimejera, kode, iwure tu rugadu karega, ikera jamedu, itaora jamedu, amode kabi. 1 Jesus akore ji Cewu ure taimo mariguduu biapagamodukare tuwo tugabi du bogai pugeje; ema jamedu boe kabidure kodi. Aró, kode, tagi tagabidure, mare taiamedu karega. 1 Jorduware ioguduba umode tumagu tujebage etai duji, du kodire akoino: - Taiamedu karega kabidure. 1 Tui ewure kabidu akedu keje, ure tugeragu tugudaeji, ure tugu tu pudui pugeje, icare ure tumugudo tu ira keje. Du kejere icare makore ture jorduwadowugei, akore Taerdure iro oino jiboeji? 1 Tagagore ure taerduwadowuie ure imi, tagagore tagimejeraie ure imi. Tagagoi oinodu pemegare, cewu imi rugadu kodi. 1 Kodi icare imire tagimejerare imi, ure taerduwadowure imi, mare du inodu tabo ire tawure kabi. Kode ica, tamode pu bure kabi jamedu. 1 Taerdu nure iroi oinoduji, du reorere taromode pui jamedu. 1 Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai boe etugare emawu kurikare tugimejera kori; jamedu cewu rojaidodurewu kodukare cewu ure rojaiwu kori. 1 Tamode awu inodu boe pawuje ma, boe pemegarewu jetumode tagabo, mare tamode inodu towuje dukeje. 1 Taiamedu boeji karega inagoino. Iorduware cewu ire tawuje tumedage epijigugei. Mare umode turugadu boewo nono bapera atugo reore: -Cewu ure amirewu kowuje itabowu unure tuwureadu awagado ii. 1 Imago nure awu inoduji oino, nowu inodu umode tudo duotodai, duma umode tudowuje ma tameartoruwo, taerduwawo ioguduba ure imi duji. 2 Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai: - Ure tugeragu cewu ure irojaiwu jiwu, ii rugadure ure tugeragu, cewu ure tugeragu iiwu, ure irojaiwu jiwu jire ure tugeragu jamedu. 2 Tagoi oinodu rekodaji, Jesus utaroe kiarigodu kuricigore, dutabore akore Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai ia tagi tamode imagu icebage etai. 2 Nowu ure jorduwadowuge etaiwore jice woje pui, eerduwakare kakoduwu ia puduiba akomode inoduji. 2 Nowu ure jorduwadowuge ia mito tu jedu, Jesus meardu kuricigore jiwu, mugure ira keje mekiwu, ure taora bu Jesus mo keje. 2 Simão Pedro ure tuiebirigido ji tunora tabo ji: - Ioguduba jiba akoino? 2 Nowu mitodu, taora padui Jesus mo kejedu tabore, unoragodure ji: - Cegimejera, ioguduba? 2 Jesus akore Cewu imode amirewu pegodu du imode maku aiwu. Du keje icare ure amirewu pegodo, ure maku Simão Iscariote onaregedu Judas ai. 2 Ui nowu amirewu remo dukeje kuri je, Aroe pegareure taredo to. Kodi icare Jesus akore ji Amode towujeboe todu marigudo ii. 2 Mare nowu jeture ira kejewuge, ia emage ia emage eerduwakare kodiba akoino ji. 2 Paga karega, Judas apore akirododu epa ja mugure, dukoiare ia emage emeardaere akoe oino ji: - Akirodo ia okwamode pagai peta epa boeji. Iarema, ia maku marenarue etai. 3 Tui cewu amirewu kobo ko durekodaji, ure akedo pudui tuwo tuiebu. Boekarema, boecoradure marigudu. 3 Judas ui tuiebu dukeje, Jesus akore Oinore icare Imedu Onaregedu kuridodure, Paore tugurirewu towuje tada. 3 Kode Paore tugurirewu towuje tada dukeje, Pao umode kurireudo ema tudada, umode kurireudo ema kuri je. 3 Itore kugure, biegatu kimo iragojei oino tagabo. Taemarumode iwogai, mare imago magai judeudoge eidu reorere, inagomode oino tai jamedu taroiwamodukare tagoduwo ikodumodewo kae. 

Boe eroiagudu maiwu. 3 Iwo boe eroiagudu maiwu maku tagai. Tameardu kurido tu pui. Oino imeardu kuri magai tai du reorere tameardu kurimode pui jamedu. 3 Tameardu kurimode pui ma, boe eerduwamode inoge ire jorduwadowugeie ure tagiduji. 3 Icare Simão Pedro unoragodure ji: - Cegimejera, kaiba akodumode? Jesus akore ji Ikodumodewo kae, akodumodukare oino roga, mare ia boi pugejere akodumode itabo. 3 Pedro unoragodure ji pugeje: - Cegimejera, kodiba ikodumodukare akabo oino? Imode imagu awugeje. 3 Icare Jesus akore ji Amode amagu iwugeje? Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino ai kogariga akogodumodedu otodai, amode aerduwa bokwado ii pobe ma jewu metuia bokware. 

Boe etawara Pao ai dure Jesus rema. - 1Tawabo pagudugodu kaba. Tameartorure Pao ji, kode tameartorudo ii jamedu. 2Boe eeda makaguragare Ioga uwai tada; umodukare ino ma, imagomode tai marigudu. Ica, itumode toro iwo taeda pemegado. 3Itumode toro, imode taeda pemegado dukeje, imode ikirimi, imode ikeragu tai itabo, duma, taeduwo iragojemodewo keje. 4Taerduware kakoduwu awaraba umode boe arego ikodumodewo kaeduji. 5Icare Tomé akore ji Cegimejera, ceerduwakare kaiba akodumode duji. Kode, inobadu taboba ceerduwamode nowu awaraji? 6Icare Jesus akore ji Imire Awarare imi, Boe Rikirewu nure mi, ure boe eedowu nure imi, iaboe iaboe etaregodumodukare Ioga ae ipiji dukeje. 7Taerduwamode ii ma, taerduwamode Iogaji jamedu. Oino taerduware ji, paga karega, taerdure ji marigudu kodi. 8Filipe akore Cegimejera, ceerduwado Pao ji. Nowu inodu umode turugadu cei. 9Jesus akore Mariigudu iragojere tagabo, macare aerduwakare ii, Felipe? Cewu jordure iiwu, jordure Iogaji jamedu. Kodiba icare akagore oinono ceerduwado Pao ji, oino? 1 Ameartorukare imedui Ioga tada duji, Ioga metui itoda duji? Imagore ji taiboe, itaobiji karega inagoino, mare Iogare, meture itadadu, ure turore jiboe boe towuje. 1 Tameartorudo ii. Imedure Ioga tada, Ioga meture itada. Tameartorudo awu inodu boeji, awu roboe koia. 1 Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai: cewu meartorure iiwu, romode nono irore jiboeji, mare ro kodumode awu iro oino jiboe kori. Mare paga karega, itumode Ioga ae kodi. 1 Ica, tagogwamagudumode Pao ji ikie tabo bogaiboe jamedu boe, iromode ino tagai, duma Uo kuridoduwo tonaregedu tada. 1 Tagogwamagudumode ii, ikie taboboe jamedu boe, iromode ino tagai. 
Jesus akore tumoduie Aroe Pemegarewu arego. 1 Tameardu kurimode ii ma, taromode nono ii taroiagudu reore. 1 Icare inogwamagudumode Pao ji, du umode ia Tagimejera Pemegarewu maku tagai muguwo tagabo boe jameduji jii je. 1 Duwure boe jokoduwu remawu Aroe rema, duwure awu moto umodukare tugeragu ji, paga karega, roiwakare tuiorduwo ji kodi. Tagirema, taerduware ji, paga karega, rakojemode tagabo, metumode tadoda du kodi. 1 Imodukare marenarudo tagi ii ikera ra tabiji dutabo. Imode ikirimi tawogai pugeje. 1 Biegatu kimo, awu moto jordumodukare ii. Mare tagirema, taerdumode ii pugeje, iere kodi, tagi jamedu taemode jamedu kodi. 2 Nowu meriji taerduwamode iragojei Ioga tada duji, taedui itada duji, imedui tadoda duji jamedu. 2 Cewu jedure ino boe eroiagudu jiwu, romode ino ma, nowure meardu kurire ii. Cewu meardu kurire iiwu, Ioga meardu kurimode ji jamedu, imeardu kurimode ji, imode itowadudo jekai. 2 Icare Judas unoragodure ji, mare cewu Iscariote karega, akore Cegimejera, kodiba amode akowadudo ceegai, mare amodukare akowadudo awu moto jekai? 2 Jesus akore ji Cewu meardu kurire iiwu, remode nono ii boe eroiagudu reore, dukejere icare Ioga meardu kurimode ji jamedu, dukejere cedumode mato ae, icare cemode ceeda bu tada. 2 Cewu meardu kurikare iiwu, romodukare nono ii boe eroiagudu reore. Tameardure jiwu iwadaruji, mare iwadaru karega, mare ure irojaiwu Ioga bataru. 2 Inagore awu inodu boeji iragojei kimo tagabodu otoi. 2 Mare ure boe ewudugugowu Aroe Pemegarewu, dure Ioga umode rojai ikie tabodu, umode taerduwado boe jamedu boeji, umode tawia jetu imagore jiboe jamedu boeji. 2 Inure boe butugurewu mugudo tagabo, inure ino boe butugurewu maku tagai. Mare imodukare maku tagai nono awu moto kejewuge magai maku du reore. Tawabo kiarigodu kaba, tawabo pagudu kaba jamedu. 2 Tameardure imagoi awu inodu jituji itumode, mare imode ikirimi tagae pugeje. Tameardu kurimode ii ma, boe jokodure taegare kuricigomode itui Ioga ae duji, mare paga karega, Iogare kuri remawure ikori. 2 Inagore awu inoduji oino tai, nowu inodu umode tudowujedu koda piji, duma inodu ui tudowuje dukeje, tameartoruwo. 3 Imago kuri jokodumodukare tai pugeje, mare paga karega, awu moto ukimejera aregodu nure kodi, mare ro rakamodukare iaboeji iaboeji ii. 3 Mare awu moto jorduwamode imeardu kurii Ioga jituji, iroi nono Ioga iroiagudu reore duji. Taragojedo, paduwo awu piji. 

Parera ikure Jesus rema. - 1Imire boe jokoduwu parera ikure imi; Iogare parera iguru epa rema. 2Enari botukarewu jetara kuguri jamedu boe umode kado; enari boturewu jamedu boe umode jetara kuguri rogu kado piji, duma enari makawo. 3Tagire tagabidure (jetara boe kabidure tabiji) imagore jiwu iwadaru koia. 4Tamugudo itabo, imi jamedu imugumode tagabo. Enari boe botumodukare taobiji jetukai cito dutabo. Oinore tare jamedu: taro pemegarewu umodukare tamugukai itabo dukeje. 5Imire parera ikure imi, tagire jetaragurure tagi. Mugure itabowu, imugure apowu, ro pemegarewu kuricigomode, paga karega, itabo karega dukeje, taroiwamodukare iaboeji iaboeji. 6Cewu mugukare itadawuge eiamedu boe, barigudumode toro baawadu kae, cewu enari botukare jetara boe reore. Du kidumode, boe emode ako, bariguduwo joruto, kowuduwo. 7Tamugumode itabo ma, iwadaru metumode tagabo ma, tagogwamagudumode tagaidure jiboe jamedu boe bogai, du umode ino rugadu. 8Ioga akaru kuridodu nure, tai taro pemegarewu makado dutabo, tai ire jorduwadowugedo tagi dutabo. 9Nono Ioga meardu kuri magai ii du reorere, imeardu kurire tai jamedu. Tamugudo imeardu kuriae tada. 1 Taromode nono ii taroiagudu reore ma, tamugumode imeardu kuriae tada. Nono iro magai Iogai iroiagudu reore dukoiare imugure meardu kuriae tada du reore. 1 Inagore tai awu inodu boeji du ma iegareae metuwo tadoda, taegareae kororogoduwo. 
Boe emeardu kurii puidu. - 1 Awu ino boe eroiagudu reo tameardu kurido pui, imeardu kuri magai tai du reore. 1 Iaboe iaboe emeardu kuriae kodukare cewu ure tumagu tuwidoduwo tumeardu kurire jiwuge etai du kori. 1 Imedage nure tagi taromode nono ii taroiagudu reore dukeje. 1 Imagomodukare itugaregeie ure tagi pugeje, mare paga karega, ire taerduwado imeardure ji Ioga pijiboe jamedu boeji. 1 Tagire tamagokare iwogai, mare imire imagore tawogai. Ire tarojai toro taro pemegareuwo tudowuje, nowu taro pemereuwo jii je, du ma, tagogwamagudumode Iogaji ikie taboboe jamedu boe makuduwo tagai. 1 Ire taroiagu jiboe reo tameardu kuriwo pui jice woje. 
Awu moto kejewu boe etonamode Jesus apawugei. - 1 Awu moto kodu kagirimode tai ma, taerduwado iie kodu kagirire tagodobiji. 1 Moto omode tagi ma, moto meardu kurimode tai, toi tagi dukoia. Mare moto o karega ure tagi dukeje, ire ikeragu tai pijidu kodi, du kodire moto kodu kagirire tai. 2 Tawia jetu imagore tai jiwu iwadaruji boe etugare kodukare tugimejera kori. Erorerure ii, kode, erorerumode tai jamedu. Eromode nono iwadaru reore ma, kode eromode nono tawadaru reore jamedu. 2 Mare eromode nowu inodu jamedu boeji ikie koia tai, mare paga karega, eerduwakare cewu ure irojaiwu jitu koia. 2 Mare itaregodumodukare, imagomodukare ma, ero pegamodukare rabodu. Mare oino ego okwacerewu bokwa turo pegareuji. 2 Cewu kodu kagirire iiwu, kodu kagirimode Iogaji jamedu. 2 Iro kurirewu umodukare etada, nono ia rokare nono iro reore, ma, ero pegamodukaradu. Macare eerdure iroji, mare ekodu kagirire ii, ekodu kagirire Iogaji. 2 Mare uwo nono bataru padui eno bapera kejedu reore: 
Ekodu kagirire ii paga tu je . 2 Cewu mako kigodure boe eparu kejewu, imode rojai Ioga ie tabowu, cewu ore boe rikirewu Aroe Pemegarewu, ure tudawuje Ioga pijidu, aregodumode dukeje, jomode iwugeje. 2 Tagi jamedu, taiomode iwugeje, mare paga karega, tagi taedure itabo jii boe paruto dukoia. 

Boe etonai meartorure Jesus jiwugeidu. - 1Inagore oino tai, tawo tabewudo tai, tawudu kawo boe pegareuto. 2Tawarigudumode sinagogadoge epiji. Boe aregodumode pudae dukeje cewu ure tawidowuge eiamedu boe emeardaemode tuie ure Pao kurido duji. 3Eromode oino, mare paga karega, eerdukare Iogaji, eerdukare ii jamedu kodi. 4Mare inagore oino tai awu iwadaruji, duma, boe aregodumode pudae dukeje, tawia jetuwo inagoi tai marigudu duji. Mare ikare tawie nowu inoduji boe paruto, iragoje kimore tagabo kodi. 
Aroe Pemegarewu maragodae. 5Icare itumode cewu ure irojaiwu ae, macare ia tagi ia tagi tanorakare ii: - Kaiba akodumode? 6Mare awu inagoinodu ure tagiarigodaedo tumaedo tawabo tada. 7Mare du inodu tabo imagomode tai boe jokoduji pemegare tai ituwo tabiji, paga karega, itumodukare ma, cewu makomode tawugejewu aregodumodukare tagae. Mare itumode dukeje, imode rojai tawogai. 8Aregodumode du kodiboe keje, awu moto umode boe pa boe ero pegareuji, boe jetororeuji, boe ji tugogado boeiboeji. 9Umode awu motodo boe pa boe ero pegareuji, emeartorukare ii kodi. 1 Umode udo boe pa boe jetotoreuji, mare paga karega, itumode Pao ae, durekodajire icare taerdumode ii pugeje. 1 Umode udo boe pa boe ji tugogado boeiboeji, mare paga karega, boere tugogado awu moto kejeboe eimejeraji marigudu. 1 Imagomode ji taiboe makaguragare kimo, mare tugiwa rakamodukare ji oino. 1 Mare makomode tawugejewu, cewu boe rikirewu Aroe Pemegarewu aregodumode dukeje, umode taerduwado boe rikirewu jamedu boeji, mare paga karega, taobiji karega makomode, mare makomode tumeardure jiboeji; umode tawie aregodumodeboeji jamedu. 1 Ema umode ikurido, mare paga karega, inoe makudumode ai du kodi, umode tawie ji jamedu. 1 Ure Ioga apoboe jamedu boe ino nure ema jamedu. Du kodire inagore tai inoe makudumode ai, umode kogado tawiegai jamedu. 
Boe ekiarimode, mare boe eegaremode pugeje, Cristo koia. 1 Biegatu kimo, teardumodukare ii, mare biegatu pugeje, taerdumode ii pugeje, mare paga karega, itumode Pao ae imuguwo apo kodi. 1 Nowu inodu koia, nowu ia ure jorduwadowuge enorare pui jice woje, jice woje, egore Kaboba jiba akore oino pai. Biegatu kimo taerdumodukare ii, biegatu kimo pugeje, dukeje taerdumode ii pugeje? Inobadu jiba akomode oino itumode Pao ae? 1 Du keje egore Inobadu jiba akore biegatu kimo? Paerduwakare kaboba jiba aidure tagoi oinono. 1 Jesus ure boe pa ei tunoragoduiagu iaboe bogai duji, du kodi icare akore Tanorare pui jice woje, jice woje, cewu imagore jiboeji, inagoi biegatu kimo, dukeje teardumodukare ii pugeje, du ia biegatu pugeje dukeje taerdumode ii pugeje duji. 2 Boe jokodu jire imagomode oino tai tagi tagoragudumode, tamode maido, mare awu moto kejewu boe eegaremode. Tagiarigodumode, mare tagiarigodae umode taegareaedo pudumi. 2 Aredu tui tuguri butuiagu dukeje, kiarigodure, boe aregodure pudae ji dukoia, mare tuguri butu rekodaji, bia puredukare cewu tugiarigodaeji pugeje, tuiegare koia, ia imedurogu buture kodi. 2 Du reorere tagi tagiarigodure oino jamedu, mare iordumode tai pugeje, nono tawabo jekaremode pugeje, iaboe iaboe emodukare taegareae barigu tabiji. 2 Nowu meriji tanoramodukare ii iaboe iaboe bogai pugeje. 
Boe enogwamaguduwo Jesus ie tabo. - Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino tai tagogwamagudumode Pao ji ikie tabo bogaiboe jamedu boe, umode maku tagai. 2 Jii oino tagogwamagudukare iaboe iaboe bogai ikie tabo roga. Tagogwamagududo du makudumode tagai, duma taegareae kororogoduwo. 2 Ire iwadaru jeonado ia bakaruji dutabore inagore tai, mare boe aregodumode pudae ikai iwadaru jeonado jice woje, jice woje ia bakaru boeji tai, du umodukare pugeje, mare imago awadumode tai Pao jiboeji. 2 Nowu du kodiwu keje tagogwamagudumode ikie tabo dukeje, inogwamagudukare Pao ji tagai pugeje. 2 Mare paga karega, Pao meardu kuricigore tai, tameardu kuricigore ii, tameartorure itaregodui Pao piji kodi. 2 Ire itawuje Pao piji ituwo mato moto kae. Ica, oinore icare imode moto pijido, ituwo Pao ae pugeje. 
Jesus ure jorduwadowuge emeartorae. 2 Nowu ure jorduwadowuge emagore ji ica, oinore icare are awadaru awadudo rugadu, akarega ure awadaru jeonado iaboeji pugeje. 3 Ica, oinore icare cere boe pa aerduwai boe jamedu boe jituji, akogeamodukai iaboe iaboe enorawo ai pugeje duji. Nowu inodu koiare cemeartorure akaregodui Pao piji duji rugadu. 3 Jesus akore ei Oinore icare tameartorure? 3 Ica, boe aregodumode, boe aregodure marigudu, dukejere tamode tagaodo tagogwacemodewo jaogwai, tamode ipijido, tamode ido mito tu je. Mare ikare mito tu je. Ioga mugure itabo. 3 Inagore awu inoduji tai, duma boe pemegareuwo, boe butugureuwo tai igoia. Awu moto keje taiwomode. Mare tabewudo tai. Imire ire imorido awu motoji. 

Jesus makoi tubaru tabodu. 1Jesus ure tuioku awogado baruto, dutabore akore Ioga, icare boe aregodure pudae; akonaregedu kurido, duma, akonaregedu uwo akurido jamedu. 2Are ro rakarewu makai, are boe jamedu maku iera kai, uwo jere jii jeboe maku cewu are maku aiwuge eiamedu boe etai. 3Mare jere jii jeboe reo boe eerduwawo ai ure mitotu jewu boe jokoduwu Aroe Eimejera ji, mare boe eerduwawo are rojaiwu Jesus Cristo ji jamedu. 4Ire akurido awu moto keje. Ire are iroiagudu jiwu imaragodae iado. 5Kodi icare, oino, Ioga, ikurido akabo, amagai ikurido akabo moto todudumodedu otodai. 6Imagore akieji are maku inaiwu moto kejewu ime ewiegai, akogere emage du are emagu inai, duwuge erore nono awadaru rekodaji. 7Icare oino ere boe pa are maku inaiboe jamedu boe apijie aregodure duji. 8Mare paga karega, ara maku inaiwu awadaru ire maku etai, ere tugeragu ji, ere boe pa boe jokoduie ure apijie itawujedure, emeartorure ai irojai duji. 9Nowuge etaire inogwamagudure ai. Inogwamagudukare moto paru tabo, mare cewu are maku inaiwuge eparu tabo inogwamagudure ai, akogere emage kodi. 1 Inore emaboe jamedu boe akore ema jamedu, akore emaboe jamedu boe inore ema. Eigoiare itagaru kuridodure. 1 Iragojemodukare moto keje pugeje, emagerema eragojemode moto keje. Imire itumode akae. Ioga pemegarewu, eedu otorogado akie tabo, cewu are maku inaiwu akie tabo, ewo mitogodu tu pureore. 1 Iragoje kimoi ebo dutabo, ieture ei cewu are maku inaiwu akie tabo. Ieture cewu are maku inaiwugei ia emage ewogwakare, mare tu cewu ure tuwarigu pegareboeto tu rugadu, uwo nono bapera atugo reore. 1 Mare oino itumode akae. Ire awu inogwamagudae towuje iragojei moto kejedu tonaji, duma iegareae jamedu boe metuwo ebo. 1 Ire awadaru maku etai, mare moto kodu kagirire ei, mare paga karega, moto kejewugekare emage kodi, imagai moto kejewukare imidu reore. 1 Inogwamagudukare ai awo etawuje moto piji, mare awo einorudo boe pegarewu piji. 1 Moto kejewugekare emaga imagai moto kejewukare imi jamedu. 1 Boe pemegareugedo emage boe rikirewu tabo; awadarure boe rikirewu rema. 1 Amagai irojai moto kae du reorere imode erojai moto kae jamedu. 1 Imire ipemegado etai, duma ewo tubemegado boe rikirewu tabo jamedu. 2 Inogwamagudukare tu etai rugadu, mare inogwamagudure cewu meartorumode ii ewadaru koiawuge etai jamedu. 2 Duma eiamedu boewo mito tu je. Ioga, amedu magai itada, imedu magai atada du reorere emeduwo padoda jamedu, du tabowo moto meartorure aigoiaie are irojai duji. 2 Are irugu kurirewu maku inaidu, ire maku etai jamedu, duma ewo mitotu, pamagai mito tu je du reore. 2 Imi etada, aki itada, duma ewo turugadu tui mito tu je dutabo, duma moto meartoruwo akie are irojai duji, ameardu kurie ei ameardu kuri magai ii du reore duji. 2 Ioga, itaidure cewu are maku inaiwuge eeduwo itabo iragojerewo keje, duma eerduwo are maku inaiwu irugu kurireuji, mare paga karega, ameardu kurire ii moto towujedumodedu otodai. 2 Ioga pemegarewu, awu moto kejeboe eerduwakare ai, mare imi iorduware ai, awuge jamedu eerduware akie are irojai duji. 2 Ire eerduwado akieji, imode eerduwado kimo pugeje, duma ameardu kurii iidu metuwo ebo, imuguwo etada jamedu. 

Boe ji tugeragu Jesus jitu. 1Nowu tuwadaru rekodaji, Jesus uture nowu ture jorduwadowuge ebo ia paga kurirewu iere Cedron cedu okwa bakowu kae, ia okureboe pa jeturewo kae, du tore ure turemo ture jorduwadowuge ebo. 2Judas, cewu umode makuwu, jorduware nowu boe eedaji, Jesus utu kigodure toro nowu ture jorduwadowuge ebo kodi, 3Icare Judas ure tugeragu sacerdotedoge eimejerage mare fariseudoge eno tarigaraidogei, ure eko pudabo, etaregodure nono joru tabo, baigadoge ebo. 4Icare Jesus tuiorduwai inoba boemode puduidu jamedu boe jitu du kodi ure tuwure taru etogi, icare unorare ei, akore ioguduba bogaiba taro oino? 5Egore: - Jesus Nazaré kejewu bogaire cero oino. Akore ei Imireo (Judas, ure makuwu, rakojere ebo jamedu). 6Akore: -Imireo, ino dukeje kuri je, ere tuwure taru tugujebiji, tuwudui moto keje dutabo. 7Icare unoragodure ei pugeje: - Ioguduba bogaiba taro oino? Egore Jesus Nazaré pijiwu bogaire cero oino 8Jesus akore ei pugeje Inagore imireo, oinore inagore tai. Kode iwogaire taro oino dukeje, awuge etudo. 9Nowu inodu tabo ure nono bataru reore cewu are maku inaiwuge ia ewogwakare ipiji. 1 Simão Pedro ia toriga rairewu mugure apo, du ure tawuje tuia piji, ure sacerdotedoge eimejera ia utugare okorido, tui okwacere kana pemegarewu jaogwaiwu bia kado dutabo (Nowu utugare iere Malco). 1 Mare Jesus akore Pedro ji Atoriga tugu tuiato! Ikudumodukare Iogare maku inaiwu jirireboece? 
Jesus rakojei baire eimejerage eegoraidu. 1 Kodi icare utorigaraidoge ere tugeragu Jesus ji, ere kogudo. 1 Ere reko boetoji Anás ae, cewu Caifás uiedoga, duwure baire eimejera rema nowu joruji. 1 Cewu okituware judeudogei tagoi oino dutabo: - Ema remawure mitotu jewu biwo boe etai du rema. 1 Simão Pedro kodure Jesus apo ia ure jorduwadowu mitotu jedu apo. Nowu ure jorduwadowu ui mito tu jedu sacerdotedoge eimejera jorduware ji, dure ure turemo Jesus apo nowu sacerdotedoge eimejera uwai tadawu uwororo kae. 1 Pedro rema mugure baiporo keje baawadu jaogwai, mare cewu sacerdotedoge eimejera jorduware jiwu makore jeture baiporo jiwudoji, duwudo ure udo turemo. 1 Nowu jeture baiporo jiwudo unoragodure Pedro ji, akore Awu imedu ure jorduwadowuge ia karega ure aki? Akore Boro! Imi karega. 1 Nowu maragodure nonowuge, nowu jeture boeji nonowuge ere jorugo tuwo towarudo, biaku barikare kodi. Pedro rakojere ebo tui towarudo dutabo. 1 Nowu baire eimejera unoragodure Jesus ji nowu ure jorduwadowuge eiboeji, ure boe eerduwado jiboeji jamedu. 2 Icare Jesus akore ji Imagore imago awadu tabo motoji, ire boe eerduwadodu maedo sinagoga tada, Pao uwai tada, cewu judeudoge ere tudo puiwo keje; podu karega imago imagore ei. 2 Kodiba anorare ii? Anorado cewu meardure imagoi puduiwugei. Nowuge eerduware kaboba jiba ire tuiorduwado. 2 Awu bataru keje, ia jeture boeji nonowu, ure tugera to Jesus jeji, akore Kodiba akagoino awu baire eimejeraji? 2 Jesus akore ji Iwadaru pegare dukeje, iwadaru pegare jiboe kuo, mare imago pemega nure dukeje, kodiba are akera to ii? 2 Icare Anás ure edo reko toro baire eimejera Caifás ae, iera kogu tabo. 2 Simão Pedro mugure nono tui towarudo dutabo. Icare enoragodure ji: - Iarema aki cewu ure jorduwadowuge ia kana ure aki? Icare ure tuiorduwa bokwado ji, akore Boro! Imi karega! 2 Icare baire eimejera ia utugare, cewu Pedrore bia kadowu ia uwobe, akore ji Iordukare ai apo cewu okureboe pa tada? 2 Mare Pedrore tuiorduwa bokwado ji pugeje. Ca, kuri je kogoriga akogodure. 
Jesus rakojei Pilato jokoraidu. 2 Ere Jesus reko nowu Caifás uwai piji brae eimejera uwai kae, meri rutu tabo. Mare judeudoge ekare turemo nowu brae eimejera uwaito, turorogodu kawo, duma tuwo Páscoa kowuje. 2 Kodi icare Pilatos ure tuiebu etae, unoragodure ei: - Kakoduwu ia ro pegarewu koiaba tare awu imedu arego woe? 3 Egore ji Awu ro pegarewu umodukare ma, cemodukare maku akai. 3 Du koiare icare Pilato akore Emareo, tagire tare tagogado ji nono taroia reore. Icare judeudoge egore Cegi, ukare turugadu cewo iaboe iaboe ewido. 3 Awu inodu tabore ure nono Jesus bataru reore tagoi inobadu taboba tuwimode duji. 3 Pilatore turemo tuwaito, makore Jesus bogai, unoragodure ji: - Akina judeudoge eimejerare aki? 3 Jesus akore Akaobijina akagoino, iarema iage kana egoino awiegai? Pilato akore 3 Kode, judeu nure imi? Ako moto kejewu baire eimejerage ere amagu inai. Inoba arore? 3 Jesus akore Boe eimejerai imidu, awu moto kejeboe karega. Boe eimejerai imidu umode awu moto keje ma, boe jokodure itugarege emode tubewudo iwugeje imagudu kawo judeudoge etai. Mare boe eiemejerai imidu woeboe karega. 3 Kodi icare Pilato unoragodure ji: - Kode, akina boe eimejare aki? Jesus akore U! Imire boe eimejerare imi. Imagowo boe rikireuji du bogaire iwudure, itaregodure awu moto kae. Boe rikirewu mugure apowuge eiamedu boe emeardumode imagore jiboeji. 3 Icare Pilato akore ji Kaboba boe rikirewu rema? Tagoi oino dutabo, ure tuiebu pugeje, uture judeudoge etae, akore ei Iordukare ia ro pegarewu boeji. 3 Mare taroiare Páscoa keje tare ido ia meture baicorewu tadawu ro pegarewu tawuje du rema. Kode tagaidure iwo judeudoge eimejera inorudo? 4 Du keje icare eiamedu boe enoiogwarire pugeje, tagoi: - Boro! Awu karega, Mare Barrabás! (Barrabasre ia iwogu kigodurewu, boe ewidowu epa rema). 

Jesus bitodu rumode. 1Kodi icare Pilatore boe edo boe to Jesus biri kajeje. 2Utorigaraidogere ia boto jerigigarewu udo nono boe etaogajejewu reoredu ere tugu aoto, ere aroia kujagurewu tugu ji. 3Ere tuburedo ji, egore ji Akireo! Judeudoge eimejera! Oino tui tugera to to jeji dutabo. 4Icare Pilatore tuiebu pugeje, akore judeudogei Ica, imode arego woe baawadu kae tagai, duma taerduwo iordukai ia ro pegarewu boe jituji. 5Du keje icare Jesus ure tuiebu boto jerigigarewu kogui taogajeje dutabo. Icare Pilato akore Cewu imedu reo. 6Icare baire eimejerage mare utorigaraidoge, tuiordui jitu keje, enoiogwarigodure, egore Nowu bu i padui pugajejedu keje, nowu bu i padui pugajejedu keje. Icare Pilato akore ei Tagi tageragu ji, bu i padui pugajejedu keje, iordukare ia ro pegarewu jitu kodi. 7Icare judeudoge egore ji Ia ceroiare dukoiare awu bitodu rumode, mare paga karega akore Aroe Eimejera Onaregeduie ure pudumi du kodi. 8Kodi icare nowu egoinodu ure Pilato pagudugo. 9Ure turemo pugeje nowu brae eimejera tumuga kae, unoragodure Jesus ji, akore ji Kaibawuba ure aki? Mare Jesus makokare ji. 1 Kodi icare Pilato akore ji Amagomodukare ii? Aerduwakare ie irugadu iwo akinorudo iarema iwo aporu bu i padui pugajejedu keje? 1 Icare Jesus akore Aro rakarewu umodukare ii, makudukai akai baru piji dukeje. Kodire ure imagu akaiwu ro pega kodure aro pega kori. 1 Nowu otobijire icare Pilato jemarure tuwo inorudo. Mare judeudoge enoiogwarire tagoi oino dutabo: - Amode inorudo ma, kode brae eimejera kurirewu César metuia karega ure aki, mare paga karega, cewu ure boe eimejerado pudumiwu ona nure Cesar ji. 1 Tumeardui nowu egoinodu jitu keje, Pilatore tuiebu Jesus apo, ure tumugudo brae eiemejera muga keje; nowu muga iere Pariri (hebreudoge ewadaru tabo iere Gabata). 1 Nowu meriji ere tugera pemegado boeji Páscoa kae. Meri jeture baru oiadoda. Icare Pilato akore judeudogei Ca, tagimejera reo! 1 Mare ere iogwarido, egore Toro apo! Toro apo! Bu i padui pugajejedu keje. Icare Pilato unorare ei: - Imode tagimejera bu i padui pugajejedu keje? Icare baire eiemejerage egore Ia cegimejerakare ia toro pugeje, mare César tu rugadu. 1 Du keje icare Pilato ure maku etai, ewo bu i padui pugajedu keje rugadu. 
Ere Jesus bu i padui pugajejedu keje. 1 Du keje icare ere Jesus reko pudabo. Ema taobijire ure i padui pugajejedu reko bakurirewu piji jice ia iere Calvário ceboe kae (Hebreudoge ewadaru iere Gólgota, boe ewadaru tabo ure oino boe era jeta). 1 Nonore ere bu i padui pugajejedu keje. Iagere pobe apo ia okwacere kana pemegarewu jaogwai, ia okwacere kana koborewu jaogwai, Jesusre rakojere boiadoda. 1 Pilatore ia bapera atugo pemegado du ure bu aora bukajeje, nowu i padui pugajejedu keje, du akore oino Jesus Nazaré kejewu, Judeudoge Eimejera. 2 Makarewu judeudoge emagore nowu atugoji, paga karega, Jesus padure i padui pugajejedu keje puredu tu bakurireuji. 2 Icare judeudoge eno baire eimejerage egore Pilato ji Akaba atugodo Judeudoge Eimejera oino, mare Awu imedu akore judeudoge eimejeraie ure pudumi oino. 2 Mare Pilato akore ei Ire atugodoboe, atugododure. 2 Utorigaraidoge ere Jesus bu i padui pugajejedu keje, icare ere tugeragu ukudaeji ere kado pobe puibiji, megawo mito tu tu pudai. Mare nowu ukudae kujiagiwu maegodu nure, kamidukare. 2 Du kodi icare egore pui Pamodukare bowuje, mare pamode pageragudu caido tabo, paerduwo ioguduba onagodumode jiwu bogai. Awu inodu tabore ure nono bapera atugo reore ere ikudae pedo pui, ikudae kujiagiwure ere tugeragu caireboedo tabo. . Oinore utorigaraidoge erore. 

Jesus uce. 2 Puredu tu Jesus o i padui pugajeje duji, uce rakojere, uce uwie iei Maria cedu, cewu Cleofas oreduje, rakojere nono jamedu, Maria Madalena apo. 2 Icare Jesus, tuiordui tuje jitu keje, cewu meardu kurire jiwu ture jorduwadowu rakojei nono duji jamedu dukeje, akore tujeji Aredu, akonaregedu reo. 2 Du kejere akore nowu ture jorduwadowuji Ica, Ace reo. Nowu inodu otobiji nowu ure jorduwadowu ure uce reko pudabo tuwai kae. 

Jesus biredu. 2 Icare Jesus, tuiorduwai boe jamedu boe ui turugadu dukeje, uwo nono bapera atugo jamedu reore, akore Pobo boire ii. 2 Ia ruwobo mugure nono, pobo pagodurewu tabo, icare utorigaraidogere boe otogugudu tugu nowu pobo pagodureuto, ere boe otogugudu bu ia ipo oto keje, ere raido okwa kae. 3 Jesus tugudui nowu pobo pagodureuce dukeje akore Icare boe jamedu boere turugadu. Icare ure tuie jodo, icare akurure. 
Ia utorigarairewu ure Jesus mo porodo meriri otoboarewu tabo. 3 Judeudoge epagudure, eedumode nowu i padui pugajejedu keje Sábado meri jituji, paga karega, enure tugera pamegado petaji, du kodire cewu sabadore jiwu meri motu rakaguragamode. Kodi icare enogwamagudure Pilato ji, uwo edo epogora ra kado, ewo erodo oino nowu piji. 3 Utorigaraidoge etaregodure, ere cewuge ei pobedu epadure i keje apodu, ere epogora kado. 3 Mare etaregodui Jesus ae dukeje, eerdure bie marigudu duji, du kodire ekare pogora ra kado. 3 Mare ia utorigarairewu ure ia meriri otoboarewu bu jura otogajeje uwabo kae. Kuri je kure ceredo pobo tabo. 3 Jordure awu inodu jiwu ureadodure awu inoduji tameartoruwo.
