Ceerduware makoi boe riki jituji. 3 Awu inodu ure nono bapera atugo reore ia ra boe kadodumodukare. 3 Nowu bapera atugo akore ia toro jamedu boe etaiwomode cewu meriri otoboarewu padure kajejewuji... 3 Nowu inodu rekodaji, José Arimatéia kejewu, ia Jesusre jorduwadowu, mare podu tabo tubagudu koia judeudogece, okwamagudure Pilato ji uwo boedo Jesus rawuje i padui pugajejedu piji. Icare Pilatore udo ino rugadu. Icare uture, ure Jesus rawuje i piji. 3 Nicodemo kodure apo (cewu makore Jesus ji boecoji ia boe kejedu kodiwu). Ere ia roreboe jirirewu reko pudabo. 4 Ere tugeragu Jesus ji, ere nowu roreboe jirirewu tugu nowu aroiato dure ere upodo apo, nono judeudoge ero magai tui pu tugu mototo du reore. 4 Cewu Jesus birewo kejere ia okureboe pa mugure, nowu okureboe pa tada ia boe emedumodewo maiwu mugure, mare iaboe iaboe emedukare tada roga. 4 Du kodi icare ere Jesus tugu nono, paga karega, judeudoge enure tugera pemegado Páscoa jitu kodi, nowu meta mugu puredure nono jamedu kodi. 

Jesus meturewo biororedu. 1Kodure Sábado rekodaji boetojiwu meriji, Maria Madalena uture meturewo kae, kuri barogwa kododu tabo, boe guguco kimo tabo. Boekarema, jordure tori kurirewu padukai meturewo je keje duji. 2Rekodure tuibagi, uture Simão Pedro ae, mare cewu Jesus meardu kurire jiwu ure jorduwadowu ae, akore ei Ere Pagimejera tawuje tumedurewo piji, ceerduwakare kaiba ere bu. 3Kodi icare Pedro mare cewu ure jorduwadowu ere tudawuje, eture meturewo kae. 4Eregodure puapo, mare nowu ia ure jorduwadowu rekodure Pedro kori, aregodure boetoji meturewo kae. 5Ure tuie jodo jice, jordure aroiadogei moto keje, mare ukare turemo. 6Simão Pedro, kodure rekodajidu, aregodure, ure turemo nowu meturewoto, jordure aroiadogei moto keje. 7Jordure padure aora kejewu aroia kigadureuji, mare awu padukare nowu ia aroiadoge ebo: boere opodo tuginoi tu je. 8Du kodi icare cewu aregodure boetojiwu ia ure jorduwadowu ure turemo jamedu nowu metato. Jordure, icare meartorure. 9Boe jokodure ekare bapera atugo akoi oinoie Jesus jewodumoduie bireuge epijidu pawuje roga. 1 Kodi icare nowu ure jorduwadowuge ere tugirimi tuwai kae. 
Jesus ui towadudo Maria Madalena jekaidu. 1 Nowu inodu boe tada, Maria rakojere baawadu keje, puredu tu nowu meturewoji toragudu tabo. Du tabore icare ure tuie jodo taiwowo meturewoto. 1 Du tabore icare jordure tupadogei pobe duji: ekudae kigadure, emugure padurewo okwa keje, ia mugure ao keje, ia mugure bure keje. 1 Duwugere enoragodure ji: - Aredu, kodiba akoragudure? Akore ei Paga karega, boere ikimejera reko mare iorduwakare kaiba ere bu. 1 Nowu tagoino dutabo ure tugirimi tuibagi, jordure Jesus rakojei nono duji, mare jorduwakare ji. 1 Icare Jesus akore ji Aredu, kodiba akoragudure? Meardaere nowu jeture okureboe jiwu rakuduie akoino, kodi dukeje akore ji Ikimejera, akimode are akeragu ji dukeje, iwie kaiba are bu, icare itumode bogai. 1 Icare Jesus akore ji Maria! Tui tugirimi bai jaogwai dutabo, ure tumago rakado, akore hebreudoge ewadaru tabo, akore Rabboni! (Boe ewadaru tabo ure oino Ikimejera! Oino). 1 Jesus akore ji Akera jetu kaba ii, mare paga karega, irudukare Ioga ae roga, mare toro iwiemage etae, amagodo ei irudumode Ioga ae, Tao ae, ino Aroe Eimejera ae, tago Aroe Eimejera ae. 1 Icare Maria Madalena rekodure nowu ure jorduwadowuge etae tuwo ewie tuiorduie Pagimejera jituji. 

Jesus ui towadudo ture jorduwadowuge eegaidu. 1 Nowu meri rekodu tabo, duwure semana o meri boetojiwu rema, nowu ure jorduwadowuge ere baiporo mi pudui tuieduwo nowu bai tada, tubagudu koia judeudogece. Du kaere icare Jesus aregodure, ure turagojedo tu etoiadoda, akore ei Boe butugurewu muguwo tagabo. 2 Tagoi oino dukeje, ure eerdudo tugeraji, ure eerdudo tawubowuji. Icare nowu ure jorduwadowuge eegare kuricigore tuiordui tugimejera jitu keje. 2 Icare akore ei Boe butugurewu muguwo tagabo. Ioga magai irojai du reorere, inure tarojai jamedu. 2 Icare ure togwamu ei, akore ei Aroe Pemegarewu makudure tagai. 2 Tamode ro pegareuge ero pegarewu butugugo dukeje, butugugodaereboe umode ei. Tamodukare ero pegarewu butugugo ma, butugugodaereboe umodukare ei jamedu. 2 Ia ure jorduwadowu iere Tomé cedu, metukare etada nowu Jesus aregodu keje. 2 Icare nowu metage egore ji Ceerdure Pagimejera ji. Ure kirimi pai ei, akore Iordumodukare meriri oiaji ierato ma, imodukare ikerako tugu meriri oioato ma, imodukare ikera tugu mo awubouto ma, imeartorumodukare. 2 Meri ikera awubodure pobe ma awu metuia bokware taci ikera awubowuto durekodaji, nowu ure jorduwadowuge eedure nowu tuieda mitodu keje pugeje, dutabore icare Tomé rakojere etada. Baiporo miture ei dutabore Jesus aregodure, ure turagojedo etoiadoda, akore ei Boe butugurewu muguwo tagabo. 2 Du kejere icare makore Tomé ji, akore ji Mato, akerako bu woe, akaiwodo ikeraji, akera raido awo tugu imo awubowuto. Ameartoru bokwa kaba, ameartorudo. 2 Icare Tomé akore ji Ikimejera, ino Aroe Eimejera. 2 Icare Jesus akore ji Ameartorure aerdure ii dukoia. Pemega remawugere emeartorumode tuiordukai ii dutabo. 3 Jesus ure ia turo kurirewu makarewu towuje nowu ture jorduwadowuge eegai kimo, du padukare awu bapera keje. 3 Mare awuge epadure bapera keje, du koiawo tameartorure Cristo Aroe Eimejera Onaregeduie Jesusce duji, duma jereboe jetuwo tagabo ie koia, tameartorui ji dutabo. 

Jesus ui towadudo Tiberades kejewu kuruga kurirewu okwaidu. 1Nowu inodu rekodajire icare, Jesus ure towadudo pugeje, nowu ture jorduwadowuge eegai, puredu tu kuruga kurirewu iere Tiberades ceduji. Ure towadudo oino dutabo: 2Simão Pedro mare Tomé iere Dídimo cedu, mare Natanael, cewu Galiléia tadawu Caná kejewu, mare Zebedeu ore, mare ia ure jorduwadowuge ei pobedu, eedure tu puapo. 3Simão Pedro makore nowu tumedagei, akore Iwoguwo. Egore ji Cedumode akabo jamedu. Icare eture. Ere taredo ikato. Mare nowu boecoji ekare tugeragu iaboeji iaboeji. 4Barogwa kododure tu je dutabore, Jesus rakojere nowu kuruga kurirewu okwai. Mare nowu ure jorduwadowuge ekare pawuje. 5Icare Jesus onoragodure ei: - Itore kugure, ia tage karo rogukare tu tagabo iwo kowuje? Egore. - Boro. 6Icare akore ei Tawuge barigu nowu tago ika ukana pemegarewu jaogwai, du taerdumode ji. Icare ere barigu. Du kejere icare ero rakakare tuwo tumugudo keje, kare emagaguragare tada kodi. 7Du kodi icare cewu Jesus meardu kuricigore jiwu ia ure jorduwadowu makore Pedro ji, akore Cewu Pagimejera rabodu! Simão Pedro, tumeardui Pagimejera raboduie dukeje, ure tugudae kogudo tugajeje (Paga karega, biri kedore du je du kodi), ure taredo taci poboto. 8Metage ekodure mato ika tabo, tui tumugudo buke keje kare ebo dutabo (mare paga karega, eedu jaekare motoji). 9Tui taredo ika piji dukeje, eerdure ia jorui turugadu duji, ia karo padui joradu keje duji, ia amirewu tabo duji. 1 Jesus akore ei Tare tageragu jiwu ia kare erego mato. 1 Icare Simão Pedro ruture ikato ure tumugudo mato buke keje, kare kurireuge makareuge ebo boeki kae. Nowu kare kurireuge emagai inodu, buke ukare tubowuje ebo. 1 Icare Jesus akore ei Mato, tagogwagewo. Nowu ure jorduwadowuge ia emage ekidakare tunorawo ji: - Ioguduba akibao? Inodu bogai, mare paga karega, eerduware tugimejeraie ure ema kodi. 1 Icare Jesus ure tuburedo mato, ure tugeragu amireuji, ure maku etai. Du reorere ure cewu karo kodu ure maku etai jamedu. 1 Awure Jesus ui towadudo pobe ma jewu metuia bokware tuiewodu rekodaji nowu ture jorduwadowuge eegai du rema. 1 Nowu enogwage akedu kejere icare, Jesus unoragodure Simão Pedro ji, akore ji Simão, João onaregedu, ameardu kurire ii awuge ekori? Akore U! Ikimejera, aerduware imeardu kuricigoi ai duji. Icare Jesus akore ji Aetudo inagu cordeirodogei. 1 Unoragodure ji pugeje, akore ji Simão, João onaregedu, amearudu kurire ii? Akore ji U! Ikimejera, aerduware imearudu kuricigoi ai duji. Jesus akore ji Aetudo inagu cordeirodogei. 1 Unoragodure ji pugeje pobe ma jewu metuia bokware, akore Simão, João onaregedu, amearudu kurire ii? Icare Pedro kiarigodu buture keje tu je. Mare paga karega, unoragodure ji tagoi: - Ameardu kurire ii? Oino pobe ma jewu metuia bokware, dukoia. Icare akore ji Ikimejera, aerduware boe jameduji, aerduware imearudu kuricigoi ai duji. Icare Jesus akore ji Aetudo inagu ovelhadogei. 1 Boe jokodu jire inagomode oino ai: iparedu kimoi aki dutabo, are apeagajejewu bukigu kogudo akudae kajeje, ature akaidurewo boe kae. Mare akaregodumode kuridogedui aki du kae dukeje, amode akera raido, iaboe emode apeagajejewu kogudo, emode arego akaidukarewo kae. 1 Nowu tagoino dutabo, ure bie kakoduwu tuwi taboba umode Pao kurido duji. Tumagoi inodu jitu rekodaji, akore ji pugeje Akodudo itabo. 2 Pedro, tui tumegido pai tuibagi dutabo, jordure cewu Jesusre jorduwadowu, cewu mearudu kurire jiwuji (cewu ure taora bu mo keje, cewu enogwage boigoduwu du kodiwu keje, du unoragodure ji: - Ikimejera, ioguduba koiaba umode amagu? Oino jiwuji). 2 Icare, tuiordui jitu keje, Pedro unoragodure Jesus ji akore Ikimejera, awu, inoba boemode ji? 2 Jesus akore ji Itaidumode rakojewo jii ii ikirimi du kae ma, akaiboe karega. Aki akodudo itabo. 2 Kodi icare bakaru merekereure taodo nowu ure jorduwadowuge ekao, cewu ure jorduwadowu bimodukae. Mare Jesus akokare: - bimodukare, ino, mare: - Itaidumode rakojewo jii ii ikirimi du kae, akaiboe karega. Oino. 
Bapera ao. 2 Awu cewu ure jorduwadowu rema, dure readodure awu boe jamedu boeji, ure bu bapera keje jamedu. Paerduware readodure jiboe boe jokoduie duji. 2 Jesus ure ia boe makarewu towuje kimo. Bapera atugododumode jamedu boeji ma, imeardaere awu moto jamedu boe umodukae turugadu bapera atugododumode tabodu jituji. 

Boe paru. 1Imeduia Teófilo, nowu boetojiwu ino bapera keje, ire Jesus rore jiboe jamedu boe, ure boe eerduwado jiboe jamedu boe, bu, 2jii paru piji jii ruture baruto du kae, tui to apostolodoge eerduwado Aroe Pemegarewu koia dukeje. 3Ica, ure tuiwodo durekodaji icare ure towadudo tuie tabo to apostolodoge eegai, tui eerduwadodu makaguragado dutabo. Merire ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure du tonajire ure towadudo eegai, tumagoi Pao baru tadawu o boe pemegareuji ewiegai dutabo. 
Jesus rutui baru todu. 4Nowu boigoduwu togwagei ebodu keje, makore ei ekawo tuiaedo Jerusalém piji, mare epagawo nono jii Tuo makore jiboe ui tudowuje du kae, - du jire tameardure iiabiji. Oinore akore. - 5Paga karega, João ure boe etaimo pobo tabo, tagirema, tagao pegododumode Aroe Pemegarewu tabo oino maigodu. 6Emagerema, tui tudo pui dutabore, enorare ji, egore Cegimejera, oino maigodu kana amode Israeldoge eeda pemegado pugeje? Akore ei 7Piji, ukare turugadu taerduwawo Pao ure biado pudabo boeji. 8Mare ica, Aroe Pemegarewu umode turawuje tawugeje, umode tabewudo, dukoiare tamagomode iiboeji Jerusalém tada, Samaria o moto jamedu keje, jii moto okwa kae toro. 9Akoinodu tonajire icare ruture baruto eegai, icare okware pi tuku eeku piji boetugu tada. 1 Etaiwore ji du tonajire icare ime ei pobedu, ekudae kigadure eidu, ere towadudo eegai, egore ei 1 Galiléia pijiwu ime, kodiba tagaiwore baruto tu oino tamugui? Ica, awu Jesus arudure tabiji barutowu, umode turawuje tuibagi pugeje, umagai taerdure rutui barutodu jitu du reore pugeje. 
1 Du kejere icare ere tugirimi Jerusalemto, cewu mugu puredure tu Jerusalemji boe aoporu iei Oliveira cedu piji, jae karega, ure nono Sábado jiwu awara tu je. 1 Ere turemo cewu togwagere Jesus apo tadawu baito, erudure toro bai cobojewuto, cewu emugu emugure tadawuto. Emagereo Pedro, João, Tiago, André, Filipe, Tomé, Bartolomeu, Mateus, Tiago (cewu Alfeu onaregedu), Simão (cewu Zelota), mare Judas (nowu Tiago onaregedu). 1 Emugure tuiamedu tabo tumagoi baruto dutabo; ia areme emugure ebo jamedu, duwuge etoiado Jesus uce Maria rema; Jesus uwiemage emugure ebo jamedu. 
Ere Matias tawuje muguwo Judas mugato. 1 Icá emugui nono dukeje, ia meri keje, Pedrore turagojedo tuwiemage etada, ere nono 1, icare akore ei 1 Iwiemage, umode turugadu uwo nono Aroe Pemegareure Davi makodo cewu uture ure tugeragu Jesus jiwuge etododaiwu iei Judas cedu jiboere. 1 Emare remagudure apostolodoge cedoda, maragodure cedabo jamedu. 1 Awu imedu ure moto aru turo pegarewu mori tabo. Du kejere icare buture togea tabo, icare ure tuwo toiagi, icare peguru kubiri jamedure tuwowuje jamedu. 1 Awu inodu akaru ure taodo Jerusalém kejewuge ewiegai, dukoiare cewu moto iere Acéldama, oino ewadaru tabo, du jire boe egore Boe Eku Pa, oino ji. Paga karega, judeudoge ekeroia epa bapera kejere atugododure oino uwai bioromode, boe emugumodukare tada. Ia pugeje atugododure oino pugeje ia tuginoiwu muguwo mugato. 2 Du kodi icare umode turugadu, mugure pagabo Pagimejera Jesus Cristo rakojei padodadu tonaji jii João o boe etao pegododu piji jii arudui pabiji jiwu meri kaewu ime, 2 ia etada mitotu jewu readoduwo cedabo Jesus jewodui tuwi piji duji. 2 Icare ere etawuje pobe, duwugere José iei Barsabá cedu, iei Jetororewu cedu, mare Matias remage. 2 Icare emagore Pao ji eparu tabo, egore Pao Aroe Eimejera, akire aerduware boe ewabo jameduji, kode, ceerduwado awuge ei pobedu kakoduwu bogaiba amagore, 2 muguwo Judas mugato awu cemaragodae keje, paga karega, cewure ure tuwarigu tuduwo ia tuieda kae. 2 Icare ere tuiwa aidugirireboe barigu, dukoiare ere tugeragu Matias ji duwure icare metagere apostolodogece. 

Aroe Pemegarewu aregodu. 1Judeudoge ia eno peta iei Pentecoste cedu o meriji, nowu Jesusre jorduwadowuge emugure tuiamedu tabo nowu bai mitodu tada. 2Du kejere icare ia biaruru aregodure pi tuku, umagai ia bakuru rakarewu aregodu reore, duwure nowu emugure tadawu bai korobadudo tu. 3Du keje icare ia ure nono boe ekeru reoreboe jorugu ure tumaedo eiogi tu tu ewugeje. 4Icare Aroe Pemegarewu ure turemo eto, ure ewabo, etaora korawu pudabo. Du kodi icare emagore ia boe tuginoiwuge ewadaruji, emagore nono Aroe Pemegareui emago emago du reore. 5Nowu du kodi, aidure tumagowo Pao jiwu ia judeudoge makareuge, duwugere etaregodure ia moto tuginoiwuge eiamedu boe piji, eedure Jerusalém bakurirewu tada. 6Icare tumeardui nowu biaruru jitu kejere icare, ia boe makareuge ere tudo pui nono, eebogodure ei, paga karega, eiamedu biapagare emagoi tuwadaru tabo duji. 7Ere tumeardu awadudo pudui, eeku kidugodure, egore Galiléia kejewuge karega egoino? 8Kode, kodiba paiamedu tabore pameardure egoi pawadaru tabo duji? 9Parto pijiwuge, Média pijiwuge, Elam pijiwuge, Mesopotâmia pijiwuge, Capadócia, Ponto, Asia pijiwuge, 1 Frígia pijiwuge, Egito pijiwuge, Líbia mugui puredu tu Cirene ji o moto pijiwuge, Roma pijiwu awarareuge, 1 Judeudoge, judeudoge ere jorduwadowuge, Creta pijiwuge, Arábia pijiwuge, paiamedu tabore pameardure ereadodui pawadaru tabo Pao o boe pemegarewu kurirewu jituji. 1 Du kodi icare eiamedu matadure, eerduwakare inoba tumeardaemode duji, enora enorare pui: - Kabobao? 1 Iagerema egore Eiamedu etaora bai baire parera kuru kori koia. Ino tumago pegai ei dutabo. 
Pedro uwadodae. 1 Du keje icare Pedrore turagojedo tumedage ebo, icare makore tumago raka tabo, akore Judéia kejewu ime, Jerusalém tadawu taiamedu boe, tawiapagado iwadaruji, taerduwado. 1 Tameardaere awuge etaora bai baie, mare etaora bai bai karega ure. Tagado, meri rekare boe kao roga. 1 Mare profeta Joel makore jiboere tudowuje oino. 1 Pao koiare ure nowu profeta akodo oino ica, meri boiwu kejere imode Itaroe Pemegarewu maedo boe eiamedu joki. Tagore ime, tagore areme emagomode iwadaruji. Tagore ipare eerdumode Aroei, taopegamage enuiaomode jamedu. 1 Nowu meriji imode Itaroe Pemegarewu maedo itugare ime eiogi, du kodi icare emagomode iwadaruji. 1 Imode iro rakarewu udo tuguo coboje baru tada, imode iro rakarewu udo tuguo cebegi moto keje. Boe eku umode tumaedo, joru umode tumaedo, jeredudu umode tumaedo. 2 Meri joku okwamode, ari umode nono boe eku reore, cewu Pao o meri kuricigorewu aregodumodedu otodai. 2 Du keje icare makomode Pao bogaiwu jamedu boe umode cinorudo, umode tubemegado. - 2 Tawiapagado mato iwadaruji, Israeldoge nowu Jesus Nazaré kejewu, Pao jore keje taegai turo rakarewu tabo, tui udo turo rakarewu towuje tagoiadoda dutabo. Tagire taerduware ro oino duji. 2 Emare makududodure uwo nono Pao aidure, jorduware. Du kejere tare bito, tare ia moto tuginoiwu pijiwu ime edo bu i padui pugajejedu keje. 2 Mare Paore jewodudo, ure boe ekera kogure tabowu boe ewi kado, paga karega, boe ewi jetumodukare jii pudabo kodi. 2 Ica, profeta Davi makore jiboe reo iordure Aroe Eimejera ji jii je itododai, paga karega, rakojere ikana pemegarewu jaogwai, imegikawo jice woje, jice woje. 2 Du koiare iwabo jekarere, ikerure tojarodo pudui, ikodu umode tamudo, tubaga tabo boe pemegarewu bogai dutabo. 2 Paga karega, amodukare akera ra ipiji bireuge eeda keje, amodukare akonaregedu kodu kodu pegado. 2 Are jereboe kaewu awara iorduwado ji, amode iegaredo du kuricigodo, imugui aegai dutabo (Sl 1, -). 2 Iwiemage, imode awadudo tawiegai paedoga Davi bire, tugudure mototo, jaore mugure padoda jii awu meri kae. 3 Mare profeta nure ema, du kodire jorduware Pao akoe pudui ia tuwagedu mugumode tumuga keje duji. 3 Tuiorduwai oinoie boemode du kodire Cristo jewodumode duji, akore pijidodukare bireuge eeda keje, kodu pegadodukare. 3 Paore awu Jesus jewodudo, awu inodu jire ceerduware, cereadodure. 3 Paore akaru kurido turo rakarewu tabo, ure Aroe Pemegarewu makai, du ure udo tumaedo boe eiogi. Oinodu jire taerdure, tameardure oino. 3 Paga karega, Davi mitodu rutukare baruto, mare du inodu tabore akore Pagimejera akore Pagimejera ji amugudo ikana pemegarewu jaogwai, 3 Jii imode onare aiwuge ewu awure kuda du kae. 3 Du kodi icare Israeldoge taiamedu, taerduwa remawudo, awu Jesus tare bu i padui pugajejedu kejewu ema, jire Paore boe eimejerado, ure Cristodo ema duji. 
Meartorure boetojiwuge. 3 Tumeardui oinodu jitu keje, ekiarigodure tuwabo tada, enoragodure Pedro ji mare ia apostolodogei, egore Cemanamage, kode, inoba ceromode? 3 Icare Pedro akore ei Tameartorudo, tae jodo taro pegarewu piji, tai mito tu tu jedu tagao pegodo Jesus Cristo ie tabo ma, taro pegarewu okwawo, dukejere Aroe Pemegarewu makudumode tagai. 3 Paga karega, Pao akore tumoduie maku boe etaiboe pemegarewu makudumode tagai, tagore etai, meardure Pao makore jiboe jiwuge etai jamedu. 4 Pedro mako kuricigore iaboeji kimo, okituwai ei oino dutabo: - Taginorudo awu boe pegareuge epiji. 4 Icare meartorure bataru jiwuge etao pegododure. Du kodi icare, meartorureuge ere 3. 0 bega bega tu je nowu meriji. 
Meartorure boetojiwuge ero pemegarewu. 4 Ere tumeartorudo apostolodoge ere boe eerduwado jiboeji, tumeardu kurii pui dutabo, togwagei baru tadawu boe eke pemegarewu jitu tabo, tumagoi Pao jitu tabo. 4 Epagudu kuricigore, mare paga karega, apostolodoge ere turo kurirewu awadudo nowu Jerusalém tada, dukoiare eiamedu boe epagudu rakaguragare. 4 Meartorureuge eiamedu boe eiore puwugeje, enoroere toroece puapo. 4 Ere to moto, toroe jamedu, ere maku, ere pedu puiamedu ai tu tu je. 4 Emeardu kurire pui, etu eture Pao uwaito meri jameduji. Ere amirewu kado oiado tuwai tada, enogwagere ji tuiegare tabo, tuwabo jetororewu tabo. 4 Ere Pao ocaro ocarodo. Ere boe eiamedu aidu aidudo pudui. Paore iage eto eto pui etae, duwugere etaidure tuwo tubemegado. 

Ia imedu pogora pegarewu pemegagodure. 1Pedro mare João erudu nure Pao uwai kae togwamaguduwo ji meri jogodu tabo. 2Du tabore icare boere ia pogora pegare jii tuwodu tabowu imedu reko mato, dure ere mugu mugudo Pao uwaiporo iere moturewu cedu paru, meri jameduji. 3Icare nowu imedu, tuiordui Pedro ji, João ji, ei turemo Pao uwaito dukeje, makore ei eno mea bogai. 4Icare Pedrore tuioku kidudo ji, João jamedu ure tuioku kidudo ji, icare Pedro akore ji Akaiwodo cei. 5Aiwore ei tu je, tubaga tabo ia eno mea bogai. 6Boekarema, Padro akore ji Ino meriri bokwa, mare imode mugure itaboboe maku akai. Nazaré pijiwu Jesus Cristo ie tabo, aragojedo, amerudo! 7Icare ure tugera kogudo iera kajeje, dutabore ure rakojedo. Du keje kuri je, bure, bureraparure turagoje rakado, ure taredo coboje, icare merure. 8Ure turemo Pao uwaito, tumerui, turerui, tui Pao ocarodo dutabo. 9Eiamedu boe jordure meruji, jordure ui Pao ocarodo duji. 1 Eerduware nowu mugu mugure Pao uwai poro moturewu paru tumagoi boe eno mea bogaiwu mitodu raboduie ure duji. Du kodi icare epagudu kuricigore nowu ure tudowuje jiboe kodi. 1 Nowu imedu mugu puredure Pedro, João magei, du kodire jordu paga pagawu ia boe makareuge ere tudo pui etae, nowu baiporo kurirewu iei Salomão cedu kae. 1 Du kodi icare Pedro makore boe ji, akore Israeldoge ime, kodiba taebogodure oino? Kodiba taeku kidu barikare cei, uwo nono ceigoiaie cere awu imedu merudo du kodiwore? 1 Abraão o Aroe Eimejera, Isaac o Aroe Eimejera, Jacó o Aroe Eimejera, paedogamage eno Aroe Eimejera ure tonaregedu Jesus kurido, dure tare maku, dure tare pijido brae eimejera Pilato jekai, aidure tuwo inorudo, kodi karega. 1 Tagirema, tare imedu pemegarewu pijido, tamagoi ia imeceba remawu imedu bogai dutabo. 1 Tare ure boe eiamedu boe botudowu bito, du Paore jewodudo bireuge epiji pugeje, awu inodu jire ceerduware, jire cereadodure. 1 Cemeartorure ie jitu dukoiare, ie mitodu koiare ure awu taerdure jiwu, taerduware jiwu imedudo turagojedo. Meartorure Jesus jitu dukoiare ure tubemega remawudo taiamedu jekai. 1 Oinore icare, imanamage, iwiemage, iorduware, taerduwakare du koiaie tarore oino, tagimejeragere oinono jamedu. 1 Mare oinodu tabore Paore, makore profetadoge eiabiji turomode jiboe towuje tonaregedu Cristo umoduie tuiwodo. 1 Du kodi icare tagiarigo taro pegareuji, tameardae pemegado ma, taro pegarewu okwawo. 2 Du inodu tabore boe pemegarewu, boe butugurewu umode tuburedo tai, Pao koia, icare umode makudumode tagaiwu Jesus Cristo rojai tagae. 2 Mare umode turugadu muguwo baru tada jii, moto, baru jamedu boe umode tubemegado du kae, uwo nono Pao makore profetadoge eiabiji, awu moto paru piji. 2 Boekare, Moisés makore marigudu, akore Pao Aroe Eimejera umode ia profeta ure nono ireorewu kuo tamanamage etoiabiji, dure tameardumode bataru jameduji. 2 Biapagamodukare awu profeta bataru jiuge eiamedu boe ewogwamode pi tuku boe epiji. 2 Profetadoge eiamedu boe ereadodure nowu inoduji jii Samuel piji jii awu meri kae. 2 Profetadoge etorere tagi. Paore tuwadaru maku taomage etai, tagai jamedu, cewu makore Abraão jitu awagedu koiare umode awu moto kejewu boe eiamedu boe eiwa aidugirido ma, taiameduwo taiaedo taro pegarewu piji. 2 Paore, tui Tonaregedu jewodudo dukeje, ure arego tagae boetoji, uwo taiwo aidugirido ma, taiamedu boewo taiaedo taro pegarewu piji. 

Boere Pedro, João mage etugu baicoreuto. 1Apostolodoge emagoi boe ji du tonajire icare, sacerdotedoge mare saduceudoge, mare Pao uwai tadawuge eimejera etaregodure. 2Ekorigodure ei, enure boe eerduwado kodi, emagore boe eewodumode Jesus ie tabodu jitu kodi. 3Icare ere tugeragu ei, ere tugu baicoreuto jii barogwa kododu kae, boeco puredugodu nure kodi. 4Mare meardure ewadaru jiwu ia makareuge emeartorure ei, du kodi icare meartorureuge ere 5. 0 bega bega tu je. 5Barogwatore icare, nowu boe eimejerage, nowu codudoge, nowu bapera epage, ere tudo pui nowu Jerusalém bakurirewu tada. 6Ere tudo pui nowu sacerdotedoge eimejera iei Anás cedu apo, Caifás, João, Alexandre mare sacerdotedoge eiamedu apo. 7Ere apostolodoge eragojedo toiadoda, enoragodure ei, agore Ioguduba ie taboba torore oinono? 8Icare Pedro, Aroe Pemegarewu metui tudada dutabore akore Boe eimejerage, paopegamage, tawiapagado mato iwadaruji: 9Awuji tanora nure cei awu kogodurewu bogai, ioguduba ie taboba pemegagodure du bogai. 1 Icá, taiamedu boe, mare Israeldoge eiamedu, taerduwado Jesus Cristo Nazaré pijiwu, cewu tare bu i padui pugajejedu kejewu, mare Paore jewodudo bireuge epijiwu, ie mitodu tabore awu imedu pemegagodure, rakojere taegai. 1 Tagire tare awu Jesus pijido ui nono ia ipo paga pagawu, mare ure turagojedo ure nono bai ipo remawu. 1 Iaboe iaboe koia karega boe emode tuginorudo, boe emode tubemegado, paga karega, awu baru kuda iaboe iaboe ekie makudukare ime etai du koiawo pabemegagodure, mare ie mitodu tabore umode pabemegado. 1 Tuiordui Pedro, João mage ekidagoduji dukoiare icare eebogodure, paga karega, eerduware jorduwakare bapera jiwugeie emageduji. Eerduware Jesus metageie emageduji. 1 Mare eerdui nowu imedu pemegadodurewu mugui ebodu jitu koiare, egoiwakare tumagowo ei. 1 Ere apostolodoge edo tudawuje nowu emugure tadawu bai piji, dukejere icare emagore pui. 1 Egore Inoba paromode awu imei? Paga karega, ero kurirewu akaru ure taodo Jerusalém tadawuge eiamedu joki, du kodire paroiwakare paerduwa bokwado ero oino duji. 1 Mare awu akaru ukawo taododu kuricigodo pugeje boe ekao, pamode epagududo emago kawo awu ie tabo iaboe ji iaboe ji awu otobiji pugeje. 1 Icare emagore ewogai, egore ei emago kawo, ekawo boe eerduwado awu Jesus ieji pugeje. 1 Icare Pedro mare João egore ewadaru jipagi Tamagodo ji ka kakoduwuba pemegamode Pao jekai: cemeartoruwo tawadaru ji, iarema cemeartoruwo Pao bataruji? 2 Ceroiwakare cemago kawo ceerdure jiboeji, cemeardure jiboeji. 2 Du kejere icare enogituware ei pugeje, icare ere tugera ra epiji, erorerumode eidu kodiboe bokware kodi, epagudugodure boece jamedu, paga karega, boe eiamedu boe ere Pao akaru pemegado nowu ure tudowuje du kodi. 2 Paga karega, cewu pemegadodurewu imedu o jorure kodure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogiduredu kori. 
Meartorureuge ere Pao kurido tuiordui apostolodegei pugeje dukoia. 2 Nowu apostolodoge ere tudawuje nowu piji, dukeje ere tugirimi tumanamage etae, ereadodure ewiegai cewu sacerdotedoge, boe codudoge, egore puduiboe jamedu boeji. 2 Tumeardui awu inodu jitu kejere icare, eiamedu boe ere tumago rakado Pao ji, egore Cegimejera, akire are awu baru to, are awu moto to, are mugure baru tadaboe, mugure moto kejeboe jamedu to. 2 Akire Akaroe Pemegarewu koiare akagore cewu Davi okwabiji kodiba padure pumekejewu boe ekodu kagirire pui? Kodiba boe emeardaere paga tu je, kodiba? 2 Awu moto kejewu boe eimejerage ere turagojedo, ere tudo pui tumago pegawo Pao ji, tumago pegawo o Cristo ji. 2 Paga karega, ica, Herodes, Pôncio Pilato, padure pumekejewu brae eiamedu boe mare Israeldoge ere tudo pui awu bakurirewu tada, etonare atugare pemegarewu Jesus ji, dure are boe eimejerado ema. 2 Mare du tabowo erore nono akaidure marigudu uwo tudowuje. 2 Du kodi icare, Cegimejera, akaiwodo ewadaru pegareuji, dukejere atugaregedo awadaru arego boe etae tubagudu bokwa tabo rugadu. 3 Akera raido boe ewugeje ma, boe ekogodae akeduwo, aro kurirewu, aro rakarewu awadudo, atugare pemegarewu Jesus ie tabo. 3 Awu enogwa kurirewu akedu keje kuri je, nowu ere tudo pui kejewu moto amagadure, eiamedure okorobadure Aroe Pemegarewu tabo, icare ereadodure Pao bataruji boe ewiegai, tubagudu bokwa tabo. 3 Meartorureuge eiamedu ure nono ia boe ewabo ui mito tu je du reore. Iaboe iaboe emagokare toroeie toroece, mare eiamedu boe boe eiamedu oroere. 3 Apostolodoge eragare, ekidare dutabore ereadodure Pagimejera Jesus jewoduji. Pao o boe pemegarewu awadure eiameduji. 3 Iaboe iaboe marenarukare emage, paga karega, o motoreuge eiamedu boe, uwaireuge eiamedu boe, ere maku, 3 ere mori arego mato, ere bu apostolodoge ewure paru, du pedodure eiamedu ai tu tu tuboi du reore. 3 Du reorere ia imedu iei José cedu (du apostolodogere iedo Barnabé, boe ewadaru tabo boe Eegareae epa), ia maragodure Pao uwai tadawu, Cipre moto pijiwu, o motore. 3 Icare ure maku, ure mori reko mato, ure bu apostolodoge ewure paru jamedu. 

Ananias mare Safira ero pegarewu. 1Ia imedu iei Ananias cedu, ure ia to moto maku, ure toreduje bie. 2Du kejere icare ure mori kado oiado, ia kobo mugure pudabo, toreduje aidui ji jamedu dutabo, ure ia kobo reko apostolodoge ewure paru kae. 3Mare Pedro akore ji Ananias, kodiba Aroe pegareure tuienado awaboji, dutabore awadararodure Aroe Pemegareuji? Du kodi icare awadararodure ako moto moriji. 4Umodukana turugadu amuguwo tabo, akai maku dukeje, iarema ai maku dukeje aroiwamodukare amuguwo mori tabo akaidui jitu keje? Kodiba ameardaere oinono awabo tada tu je? Ime ei karega, Pao jire awadararodure. 5Tumeardui nowu bataru jitu keje kuri je, cewu Ananias buture tuwi tabo tu je. Meardure awu inodu akaru jiwuge eiamedu boe epegudugodu kuricigore. 6Du kejere icare ia ipare ere birewu reko nowu piji toro baawadu kae, ere tugu mototo. 7Boe raikare dukeje, oredujere turemo jamedu, tuiorduwa bokwa tabo ure tudowuje duji. 8Icare Pedro unoragodure ji akore Aredu, amagodo iwiegai: tare tago moto maku awu inodu mori bogai? Akore U! Nowu inodu bogaire cere maku. 9Icare Pedro akore ji kodiba tare tawadaru maku puai tawo tarokogado Aroe Pemegareuji? Ica, ure akoredu tugu mototowuge ewure mugure jice baiporo keje, emode arego jamedu. 1 Kuri je nowu aredu buture bure paru, icare bire tu je. Du kejere icare cewu ipare ere turemo, eerdure bireduji, ere reko toro baawadu kae, ere tugu mototo tu oino toredu meki, 1 Nowu boe eiamedu boe epagudu kuricigore; meardure akaru jiwuge epagudu kuricigore jamedu. 
Apostolodoge ero kurirewu. 1 Du tabore icare apostolodoge ere turo kurirewu makaguragado boe etoiadoda, ere tudo tudo pui cewu baiporo kurirewu iei Salomão cedu keje. 1 Iage epagudure tuwo tuburedo ei, boerema emago pemegaguragare ei. 1 Meartorure Pagimejera jiwu ime areme emagagodure gu gu gu je. 1 Du tabore icare ere kogodureuge etarego awara kae, ere emugudo kugadoge etada, Pedro o boetugu butuwo iage etae, kodui nono dukeje. 1 Mugu puredure Jerusalém jiwu bakurireuge epijiwu ia boe makareuge etaregodure jamedu, ere kogodureuge erego mato, ere Aroe pegareuge emedure tadawu boe erego mato, icare epemegagodure. 
Braere apostolodoge etugu baicoreuto pugeje. 1 Du kejere icare sacerdotedoge eimejera mare okwacere jaogwaiwuge (duwugere saduceudogere emage), ere turagojedo tugori kuricigorewu tabo. 1 Ere tugeragu apostolodogei, ere etugu baicoreuto. 1 Boekimorema, Pao ia o tupa ure nowu baiporo jado boeco oia keje, ure eebu baawadu kae, akore ei Toro Pao uwai kae, tareadodudo boe etae bataru pemegareuji. 2 Tumeardui nowu bataru jitu tabore icare, ere turemo Pao uwaito, icare ere boe eerduwado. Du tonajire icere nowu sacerdotedoge eimejera mare okwacere tuiaogwaiwuge ere tudo pui, dukejere ere brae eiemejera kurireuge, mare codudoge eto pui, dukejere emagore apostolodoge ewogai, etuwo mato nowu baicorewu piji. 2 Icare nowu tugobaigarege eture toro. Boekarema, tui nowu baicorewu baiporo jado dutabore icare eerdukare ei, icare ere tugirimi tuibagi akaru tabo. 2 Egore Ceerdure baicorewu mitu pemegaji, tugobaigarege eedure baiporo keje, icare cere baiporo jado, mare ceerdukare boeji nowu bai tada. 2 Nowu akaru kejere icare, nowu sacerdotedoge eimejerage mare Pao uwai tadawuge eimejerage tori buture eiagi dugu dugu, enorare pui kaboba kodiba? 2 Boekarema, iage etaregodure akaru tabo, egore Cewu tare tugu baicorewu towu ime eedu nure toro Pao uwai tada, tui boe eerduwado dutabo. 2 Du kejere icare nowu Pao uwai kejewu tugobaigarege eimejera uture tudugarege ebo toro etae, ure erego mato, mare butugu tabo, epagudure boe emode tori to pudui dukoia. 2 Ere erego mato, ere eremo toro brae eimejerage kurireuge ere tudo puiwo kae. Du kejere sacerdotedoge eimejera unoragodure ei, akore 2 Cemago awadure tai takawo boe eerduwado cewu ie tabo. Du kodi karega, tare Jerusalém korawu tare boe erduwado jiboe tabo. Tagaidure tawo awu imedu ku butudo ceiogi? 2 Icare Pedro mare ia apostolodoge egore bataru jipagi Ure turugadu cemeartoruwo Pao ji ime ekori. 3 Ica, paomage eno Aroe Eimejera ure cewu tare bito tai bu i padui pugajejedu kejewu Jesus jewodudo. 3 Tugera pemegarewu tabore Pao ure rakojedo, ure boe eimejerado ema, ure boe einorudowudo ema, tuwo Israeldoge epemegado, tuwo ero pegarewu okwado. 3 Awu inodu jire ceerdure, jire cereadodure, cewu Paore maku meartorure jiwuge eiamedu boe etaiwu Aroe Pemegarewu koia. 3 Icare tumeardui nowu ewadaru jitu kejere icare nowu brae eiemejerage boe korire pudui, etaidure tuwo nowu apostolodoge ewido. 
Gamaliel mearudae. 3 Boekimorema, ia nowu brae eimejerage ui mito tu jedu, ia fariseu iei Gamaliel cedu, jorduwa rakarewu, boe eiamedu meartorure jiwu, ure turagojedo. 3 Makore boewo apostolodoge etawuje nowu piji biega tu je, dukejere akore tumedage ewiegai, akore Israeldoge ime, tameardae tugu, tameardae pemegado taromode awu ime eiwoji. 3 Tawiapagado: marigudu ia imedu iei Teuda cedu ure tuguwo tui tudo nono ia imedu kurirewu ureore dutabo. Ia ime ei puredu tu 4 0 cedu ere tudo pui ae. Mare bitodure, dukejere icare meartorure jiwuge eiamedu boe ere taodo, icare etagedure. 3 Awu rekodajire icare, Judas Galiléia pijiwu, ure turagojedo pugeje boere cie bu bapera kejedu kodiboe keje, ure tumugudo boe eiamedu boe keje toro pudabo, mare ema jamedu bire, du kodi icare uture rekodajiwuge eiamedu boe ere taodo boe paru kajeje, etagedure jamedu. 3 Oinore icare imode taerduwado taro pega kawo awu imei. Nowu ime epiji, etudo. Paga karega, etaidure jiboe, erore jiboe aregodure ime epiji ma, okwamode taobiji. 3 Mare aregodumode Pao piji ma, taroiwamodukare tawo okwado. Tamode tagonado Pao mitoduji. Icare emeartorure bataruji. 4 Emagore apostolodoge ewogai, ere boe edo iwara to ei. Du kejere icare emagore ei ekawo boe eerduwado Jesus ie tabo pugeje, icare ere tugera ra epiji, ere etudo. 4 Icare apostolodoge ere tudawuje nowu brae eimejerage ere tudo puiwo piji tuiegare tabo, mare ure turugadu brae eroreruwo pudui Jesus ie koiadu kodi. 4 Meri jameduji jii je ere boe eerduwa eerduwado Pao uwai tada, boe ewai tada jamedu. 
Diaconodoge. 1Nowu du kodi meartorureuge eidodu kuricigore, du kodire nowu Grécia o moto pijiwu ime emago pegagodure hebreudogei, paga karega, to okoge bokwarewu areme eredugodure, nowu ei toroe pedo pudui dukeje tu tu tu je. 2Du kodire icare nowu apostolodoge ei ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwurekotodu ere meartorureuge eto pui, egore ei Ukare turugadu cewo boe enoroe remagu, cei Pao bataru pijido dutabo. 3Du kodi icare, iwiemage, tamode ia ime pemegareuge, jorduwareuge, Aroe Pemegarewu jore kejewuge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowutodu, tamode etawuje tabiji, duwugere cemode awu maragodae maku etai. 4Cegirema, cenogwamagudumode Pao ji cereadodumode Pao bataruji. 5Du kodi, ere tawujewuge reo estêvão, ia meartoru kurirewu imedu, Aroe Pemegarewu jore kejewu; Filipe, Prócoro, Nicanor, Timon, Parmena, mare ia meartorurewu Antioquia pijiwu iei Nicolau cedu. 6Ere awuge erego apostolodoge etae, duwugere, togwamagudui Pao ji eparu tabodu tabore icare ere tugera bu ewugeje. 7Icare Pao bataru ure taododu kuricigodo, meartorure Pao bataru jiwuge emagagodu remawu nure nowu Jerusalém tada, nowu judeudoge eno sacerdotedoge makaguragareuge emeartorure jamedu. 
Diácono Estêvão. 8Cewu Estêvão, Pao o boe pemegarewu, ro rakarewu jore kejewu imedu, ure turo kurirewu towuje towuje boe etoiadoda. 9Boekimorema, ia boe keje, ia sinagoga tadawuge, duwuge ekiere libertodoge ia Cirene pijiwuge, Alexandria pijiwuge; Cilícia, Asia pijiwuge eno sinagoga tadawu ia emage ere turagojedo tumago pegawo Estevao ji. 1 Mare egoiwakare ji, jorduwa rakareure ema kodi, Aroe Pemegarewu jore keje kodi. 1 Du kodi icare ere ia ime ero pegado emagowo tumearduie mako pegai Moisés jituji, Pao jituji. 1 Icare ere boe eiamedu boe, codudoge, escribadoge, eiodo tuwadaru keje Estevao ji. Icare ere tugeragu ji, ere reko toro brae eimejerage etae. 1 Icare ere nowu batararodurewu ime erego mato, duwuge egore Awu imedu mako pega pegare Pao uwaiji, Moisésre boe eroiaguduji jamedu. 1 Cemeardure makoi oinoduji Jesus Nazaré pijiwu umoduie awu Pao uwai butudo, umoduie Moisere cerodo boe barigu puibagi. 1 Du kejere icare nowu brae eiemejerage eiamedu boe ere tuioku kidudo ji, etaiwore ji. Boekarema, je urugure nono ia Pao o tupare. 

Estêvão uwadodae. 1Icare sacerdotedoge eimejera unoragodure ji, akore Oino rugaduna? 2Akore ei: -Iwiemage, imanamage, iogamage, tawiapagado mato. Pao Aroe Eimejera ure towadudo paedoga Abraão jekai, mugure Mesopotâmia kimo dutabo, kodumode tumuguwo Hara keje duotodai. 3Akore ji atawuje ako moto piji, awobe epiji, atudo toro imode aerdudo jiwu moto kae. 4Icare ure tudawuje Caldéia moto piji, uture toro Hara moto kae, dupijire, uo okware dukeje, Pao Aroe Eimejera ure aru awu tumugure kejewu moto kae. 5Ukare ia moto makai o motoce rugadu, mare akore tumoduie makai, dukejere tumeduie maku ore etai, orekare roga dutabo. 6Pao akore ji mugumoduie ia moto tuginoiwu keje, toroie ia brae emode tudugaregedo emage, erorerumode ei, jorumode ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure du tonaji. 7Mare Pao akore oino jamedu Irorerumode rorerure eiwugei, dukejere etaregodumode nowu piji tumaragoduwo inai awu moto keje. 8Icare Paore tumeduiado Abraãoce, du kodire Abraão ure tuwiri kado, du kodire ure Isaac botudo, dukejere, merire ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto dukeje ure Isaac biri kado jamedu. Isaac ure tonaregedu Jacó biri kado jamedu, duwure tore ei ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwurekotodu ewiri kado jamedu, duwugere paedogamagere emage. 9Icare nowu Jacó ore ekorire tuwie José ji, du ere maku Egito kejewuge ekera kae. Mare Pao mugure apo. 1 Ure inorudo ucebae jamedu boe piji, ure jiwo aidugirido, ure jorduwa rakaguragaredu makai nowu Faraão, Egito kejewuge eimejera kurirewu jekai, duwu ure Egito kejewuge eimejerado ema, ure jetudo tuwai jameduji jamedu. 1 Du kejere boe eke boi kurireure Egito kejewugei, boe ere tuiwo kuricigodo. Paedogamage eerduwakare kaboba emode ko. 1 Mare Paedoga Jacó jorduware trigoie Egito keje duji, dukeje ure tore ekodudo toro boetoji. 1 Du rekodajire eture toro pugeje, dukeje José ure tumanamage edo boe pa pudui, icare ure brae eimejera kurirewu Faraão jordudo tuwobei. 1 Du kejere José makore tuo bogai uwobe eiamedu tabo, duwugere emagare, ere 7. 1 Icare Jacó ure turawuje Egito kae, nonore akurure, paedogamagere jamedu. 1 Icare ere era reko jice Siquém moto kae ere etugu Abraão ure aruwu aroe eiaro tada. Ure nowu aroe eiaro aru mori kuri inodu tabo, Henoc ore ekera piji, duwu Henoc nowu Siquém kejewure ema. 1 Boe aregodure pudae Pao makore Abraão jiboe umode tudowuje du kae. Abraão uwobe eidodure, erijodure Egito keje. 1 Jii ia Egito kejewuge eimejera kurirewu tuginoiwu boture, du jorduwakare José jiboeji. 1 Nowu brae eimejera pega remawu nure paobei, rorerure paomagei, ure edo tore ewarigu ewiwo. 2 Nowu du kodi Moisés boture. Moture Pao jekai, mugure tuwai tada arii pobe ma jewu metuia bokware. 2 Du kejere, barigudure dukeje, Faraão onaregedu aredu ure tugeragu ji, ure ricodudo umagai tonaregedu jiture. 2 Moisés jorduwadodure Egito kejewuge eerduware jiboe jamedu boeji, ure tudurudo tuwadaru tabo, turo tabo. 2 Aregodure tuioru ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogiduredu kae dukeje, aidure tuiorduwo tuwobe Israeldogei. 2 Nonore icare jordure ia Egito kejewu imedu rorerui ia jituji, aidure tuwo tugerabraredo ji, ure marenaru morido, ure nowu Ejito kejewu bito. 2 Upagare tuwobe emode boe pa Pao umoduie einorudo tugera taboduji, mare ekare boe pa. 2 Nowu meri rekodajire icare, ia emage ei pobedu erugodu nure pui, icare jemarure tuwo ewudugugo pui. Icare akore ei imedage, tawobe nure puje, kodiba tagorigodu nure pui? 2 Mare nowu ure tuwie okoridowu akore ji ioguduba koiba ure cegimejerado aki? 2 Amodukana iwido nowu aro magai Egito kejewu jitudu reore? 2 Awu bataru keje, Moisés rekodure, ure tuwiado, mugure Madian moto keje, tui nono ia moto tuginoiwu pijiwu reore, torore ure toredo pobe. 3 Joru makaguragare dukejere Pao ia o tupare towadudo jekai, toro boe pagawu tada, puredu Sinai torekoduji, ia botoguru uru oiabiji. 3 Icare Moisere tumeardaedo pudui, tuiordui nowu jitu koia, ure tuburedo tuiorduwo kaboba jiba inoba ureuba. 3 Du kejere Pao makore ji, akore imire aomage eno Aroe Eimejera nure imi, Abraão, Isaac, Jacó eno Aroe Eimejera nure imi. Icare Moisés pagudugodure, ukare tuioku awogado. 3 Icare Pao akore ji awure tadawu tawuje. Boe pagawu moto keje karega aragojere. 3 Iordu birigodure mugure Egito kejewu iwobe ecebaeji. Imeardure etoraguduji, icare itaregodure iwo edo cinorudo. Ica, mato, imode atudo Egito kae. 3 Awu Moisés mitodu, du ere barigu tagoi oino jitu tabo ioguduba ure cegimejerado aki? Emare Paore utudo tui boe eimejerado ema, tui boe einorudowudo ema dutabo, nowu ure towadudo botoguru tadawu Pao o tupa jetui jitu tabo. 3 Emare ure paomage etawuje Egito piji, tui turo kurirewu awadudo Egito keje, Pobo Kujagurewu keje, boe pagawu keje jorure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure du tonaji. 3 Awu Moisés mitodu makore israeldogei, akore Pao umode ia profeta tawuje tabiji tawogai, du umode nono ireore. 3 Awu Moisés mitodu mugure paomage eedui boe matadu tadawuge ebo, mugure makore ji Sinai torekodu ao kejewu Pao o tupa apo jamedu. Aire boe eemode koiawu bataru makudure ai, tuwo maku cenai. 3 Paomagerema, emeartorukare ji; tuwabo tadare ere tugirimi Egito kae. 4 Emagore Aarão biegai, egore ia aroe eimejerage etawuje cenai ewo cerego. Paga karega, ure cedawuje Egito pijiwu Moisés jire ceerduwakare kaiba kodure. 4 Nowu du kodi ere ia tapira imedu to meriri ekurewu tabo, tui ia aroe eimejera pagawudo ema, ere barege ewido jekai, eegarere nowu turore tugera tabo boeji. 4 Du kodi icare Pao ure tuiaedo epiji, ure epijido ewo tubujodo baru tadawu kuiejedogei, uwo magai atugododure profetadoge eno bapera kejedu reore israeldoge, tare barege ewido tawo ikurido, nowu boe matadu keje, jorure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure pugeje du tonaji? 4 Ukare ino. Mare tagaidure Maloque uwaiji, tagodure tao pagawu Refa awaraji, tare awague etowuje tagera tabo tawo tabujodo ei (Am 5, 5 2). 4 Pao bataru jaira mugure paomage ebo boe pagawu tada. Awu Pao bataru jaira todure nono Pao makore Moisés jitu du reore. 4 Makudure paomage etai duwugere arego biri kadodukareuge eno moto kae, tugimejerai Josué du tonaji. Du kodi, Paore nowu biri kadodukareuge etawuje nowu piji, ure eiaedo paomage ei. Icare nowu Pao bataru jaira mugure toro ebo jii paomage eimejera Davi aregodu kae. 4 Awu imedu pemegare Pao jekai, akore pudui tuwo ia bai mugudo Jacó o Aroe Eimejera ai. 4 Boekarema, paomage eimejera Salomão rugadure ure Pao kurirewu uwai mugudo. 4 Du inodu tabo, Pao Aroe Eimejera mugukare ime ere pemegadowu baidoge etada, ure nono profeta akore 4 Barure imuga reno, motore iwure pa reno. Kakoduwu baiba tamode pemegado inai? Oinore Pao akore kakoduwu boe eedaba imugure tada? 5 Imi karega ire boe jamedu pemegado? . 5 Aora rakarewu ime, birikadodukarewu tawabo tawiaja tabowu ime, tare tadugu tadugu Aroe Pemegarewu ro kuda. Taro tarore nono taedogamage ereore. 5 Kakoduwu profetadoge eiba taomage ekodu kagirikare ei? Taomagere makore Imedu Pemegarewu aregodumoduiedu jiwuge ewido, tagirema nowu Imedu Pemegarewu maku, tare bito. 5 Tagaire Moisés o boe eroiagu makudure tagai, Pao o tupadoge ekera piji, mare tameartorukare ji. 5 Emeardui awu bataru jitu kejere icare, ekodu kagirire ji, ere boe to ji boe kori koia ji. 5 Emarema, Aroe Pemegarewu mugure apo, ure tuioku kidudo baruto, Aiwore Pao Aroe Eimejera uruguji. 5 Icare akore Ica, iordu nure barui tuiado duji, Imedu Onaregedu rakojei Pao Aroe Eimejera kana pemegarewu jaogwai duji. 5 Du keje icare enoiogwari kuricigore, ere tugera bu tuwiaja keje, eiamedure ere tubodo apo turugodu tabo ji, boe kori koia ji. 5 Ere reko toro bakurirewu kujebiji, ere tori to ji tuwo bito. Ure tori to jiwuge ere to aroia boarewu tawuje, ere bu nono ia iparedu iei Saulo cedu apo. 5 Du kejere ere tori to nowu Estevao ji. Emarema okwamagudu nure Pao ji, akore Ikimejera Jesus, akeragu itaroeji akabo 6 Du kejere ure tubujodo, icare oiogwarire, akore Pao Aroe Eimejera, awiagodudo awuge eroi ii duji. Icare, awu tuwadaru kejere icare akurure. 

Saulo. 1Saulo jore ewugeje, ei nowu Estêvão bito duji. Nowu meri mitodu jire icare brae erugodu kuricigore Jerusalém kejewu meartorureugeidu ure tubaru towuje. Du kodi icare nowu meartorurewuge ere taodo Judéia kao, Samaria kao; tu apostolodoge emugure Jerusalém tada. 2Du tonajire ia meartorurewu ime eemarure tuwo Estêvão tugu mototo, etoragudu kuricigore bukeje. 3Saulo rema, kodu kagiri nure Igraja ji. Du kodire ure turemo baidoge eto, ure ime, areme etawuje nowu piji, ure erego baicoreuto. 
Dicono Filipe maragodui Samaria kejedu. 4Boekarema, ure taodowuge etu eture boe jamedu keje tureadodui Pao bataru jitu dutabo. 5Ia emage iei Filipe cedu, ure turawuje Samaria moto kae, readodure Cristo ji mugure nowu moto kejewuge ewiegai. 6Makareuge ewiapaga awadure nowu Filipe bataruji, ewiapagare ji, eerdure ro pemegarewu kurireuji. 7Boekimorema, Aroe pegareure tudawuje Aroe pegarewu meture tadawuge epiji, tuiogwari kuricigo tabo. Jamedu meru bokwarewu, pogora bokwarewu makareuge epemegagodure jamedu. 8Du kodi icare boe eegare kuricigore nowu bakurirewu tada. 
Bari Simão. 9Nonore ia imedu iei Simão cedu, mugure nono, dure turo rakarewu to to bakurirewu tada, dukoiare Samaria kejewuge eebogodure roji, du ure nono ia bari ro rakareure. 1 Biegareuge, ricoreuge eiamedu boe ewiapagare ji, egore Awu imedu ure nono Aroe Eimejera iei Kuirirewu cedu ro rakareboere. 1 Emeartorure ji, paga karega, marigudu ure eekuri paga pagado turoi bidugudugu jitu tabo eegai. 1 Mare emeardure Filipe makoi Pao o boe pemegareuji, Jesus Cristo akaruji, durekodajire icare emeartorure bataruji, icare ime, arema, etaidure tuwo tao pegodo. 1 Icare nowu Simão jamedu meartorure, icare ao pegododure. Icare ukare tuiaedo Filipe ji, tuiebogodui ro pemegarewu, ro kurirewu makareuji. 1 Apostolodoge emugure Jerusalém tadadu, emeardure Samaria kejewuge ei tugeragu Pao bataru jituji, icare ere Pedro mare João etudo toro etae. 1 Awuge etaregodure toro dukejere icare enogwamagudure Pao ji nowu meartorure maiwuge eparu tabo, Aroe Pemegarewu makuduwo etai. 1 Awurema karega, nowu du kodi Aroe Pemegarewu makudukare ia etai ia etai roga, mare etao pegododure Jesus ie tabo tu je. 1 Du kodi icare nowu apostolodoge ei pobedu ere tugera bu etaora keje Aroe Pemegarewu makuduwo etai du bogai. 1 Icare cewu Simão jordure Aroe Pemegarewu makudui etai Apostolodoge ei tugera bu etaora keje dutabo duji, icare akore tumoduie diiero maku etai, tagoi oino dutabo: - 1 Awu taro raka maku inai jamedu ma, imode ikera bu aora kejewu jamedu boe Aroe Pemegarewu makuduwo etai. 2 Icare Pedro akore bataru jipagi Ako diiero okwawo pi tuku akabo, ameardaere Pao o boe pemegarewu akomoduie diiero morice dukoia. 2 Awu Pao maragodae ia koborogu makudukare akai rugadu, paga karega, awabo rorogodure Pao jekai kodi. 2 Akodorogado ai awu aro pegareuji, akogwamagududo Pao ji, boe jokodu kare kare, awu aro pegarewu okwawo. 2 Mare paga karega, itaiwo nure ai, jirireboe kuricigorewu tadare amugure, boe pegarewu ure akogudo. 2 Icare nowu Simão akore Tagogwamagududo Pao ji iparu tabo ma, tamagore jiboe iaboe iaboe ekawo tudowuje ii. 2 Icare apostolodoge ereadodure Pao bataruji, tui tuiodo keje turo pemegarewu tabo dutabo, dukeje icare ere tugirimi Jerusalém kae. Ere Pao bataru kogado Samaria kejewuge eno moto kao. 
Etiópia kejewuge eimejerago utugare kurirewu. 2 Icare Pao o tupa aregodure Filipe ae, akore ji Aragojedo, atudo woje cebegi, ure turawuje Jerusalém pijiwu nowu moto biororewu iei Gaza cedu kaewu awaraji. 2 Icare Filipe ure turagojedo, uture toro. Boekarema, ia Etiopia kejewu ia eunuco imedu, duwure Etiopia kejewuge eimejerago iei Candace cedu utugare kurirewu rema, jeture oroe jamedu boeji, du uture Jerusalemto togwamaguduwo Pao uwai tada. 2 Icarema unure tugirimi to imaridorewu tabo, dutabore makore profeta Isaias o baperaji. 2 Icare Aroe Pemegarewu makore Filipe ji, akore Apuredu pemegado nowu imaridoreuji. 3 Icare Filipe ure tuburedo ji, meardure cewu eunuco makoi profeta Isaias o bapera 1atugoji. Icare unorare ji akore Are boe pa amagoi bapera jituji? Aerduware ji? 3 Akore Inoba iorduwamode, boekai inodu kogado iwiegai dutabo? Icare makore Filipe ji rutuwo uwo tumugudo tumegi. 3 Boekare, padure bapera kejeboe reo ere reko bitoduwo umagai ia barogo rogu ureore, umagai mako bokwarewu ia cordeiro rogu du ere bu rogu kado du reore, du reorere ukare togwa jado. 3 Ure tuwiegado dukoiare ere pegado, Ioguduba umode ore eremagu? Paga karega bimode du kodi. (Is 5, s). 3 Icare nowu eunuco akore Filipe ji Areadodudo iwiegai ioguduba jiba profeta akoino? Pudumi na? Ia tumeduiaji na? 3 Du kodi icare readodure. Ure tuwadaru paru tawuje nowu padure bapera kejewu bataru piji, icare readodure biegai Jesus jiboeji. 3 Eture todobiji, dutabore etaregodure ia pobo ja kae, icare nowu eunuco akore Pobo reo. Kodiba umodukare turugadu itao pegododuwo? 3 Icare Filipe akore Ameartorumode awabo jamedu tabo dukeje, umode turugadu. Icare akore Imeartorure Pao Onaregedui Jesus Cristo ceduji. 3 Ure imaridorewu buredo, icare ei pobedu ere turawuje pobo kae, icare Filipere nowu eunuco ao pegodo tu je. 3 Ere tudawuje pobo piji kuri je dukejere icare Pao o Aroe Pemegarewu ure tugeragu Filipe ji pi tuku toro eunuco joku piji. Icare nowu eunuco uture todobiji tadawaraji, tuiegare kuricigo tabo. 4 Du tonajire Filipe rekodudodure Azoto kae. Icare uture toro kujebiji, ure Pao bataru kogado bakurireuge eiamedu tada, jii taregodui Cesaréia moto kae du kae.
. Saulo meartorui Pagimejera bataru jidu. 1Du tonajire icare Saulore akedo pudui tuwo Pagimejerare jorduwadowuge epagududo tuwo ewido. Du kodi icare uture sacerdotedoge eimejera ae. 2Makore ji bapera bogai tuduwo Damasco bakurirewu kejewu judeudoge ere tudo pui tumagowo Pao o baperaji tadawu baidoge eiere sinagogadoge cedu etae. Aidure tuwo meartorureuge ime areme eiamedu reko ekera kogu tabo, toro Jerusalém kae. 3Boekarema, kodure awaraji du tonaji, puredu tu Damasco bakurireuji, icare, aregodure baru pijiwu ia urugureboe rakarewu ure taiado apo pi tuku je. 4Emarema, buture moto kae tuku. Icare meardure ia boe emago ji akore ji Saulo, Saulo, kodiba akonare ii awo iwido? 5Icare Saulo akore ji Ikimejera, ioguduba akiba? Icare Pagimejera akore ji Jesus nure imi dure are aiagu iwido. Boe pegareure, ai awure to meriri oto todu rema. 6Icare amagadure tubagudu koia, icare akore Ikimejera, inoba akaidure irowo? Icare Pagimejera akore ji Aragojedo, awo aremo bakurireuto, dukejere boe emagomode ai inoba aromode duji. 7Boekarema, uture apowuge epagudu rakaguragare, eemeradure makoji, mare eerdukare boeji. 8Du kejere icare Saulo ure turagojedo moto piji, ure tuioku jado, mare jordukare boeji. 9Du kodire icare uture apowuge ere tugeragu ieraji du apore ere turemo Damasco bakurireuto, du tadare mugure merire pobe ma awu metuia bokware jordukai, okwagekai, kudukai boece dutabo. 
Ananias ure Saulo ao pegodo. 1 Boekimorema, ia meartorurewu imedu iei Ananaias cedu mugure Damasco tada. Pagimejera makore ji unuiao tada, akore Ananias, Ananias. Akore Ikimejera, imireo. 1 Icare Pagimejera akore ji Aragojedo, atudo toro ia awara iei jetororewu cedu kae, icare anorare ia Tarso pijiwu imedu iei Saulo cedu bogai, Judas uwai tada. Unure togwa kurido. 1 Du tonajire nowu Saulo jordure tunuiao tada ia imedu iei Ananias cedu ui turemo tuwo tugera bu tuwugeje tuiorduwo pugejeduji. 1 Icare Ananias akore pagimejeraji Ikimejera, makareuge emagore iwiegai awu imedu jiboeji. Uie ure turo pegado meartorure aiwugei, Jerusalém tada duji. 1 Woerema ure bapera arego sacerdotedoge eiemejerage ekera piji tuwo tugeragu meartorure aiwuge eiameduji. 1 Mare Pagimejera akore ji Atudo toro ae, paga karega, ire nowu imedu tawuje tuwo itagaru reko boe eiamedu boe etae, boe eimejerage eegai, Israeldoge eegai jamedu. 1 Imode udo boe pa uie turugadu boewo togorido igoia duji. 1 Du kodi icare Ananias uture, ure turemo nowu baito, ure tugera bu ao keje, akore Iwie Saulo, Pagimejera Jesus ure towadudo awaraji aegaidu, ure itudo mato akae, aeku jadoduwo pugeje, akaroe okorobaduwo Aroe Pemegarewu tabodu bogai. 1 Du keje kuri je, iaboe ui nono kare ewodoredu buture joku piji, dutabore icare jordure pugeje. Ure turagojedo taci je, icare ao pegododure. 1 Du keje okwagere, icare rakare pugeje. Mugure nowu Pagimejerare jorduwadowuge ebo, nowu Damasco keje meri makakare. 
Saulo uwadodae boetojiwu Damasco kejedu. 2 Du tonajire kuri je uwadodure sinagogadoge ekao, akore boe ewiegai Pao Onaregeduie ure Jesus Cristo ceduji. 2 Meardure bataru jiwuge eiamedu boe eebogodure, egore Cewu onare meartorure Jesus jiwugei Jerusalém tada kanao? Aregodukana tuwo erego ekera kogu tabo toro sacerdotedoge eimejerage etae? 2 Saulorema, ure boe pa turo raka awadu iure, ure Damasco kejewu judeudoge epogurudo, tago awadui Jesusie Cristo rema. 2 Meri makakare dukeje icare judeudoge ere tudo pui, ere tumeardaedo tuwo bito. 2 Awu emeardae aregodure Saulo biaja kae. Emagerema eedure bakurirewu baiporo keje meriji boecoji, tuwo bito. 2 Mare meartorureuge ere tugeragu ji boecoji, ere rawuje nowu bakurirewu tori paru joki, metui kodo tada dutabo. 
Saulo maragodae Jerusalém tadadu. 2 Du pijire icare aregodure Jerusalemto. Aidure tuwo tumeduiado meartorureuge ebo, mare eiamedu boe epagudu nure ce, emeartorukare meartoruie Jesus jituji. 2 Du kodi icare Barnabé ure tugeragu ji pudabo, ure reko apostolodoge etae, readodure ewiegai jorduie Pagimejera ji awara keje, pagimejera makoe ji, uie Jesus akaru kogado taidu raka tabo Damasco tada duji. 2 Du otobijire icare, Saulo mugure ebo, tui tudawuje Jerusalém piji, tui turemo to pugeje, tui Pao akaru kogado tubagudu bokwa tabo. 2 Makore Grécia kejewu judeudogei jamedu, awugerema etaidure tuwo bito. 3 Icare meartorurewu umanamage ere boe pa, dukejere icare eture apo jii Cesaréia kae, dupijire ere utudo toro Tarso bakurirewu kae. 3 Nowu du kodi Pao o Igreja butugugodure Judéia o moto jamedu keje, Samaria keje. Ricodure tumeardu kurii Pao jitu tabo. Aroe Pemegarewu koiare ure eidodudo. 
Pedro maragodui Lida kejedu. 3 Pedro meru merure boe jameduji, bakurirewu jameduji, ure turawuje Lida kejewu meartorureuge etae jamedu. 3 Nonore jordure ia imedu iei Enéias cedu, du padu pagare tuba keje jii jorure ikera awubodure pobe ma jewu metuia bokware ikera awobowuto padu pagai tuba kejeduji, ukare tubogora inogido kodi. 3 Icare Pedro akore ji Enéias, Jesus Cristo koiare ure apemegago. Aragojedo, akera pemegado apaji. Kuri je ure turagojedo taci je. 3 Icare Lida kejewuge eiamedu boe, Saron kejewuge eiamedu boe eerdure ji, du kodi icare emeartorure Pagimejera ji. 
Ia aredu jewodui Jope kejedu. 3 Icare Jope bakurirewu tadare ia meartorurewu aredu iei Tabita cedu, mugure nono. Gregodoge ewadaru tabo iere Dorkas. Awu aredu pemegaguragare boe ji. Ure toroe maku maku du kuricigodo marenarue etai. 3 Boekimorema, nowu boe keje, kogodure, icare bire. Icare ere aimo dukeje, erudure apo bairia cobojewu kae. 3 Lida bakurirewu mugu puredure tu Jope bakurireuji. Du kodi icare Jope tadawu meartorureuge emeardure Pedro mugui Lida tadaduji. Icare ere imei pobedu etudo toro togwamaguduwo ji: - Mato cedae kuri je. 3 Icare Pedro ure turagojedo kuri je, icare uture ebo. Aregodure dukeje kuri je, ere reko cobojiwu bairiato. Ukoge bire pijiwu areme eiamedu boe ere tubodo Pedro apo, icare etoragudure tuiamedu tabo, ere jordudo nowu Dorkare tugera pemegado pudaewu eroia boarewu boe, ia tugudae makareuji. 4 Icare Pedrore eiamedu jeebu baawadu kae, dukejere icare ure tubujodo moto keje, okwamagudure Pao ji. Du kejere ure tugirimi nowu bireudo ae, dutabore akore Tabita, aragojedo! Icare ure tuioku jado, jordure Pedro ji, icare ure tumugudo. 4 Icare Pedro ure tugera raido iera kae, ure turagojedo. Icare makore tuwiemage ewogai, nowu ukoge bokwareuge ewogai jamedu, ure maku etai jewodu tabo. 4 Awu akaru ure tumaedo Jope jameduji, du kodi icare makareuge emeartorure Pao ji. 4 Pedro mugure Jope tada meri makaguragare, ia ure barege ewiri pemegadowu imedu iei Simão cedu uwai tada. 
Judeukare emawu meartorure Pagimejera ji boetojiwu ia tugobaigarege eimejera iei Cornlio cedu. 1Nowu du kodi ia imedu iei Cornélio cedu, mugure Cesaréia keje, duwure ia Itália pijiwu tugobaigarege eimejera nure ema, 2Rore nono Pao aidu reore. Meartorure Pao ji tuwobe eiamedu tabo. Ure toroe maku makudu kuricigodo marenarue etai, okwamagudure jii je Pao ji. 3Ia meri keje, meri jogodu tabo, awu imedu jordu awadure ia Pao o tupai tuburedo pudui duji, akoi: - Cornélio, Cornélio. Oino pudui duji. 4Icare Cornélio ure tuioku kidudo ji tubagudui ce dutabo, akore Kaboba, Ikimejera? Nowu Pao o tupa akore Akogwamagudure bogaiboe, are maku marenarue etaiboe, aregodure Pao jekai du kodire biapagare ai. 5Du kodire amode ia ime etudo Jope bakurirewu kae, emagowo ia imedu iere Simão cedu bogai, du ie bio Pedro rema, utuwo mato. 6Emare mugure ia ure barege ewiri pemegadowu imedu iei Simão cedu uwai tada. Uwai mugure pobo maerewu okwai. 7Icare Pao o tupa uture pijidu kejere, makore tudugarege ei pobedu ewogai, makore ia tugobaigare mugure pudabowu, meartorure Pao jiwu bogai. 8Icare readodure ewiegai tuiordure jiboe jamedu boeji, icare ure etudo Jope bakurirewu kae. 
Pedro jordure jiboe. 9Nowu meri rekodaji, emeru kimoi puredu tu nowu bakurirewu jitu tonaji, meri pagaia keje, Pedro ruture bai ao boarewu kae tuwo togwa kurido. 1 Icare uke boire ji, icare aidure togwagewo. Mare ere uke pemegado du tonaji, ure tunuiao pemegado taci je. 1 Icare jordure barui tuiado duji, iaboe ure nono ia aroia kurirewu ui turawuje baru piji moto kae, oto kogure pobe puibiji duji. 1 Nowu aroia tadare barege eiamedu, kiege eiamedu, awague eiamedu meture tada. 1 Icare iaboe emagore ji Pedro, aragojedo, awo bito, awo kowuje. 1 Icare Pedro akore Umodukare ino, Ikimejera! Ikare boe pegarewu kowuje jii je rugadu. 1 Icare nowu boe emago akore ji pugeje Amago pega kaba Paore pemegado boeji, akagokaba pegaie. 1 Awu inodure tuguwo pobe pugeje. Du kejere nowu aroia kurirewu todure baruto pugeje. 1 Pedrore tumeardaedo nowu jordure jiboeji, kabobao? Du tonajire icare nowu Corneliore etudo torowu ime eragojere baiporo keje tuiemarui Simão uwai bogai. 1 Ere tugera to baiporoji, enorare boe ji Simão iei Pedro cedu mugu rakuduie nono du bogai. 1 Pedro meardu nure tuiordure jiboeji du tonajire icare Aroe Pemegarewu akore ji Ica, imei pobe ma jewu metuia bokwaredu eemaru nure awogai, duwuge emugure nono. 2 Aragojedo, arawuje, atudo ebo apagudu bokwa tabo, inure etudo mato awogai du kodi. 2 Icare Pedrore turawuje, jordure nowu imei, icare akore ei Imireo. Taemarure bogaiwu imireo. Kaboba bogaiba taro oino? 2 Icare egore Tugobaigarege eimejera Cornélio, imedu pemegarewu, meartorure Pao jiwu, duwure judeudoge eiamedu jordu pemegare ji, emare jordure Pao ia o tupaji, duwure akore ji makoiagu awogai, mearduwo awadaruji. 2 Icare Pedro makore ei ewo turemo. Icare ure emugudo tuwai tada, enuduwo nono. Barogwatore icare uture ebo, ia Jope kejewu uwiemage ebo jamedu. 
Pedro rakojei Cesaréia kejedu. 2 Nowu meri rekodajire icare etaregodure Cesaréia kae. Nowu Cornélio upaga nure ewogai. Makore tuwobei, makore tumeardu kurire jiwu tumedagei, ure ewie, du kodire emugure uwai tada tubaga tabo ewogai. 2 Pedrore tuiagu turemo dukejere Cornélio ure tudawuje tuwo tugeragu ji, icare ure tubujodo Pedro bure paru tuwo tubujodo ji. 2 Boekimorema, Pedrore rakojedo taci je, akore ji Pao Kurirewu karega ure imi, imedu nure imi jamedu, aragojedo. 2 Icare, makoi jitu tabore icare, Pedrore turemo uwaito, jordure boe makareuge eedui nonodu ji, akore ei 2 Taerduware ukae turugadu ia judeu uwo tumeduiado ia moto tuginoiwu pijiwu imeduji, iarema uwo turemo uwaito, macare Paore iorduwado ukae turugadu cewo iaboe iaboe ewarigu cebiji. 2 Du kodire itaregodure mato kuri je, boe emagore iwogai dukeje. Kode, kodiba tagagoino iwogai? 3 Icare Cornélio akore ji Merire pobe puibiji duotodaire, imugure iwai tada imagoi Pao jitu tabo, meri jogodu tabo, du tonajire icare ia aroia kigadurewu meture jiwu imedu ure towadudo iegai, akore ii 3 Cornélio, akogwamagudure bogaiboe aregodure Pao ae, Pao biabuture are maku marenarue etaiboe bukeje. 3 Du kodi icare amode iaboe etudo Jope bakurirewu kae, makowo ia Simão iei Pedro cedu bogai, utuwo mato. Mugure ia barege ewiri pemegadowu imedu uwai tada, pobo maerewu okwai. 3 Du kodi icare ire boedo tumagowo awogai kuri je, atuwo mato, icare iegarere atui mato duji. Oinore icare, cegireo cedui pui Pao jekai, cemearduwo Paore amagodo cewiegaiboe jamedu boeji. 3 Icare Pedrore tuwadaru parudo, akore Boe jokodu iorduware Pao ukae iaboe iaboe kurido iaboe biegado pugori duji. 3 Mare boe eeda jamedu boe keje aidu pemegare meartorure jiwugei, ro pemegareuge eiamedu boeji. 3 Paore tuwadaru maku Israeldoge etae, ure boe pemegarewu, boe butugurewu readodudo ewiegai Jesus Cristo okwabiji, dure boe eiamedu boe eimejera nure ema. 3 Taerduware awu jamedu boe ui tudowuje Judéia keje, tui paru tugu Galiléia piji, João o boe etaimodu rekodaji. 3 Taerduware Paoi Jesus Nazaré kejewu kurido Aroe Pemegarewu tabo, turo raka tabo duji, dukoiare ro pemegare, ure Aroe pegarewu meture tadawuge epemegago, Pao mugure apo dukoia. 3 Cegire ceerdure, cereadodure, ure towuje Judéia keje boeji, Jerusalém tada boeji. Du kejere ere bito, ere tugu i padui pugajejedu keje. 4 Mare Paore jewodudo meri pobe ma jewu metuia bokware dukeje, ure udo towadudo. 4 Mare eiamedu eegai karega, mare tu Pao aidure jiwuge eegai, ceegai, duwuge cenogwagere apo, cegudure apo, jewoduredu rekodaji. 4 Ure cemagodo tuwadaruji boe etae, ure cereadodu pemegado Pudumie Paore jereuge, bireuge eimejerado Pudumi duji. 4 Jire profetadoge eiamedu emagore meartorumode jiwuge eiamedu boe ero pegarewu okwadodumoduie ie tabo. 4 Boekarema, Pedro akoinodu tonaji, Aroe Pemegarewu ure turawuje meardure bataru pemegarewu jiwuge eiamedu boe ewugeje. 4 Aregodure Pedro apowu meartorurewu judeudoge eebogodu kuricigore tuiordui Aroe Pemegarewu o boe pemegarewu ui turorido biri kadodukareuge ewugeje jamedu jituji. 4 Emeardure emagoi ia boe ewadaru tuginoiwu jituji, ei Pao kurido duji. 4 Icare Pedro akore Umodukana turugadu awuge etao pegododuwo? Awurema karega, Aroe Pemegarewu makudure etai ui nono makudure cenai du reore. 4 Icare ure boedo etao pegodo Jesus Cristo ie tabo. Du kodi icare enogwamagudure ji emuguwo pudabo biegatu kimo. 

Pedro ui tuwiemage Jerusalém kejewuge edo boe pa turo oinoduji. 1Du kejere icare apostolodoge, Judéia kejewu meartorureuge emeardure biri kadodukareuge ei tugeragu Pao bataruji jamedu duji. 2Du Kodi icare Pedro ruture Jerusalémto, dukejere icare enogituware ji. 3Egore: - Kodiba are aremo biri kadodukareuge ewaito, icare, akogwagere ebo? 4Macare Pedro readodure ewiegai ure tudowuje jamedu boeji, tagoi oino dutabo: - 5Inogwamagudu nure Pao ji Jope bakurirewu tada, icare ire ido ikinoi, dutabore iordure aroeji: iaboe ui nono aroia kurirewu reore, oto kogure pobe puibiji, ure tudawuje baru piji puredu tu ii. 6Itaiwo birigodure ji, icare iordu awadure barege, awague, kiege barege, emedui tada duji. 7Icare imeardure ia boe emagoi iwiegai oino duji Pedro, aragojedo awo bito, awo kowuje. 8Imirema, inagore umodukare ino, Ikimejera, iaboe iaboe pegarewu ukare turemo iiagi jii je. 9Icare cewu boe emago akore iwiegai baru piji pugeje, akore amagokaba Paore pemegado boeji akagokaba pegaie. 1 Awu inodu ure tudowuje pobe ma jewu metuia bokware, dukejere jamedu boe todure baruto pugeje. 1 Du kejere icare ia ime ei pobe ma jewu metuia bokwaredu etaregodure nowu imugure tadawu bai kae, duwugere boere etudo iwogai Cesaréia piji. 1 Boekimorema, Aroe Pemegarewu akore ii ikoduwo ebo ipagudu bokwa tabo. Awu cewiemage ei ikera awubodure mito taci jedu ekodure itabo jamedu. Icare cere ceremo Cornélio uwaito. 1 Emare icare readodure cewiegai tuiorduie ia Pao o tupa ui towadudo tuiegai akoi pudui oinodu jituji amode iaboe etudo Jope bakurirewu kae tumagowo Simão iei Pedro cedu bogai. 1 Emare makomode ai bakaru pemegareuji dukoiare amode akinorudo, awobe eiamedu tabo. 1 Icare ire iwadaru paru tawuje du tonajire kuri je Aroe Pemegarewu ure turawuje ewugeje ure nono ure turawuje pawugeje marigu du reore. 1 Du tabore icare iwiabuture Pagimejera akoino dukeje joãore boe etao pegodo pobo tabo, tagirema tagao pegododumode Aroe Pemegarewu tabo. 1 Kode makudure meartorure jiwuge cenaiwu Pao o boe pemegarewu mitodu makudure etai jamedu ma, ioguduba imiba iwo ituu Pao Aroe Eimejera aidu kuda? 1 Emeardure awu bataru jitu kejere icare emago bokware ji pugeje, ere Pao jekaredo, egore Kode, biri kadodukareuge etai jamedu Paore ero pegarewu kiarigodae maku etai, etaregoduwo boe eerewo kae. 
Antioquia tadawu Pao uwobe eparu ui tudowujedu. 1 Du tonajire nowu ure taodo boe jamedu boe kaowuge, cewu brae etonare pudui boe keje, Estêvão o meri keje, etaregodure Fenícia kae, Chipre kae, Antioquia kae, tui Pao bataru kogado tu judeudoge ewiegai dutabo. 2 Mare ia Chipre kejewuge, ia Cirene kejewuge, enogore ekaodu, etaregodui Antioquia kae dukeje, emagore gregodoge ei jamedu, ere Pagimejera o bakaru kogado ewiegai jamedu. 2 Pagimejera mugure ebo du kodire icare boe makareuge emeartorure, ere tugirimi Pao ae. 2 Awu boe jamedu boe akaru aregodure Jerusalém tadawu meartorureuge ewiegai. Du kodire ere Barnabé utudo Antioquia kae. 2 Aregodure toro dukejere jekarere tumeardui Pao o boe pemegarewu jitu koia, icare makore ei emugu kiduwo Pao apo, turo raka tabo. 2 Paga karega, emare imedu pemegarewu rema, meartoru kuricigore, Aroe Pemegarewu mugure apo. Du kodire ia boe makareuge ere tumeduiado Paoce. 2 Kuri je dukeje icare Barnabé uture toro Tarso kae, tuiemaruwo Saulo bogai, icare jordure ji, ure reko Antioquia kae. 2 Joru mito tu jedu oto kae, etu eture meartorureuge ere tudo puiwo kae tu tu tu je, ere makaguragareuge eerduwado. Du kodire Antioquia kejere nowu meartorure Cristo jiwuge eiere cristãodoge oino boetoji. 2 Nowu kodiboe keje ia profetadoge ere turawuje Jerusalém piji Antioquia kae. 2 Ia emage ui mito tu jedu iei Agabo cedu, ure turagojedo, icare Aroe Pemegarewu koiare readodure ia boe eke boi moduie boe ji du kuricigomode moto jamedu boe keje. Boekimorema, awu boe eke boi aregodure nowu Cláudio brae eimejera kurireui pudumi du tonaji. 2 Du kodi icare Antioquia kejeu meartorureuge etaidure tuwo tugera braredo, tuwo toroe maku Judéia kejewu tumanamage etai, tu tu, turoia reore. 3 Icare erore oino rugadu ere maku toro Barnabe, Saulo mage ekera tabo. 

Herodes onare Pao uwobei, ure Tiago bito. 1Nowu joru mitoduji, brae eimejera Herodes ure tudugarege edo ia meartorureuge eiemejerage ekera gogudo turoreruwo ei. 2Du kodire ure João umana iei Tiago cedu bito toriga rairewu tabo. 
Pedro tugudure baicoreuto dupijire Paore inorudo. 3Icare nowu Herodes ure boe pa judeudoge etaiduie awu ro oinodu jitu duji, du kodire ure tudugarege edo Pedro ieragogudo jamedu. Awu inodu ure tudowuje nowu judeudoge ere amirewu iogoae metukare tadawu kowuje jiwu meriji. 4Icare ure tudugarege edo iera gogudo, edo tugu baicoreuto. Ure tugobaigarege ei pobedu jetu nono eetuwo ji, rekodu kawo. Aidure tuwo boe eerdudo ji, nowu Páscoa rekodaji. 5Icare Pedro meture baicorewu tada, du tonajire icare Pao uwobe enogwamagudu nure Pao ji jii je Pedro paru tabo. 6Boekarema, Herodes uiagu boe eerdudo jiwu meri otodaiwu boeco tada, Pedro unudu nure baicorewu tada, ia tugobaigarege ei pobedu etoiadoda, iera gogure meriri ikui pobe dutabo. Ia tugobaigarege eedure baiporo keje taiwo tabo ji. 7Boekimorema, Pao Aroe Eimejera ia o tupare ure towadudo. Kuri je boeragudure nowu bai otoji krk! Icare nowu tupare amagadudo Pedro meto, icare ure jetadudo, akore ji Aragojedo kuri je. Icare nowu meriri iku buture iera piji kuri tai je. 8Icare nowu tupa akore ji Akudawu tugu ai, awurekea kejewu tugu awurekoto. Icare rore ino rugadu. Icare nowu tupa akore ji pugeje Akudawu aroia bai tugu ai, ako itabo. 9Pedrore tudawuje, uture rekodaji tuiorduwakai boe jokoduie kodi karega; meardaere tunuiaoie ure duji. 1 Ekodure boetojiwu tugobaigarege ekori, rekodajiwuge ekori jamedu. Du kejere etaregodure bakurirewu okwaiwu baiporo meriri kurirewu kae, ure tuiado taobiji, icare ere pagado kajeje taci, eture puapo nowu bakurirewu kejewu ia awaraji, dukeje icare kuri je nowu Pao o tupa okware pi tuku je. 1 Du kejere icare Pedrore boe pa, icare akore Icare iordure boe jokoduie Pao koiaie ure to tupa arego iwogai tuwo ikinorudo Herodes iera piji, judeudoge epagare bogaiboe jamedu boe piji jamedu. 1 Ure tumeardaedo dukejere icare uture João Marcos uce Maria uwai kae, nonore makareuge ere tudo pui tumagowo Pao ji. 1 Ure tugera to baiporoji, icare maragodure nonowu ia aredu iei Rosa cedu, uture jice tumearduwo ioguduba ba? 1 Icare meardui Pedro mako jitu koia, ukare baiporo jado tuiegare koia, mare rekodure tuibagi toro baito tureadoduwo tumedage ewiegai Pedro rakojeie baiporo keje duji. 1 Egore ji Akaora bai baire? Akore ei pugeje ema rugaduie, ema rugaduie. Icare egore O Tupamode. 1 Du tonajire icare Pedrore tugera to to baiporoji pugeje. Boe oto kejere icare ere baiporo jado, eerdure ji, icare erore poku, tori buture eiagi. 1 Icare ure tugera onado ei emago kaiagu, icare readodure ei Pao Kurirewu ui tuginorudo baicorewu pijiduji. Icare akore Tamode Tiago bie, tamode pawiemage ewie. Du kejere ure tudawuje nowu piji, uture ia boe eeda kae. 1 Barogwatore icare tugobaigaegere tumorora amagadure du kuricigodo nowu ure tudowuje Pedro jitu koia. 1 Herodes jemarure bogai, jordukare ji, du kodire boedo tugogado nowu tugobaigaregei, icare ure edo ewido. Boe raikare dukejere icare Herodes ure tudawuje nowu Judéia moto piji, nowu Cesaréia kae, icare rakojere nono. 
Herodes bi. 2 Herodes rugodu nure nowu Tiro, Sidnia kejewugei. Awugerema emagore pui, dukejere eture ae, icare enogwamagudure ia utugare iei Blasto ceduji makowo ji, butuguguduwo pudui (Paga karega, awu Blastore etaidure jiwu boe eke maku maku etai). 2 Icare makore jiwu merijire icare Herodes ure brae eimejera epa aroia meture pudui dutabore ure tumugudo ture tugogado boe ji kejewu muga keje, dupijire makore ewiegai. 2 Icare boere tugera to pui, egore Ia aroe eimejerare akoino! 2 Nowu inodu keje kuri je Pao o tupa ure okorido, ukare Pao jekaredo dukoia. Icare ate ere kodu kowuje, icare bire. 
Barnabé, Paulo mage ere tugirimi Antioquia kae. 2 Du tonajire Pao bataru itodure, ure tumaedo tu tu tugori. 2 Barnabá, Paulo mage ere tumaragodae akedudo Jerusalém keje, dukejere icare ere tugirimi Antioquia kae pugeje. Ere João iei Marcos cedu ko pudabo. 

Barnabé mare Paulo emeru boetojiwu. 1Antioquia tadawu Pao uwobe etada profetadogere, jorduwareugere jamedu. Ia emage reo Barnabé Simão iei Corewu cedu, Lúcio Cirene pijiwu, Manam cewu Herodes metuia tugodui puregodajidu kimoboe keje, mare Saulo. 2Ia meri keje, awuge ere todorogado pudui, dukejere ere Pao jora ko, dutabore icare Aroe Pemegarewu makore ei, akore Tamode Barnabé mare Saulo etawuje inai emaragoduwo itaidure jiboe keje. 3Du kejere icare, ei todorogado pudui dukejere, ere togwakurido eparu tabo, icare ere tugera bu ewugeje, dukejere ere etudo. 4Du koiare Aroe Pemegarewu koiare ure etudo, dutabore eture bakurirewu mugui pobo maerewu okwai du iere Seléucia cedu kae. Du pijire eture ika kurirewu tabo ia pobo aiare moto tabowu iei Chipre cedu kae. 5Etaregodure Salamina bakurireuto dukejere ere Pao bataru kogado nono judeudoge ere tudo pui tumagowo Pao bataru jiwu baidoge etada. João (Marcos) kodure ebo tuwo tugera braredo ei. 6Du kejere emerure jii je, nowu pobo aiare moto tabowu kajeje jii etaregodure Pafos bakurireuto, du tadare eerdure ia judeu iei Barjesu ceduji, duwure boe eekuri pagado turo tuginoiwu tabo, profeta pagarewu nure ema. 7Mugure brae eimejera pemegarewu iei Sérgio Paulo cedu apo. Awu brae eimejera makore Barnabé mare Saulo ewogai, aidure tumearduwo Pao bataruji kodi. 8Icare nowu profeta paga pagarewu, du iere jamedu Elimas cedu, ure tonado ei, aidure tuwo nowu brae eimejera meartoru kado Pao ji. 9Du kodi icare Saulo, du iere Paulo, Aroe Pemegarewu mugui apo dukoia, ure tuioku kidudo ji, akore 1 Aroe pegarewu onaregedu, ure boe eekuri pagadowu, batararodurewu, onare boe jetororewu jiwu imedu, anure Pao Aroe Eimejera utawara jetororewu meki mekido. 1 Ica, oinonore icare iera butumode awugeje, dukoiare aeku bokwamode. Aerdumodukare meri jokuji jii boe emagomode ai pugeje du kae. Kuri je dukejere icare boeco buture joki, icare merure, ure taiado bai bai bai, jemarure ioguduba umode tugera maku pudai du bogai. 1 Nowu brae eiemejera tuiordui nowu Saulo ro rakarewu jitu kejere icare, meartorure Pao ji, jeebogodu kuricigore Paulo makore jiboeji. 
Paulo uwadodae Antioquia bakurirewu mugui Pisídia kejewu keje. 1 Du kejere icare Paulo uture tumedage ebo ika kurirewu tabo nowu Pafos bakurirewu piji, etaregodure Perge bakurirewu mugui Panfília moto kejewu kae. Nonore icare cewu João Marcos uture epiji, ure tugirimi Jerusalemto pugeje. 1 Ekodure toro Perge bakurirewu kori toro Antioquia bakurirewu mugure Pisídia moto kejewu kae. Du kejere icare ere turemo judeudoge ere tudo pui tumagowo Pao bataruji tadawu baito, icare ere tumugudo. 1 Du kejere boe emagore profetadoge eno baperaji, emagore boe eroiagudu padui bapera keje duji; dukejere nowu judeudoge ewai tadawu eimejerage emagore Saulo, Barnabé ewogai, egore Cemanamage, tagaidure tamagowo iaboeji boe ewiegai dukeje, tamagodo. 1 Icare Paulore turagojedo, ure tugana aogado boe etae, akore Israeldoge, meartorure Pao jiwuge tagi, tawiapagado. 1 Israel uwobe eno Aroe Eimejera ure tugeragu paomagei pudae, ure eidodudo, emugui Egito kejedu tonaji, dupijire ure etawuje tugana rakarewu tabo. 1 Jorui 40 du tonaji, ure enogwagedo ia kugaru awadure jiwu moto keje. 1 Du kejere ure Canaã moto kejewu boe etuwobe makareuge eeda kedodo, icare ure nowu moto pedo etai jorui 45 du tonaji. 2 Du kejere ure jeture eiwuge emagu etai jii Samuel aregodure du kae. 2 Du kejere icare enogwamagudure ia boe eimejera kurirewu bogai pudai. Du kejere icare Paore Saul, Cis onaregedu, Benjamim uwobe, maku etai jorui 40 du tonaji. 2 Du kejere Paore Saul pijido, ure eimejera Davi maku etai, du jire Pao akore iordure Jessé onaregedu Davi ji, itaidure jiwu imedu duwu romode itaidure jiboe jamedu boeji. 2 Rekodajiwuge epijire Paore nowu ure boe einorudowu Jesus tawuje epiji uwo nono profetadoge emagore marigudu du reore. 2 Nowu Jesus aregodu otodaire, Joãore boe eedorodowu boe etaimodu kogado, nowu Israel uwobe eiamedu boe ewiegai. 2 Emare, tui tumaragodae akedudo du tonajire akore cewu tameardaere jiwu imedu, imi karega, mare iregodajire icare ia ikare irugadu iwo bure tadawu iku kiwujewu aregodumode. 2 Iwiemage, Abraão ore tagi, meartorure Pao jiwugere tagi, pagaire awu umode paginorudowu bakaru rojaidodure. 2 Paga karega, Jerusalém tadawuge mare eimejerage eerduwakare Jesus ji, ere tugogado ji, ere bito, dutabore ere tumagore baperaji Sábado meri jiwu profetadoge ewadaru ere towuje. 2 Enogwamagudure Pilato ji uwo bito, eerdukare ro pegareuji kodi karega. 2 Icare ere bapera atugododure taboboe jamedu towuje, dukejere ere tawuje i padui pugajejedu piji icare ere tugu aroe eiaoto. 3 Macare Pao Aroe Eimejera ure jewodudo bireuge epiji. 3 Icare cewu ruture apo Galiléia piji Jerusalém kaewuge eerdure ji meri makaguragare du tonaji, duwugere ereadodure boe ewiegai. 3 Cereadodu nure tawiegai Pao makore paedogamege eiboeji. 3 Ure tumagore eiboe towuje etore ceegai, ure Jesus rakojedo ure nono bapera atugododure Pao roia tabodu reore itonaregedu nure aki, awuji ire atowuje. 3 Paore tonaregedu jewodudo bireuge epiji ukawo tugirimi tubegagoduwo, ure nono ako reore imode imagore Davi jiwu ino boe pemegarewu maku tagai. 3 Davi mitodu ia boe keje akore amodukare atugare pemegarewu kodu pegadodudo. 3 Aró, kode, Davi rore nono Pao ui turoiagudu reore dukejere bire. Tugudure mototo puredu tu taomagei, icare kodu pegagodure. 3 Mare cewu Paore jewodudo biereuge epijiwu kodu pegagodukare. 3 Du kodire, iwiemage, taerduwado koiaie cereadodu nure tawiegai boe ero pegarewu akedumode duji. 3 Emare ure meartorure jiwuge eiamedu boe epemegago, mare Moisés boe eroiagudodu koia karega. 4 Icare tameardu awadudo tai cewu profetadoge emagore jiboe butukawo tawugeje. 4 Nowu profetadoge egore ure boe epijidowuge tagi, tameardu awadudo tai, tadugu tai, tabagudu kuricigodo. Paga karega, imode iro kurirewu tuginoiwu towuje taegai, du jire tameartorumodukare ji, iaboe ereadodumode tawiegai dukeje. 4 Du keje icare, ere tudawuje du tonajire icare enogwamagudure ei emagowo pudai pugeje aregodumode pugejewu Sábado meriji. 4 Nowu ere tudo pui dukejere icare, judeudoge makareuge, judeukare emawu meartorurewu makareuge eture Paulo, Barnabé mage ebo, duwugere emago emagore ei ekidawo tumugui Pao apo jii je. 4 Nowu Sábado rekodajiwu meriji icare nowu bakurirewu tadawuge eiamedu etaregodure tumearduwo Pao bataruji. 4 Icare judeudoge tuiordui nowu boe makareugei dukoiare, ekorire ei, emago pegare Paulo makore jiboeji. 4 Du kodi icare Paulo mare Barnabé emagore ei tumago raka tabo, egore Tagaire Pao bataru kogadodumode tagai boetoji, macare tanure pijido, du kodi icare cemode cemegido judeukare emawuege etai. 4 Paga karega, oinore Pao akore ire atawuje awo boe eno moto tuginoiwu kejewuge erugudo, iwo moto kejewuge eiamedu boe einorudo. 4 Awu bataru koiare ure jedukare emawuge eegare kuricigodo, duwuge ere Pao bataru kurido. Icare ere turugadu tuwo tumagu Pao ai, duwugere emeartorure ji. 4 Du tabore icare Pao bataru ure taodo nowu moto jamedu joki. 5 Macare nowu judeudoge ere nowu bakurirewu tadawu ia areme kurireuge edo brae eimejerage erugo Paulo ji, Barnabe ji, icare ere etudo nowu to moto piji. 5 Icare nowuge ei pobedu ere tuwureko tadawu moto urugudu jukodo ei. Ere tudawuje nowu piji, icare eture Icônio kae. 5 Meartorureuge rema eegare kuricigore Aroe Pemegareuji. 

Paulo mare Barnabé emugui Icônio kejedu. 1Paulo mare Barnabé etaregodure Icônio kae, dukejere icare ere turemo judeudoge ere tudo pui tadawu baito, nowu turo oino reore, du tadare icare ere Pao bataru kogado. Du kodi icare judeudoge makareuge, gregodoge makareuge emeartorure. 2Mare ia meartorukarewu judeudoge, ere judeukare emawuge erugo nowu meartorureugei. 3Du kodi karega, Paulo mare Barnabé emugu raire nono kimo, epagudu bokware, emeartorure Pao ji, Pao ierabrarere ewadaruji kodi, ure turo rakarewu to to nowu apostolodoge ekera tabo. 4Icare nowu bakurirewu tadawuge ere tugado puiato: iage ere tumegido judeudoge eiaogwai, iage ere tumegido apostolodoge eiaogwai. 5Macare ia judeudoge, ia judeukare emawuge ere turagojedo turugoduwo apostolodogei, tuwo tori to ei. 6Du keje icare Apostolodoge ere boe pa, du kodire eregodure Licaônia, Listre, Derbe bakurireuge ekae, oieiwu moto kae jamedu. 7Nonore icare ereadodure Pao o bakaru pemegareuji. 
Ure tudowuje Listra, Derbe bakurireuge etadaboe. 8Nowu Listra tadare ia imedu pogora pegarewu mugure tada, meru bokware jii boture dupiji jii oino du kae. 9Meardu nure Paulo bataruji tumugui nono dutabo, icare Paulore tuioku kidudo ji, jordure meartoruie tuwo tubemegado. 1 Du koiare ure tumago rakado ji, akore ji Aragojedo, aedorodo awure keje. Icare ure taredo taci je, icare merure. 1 Icare nowu boe makareuge, tuiordui Paulo ro oinoduji dukeje, ere tumago rakado, enoiogwarire Licaônia kejewuge ewadaru tabo, egore Ime ereorewu Aroe Eimejerage ere turawuje pagae! 1 Icare ere Barnabé iedo Zeusce, ere Paulo iedo Hermesce, paga karega, awu mako makore du kodi. 1 Icare ia Zeus bure joia imedu iei Propeleo cedu ure ia tapiradoge ime eerego mato, nowu bakurirewu baiporo kae, ure ekenawudo, ure edugodo tuwo ewido nowu Paulo mare Barnabé etai, tumeardui Aroe Eimejerageie ure emage, nowu boe eiamedu emeardaere oino jamedu. 1 Mare nowu apostolodoge ei pobedu, tui boe pa nowu oinodu jitu kejere, ere tugudae bowuje, ere taredo nowu makareuge etoiado. 1 Egore: - Ime, kodiba taro oino? Boe bimodeugere cegi jamedu tareore. Ica, cenogituwa nure tai tawo taedorodo, tawo tagirimi boe pegarewu piji, Pao jerewu kae, koiare ure baru to, ure awu moto to, ure pobo maerewu to, ure mugure jekeboe jamedu boe ure towuje jamedu. 1 Marigudu ure moto kejewu boe etawarado mitotu mitotu tu ereore. 1 Du kodi karega ure towadudo paiamedu jekai jii je, turo pemegarewu tabo, ure butaodoge ewududo pagai baru piji, ure boe pemegareudo pagai, ure page kuricigodo boe jameduji, ure pawabo jekare kuricigodo. 1 Mare rakare ei tukawo edo tapiradoge ewido, tukawo edo tubujodo tuiegai. 1 Macare ia Antioquia pijiwu, ia Icônio pijiwu judeudoge etaregodure, duwugere ere boe makareuge etaora pegado.
