Du kodi icare ere tori to Paulo ji, icare emeardaere tuie bito duji, du kodi icare ere tumugudo keje kororo, toro nowu bakurirewu baawadu kae. 2 Du kejere icare ure jorduwadowuge ere taiado apo. Icare ure turagojedo taci, ure turemo bakurireuto pugeje. Nowu rekodajiwu meri jire icare uture Barnabé apo toro Derbe bakurirewu kae. 2 Icare ereadodure Pao bataruji nowu Derbe kejewuge ewiegai, ere ture jorduwadowuge emagado nono. Du kejere icare ere tugirimi nowu piji, toro Listra, Icônio, Antioquia (Pisídia kejewu) bakurireuge etae. 2 Ere meartorureuge emeardu awadudo pudui tuwo tudurudo tumeartorui Pao jitu tabo. Egore ei uie turugadu pawo paremo Pao mugurewo kae pabagai boe ecebae makarewu kajeje dutabo. 2 Du kejere ere Pao bure jore kejewuge emugudo Igreja jamedu tada. Enogwamagudure Pao ji eparu tabo, tui todorogado pudui dutabo, tui togwa kurido dutabo. 2 Icare ere pagado Pisídia moto kajeje, etaregodure Panfília moto kae. 2 Ereadodure Pao bataruji Perge bakurirewu tada, dukejere ere turawuje Atália kae. 2 Du pijire icare ere taredo ika kurireuto, ekodure Antioquia (Sria kejewu) kae pugeje. Nowu bakurirewu pijire ere tudawuje marigudu tui tumagu Pao ai awu tumaragodae akedugoduredu kae. 2 Etaregodure nono dukeje, ere meartorureuge eto pui, icare ereadodure ewiegai Paoi turo kurirewu towuje etaiduji, ui judeukare emawuge emeartorudo tuwadaru jituji. 2 Icare emugu raire nono ebo. 

Judeudoge ei tuwiri kadodu jiboe. 1Icarema ure turawuje Jerusalém pijiwu ia ime emagore Pao uwobei, egore Tamodukare tawiri kado, Moisesre boe eroiagudo du reore ma, tamodukare taginorudo. Oinore egore ei. 2Icare Paulo mare Barnabé enogituwa kuricigore ei, mare ekare tuwudugugo Icare eiamedu etaidure tuwo Paulo mare Barnabé etudo toro Jerusalém kae, ia tuwiemage ebo, tunorawo apostolodogei, inoba umode duji. 3Icare ere tugimadudo nowu Pao uwobe epiji, icare ekodure toro Fenícia, Samaria kajejewu awaraji. Icare ereadodure Pao uwobe eiamedu ewiegai icai judeukare emawuge emeartoruie Pao jituji. Du koiare eiamedu jekare kuricigore. 
Apostolodoge eiamedu ere tudo pui Jerusalém tadadu. 4Icare etaregodure Jerusalémto. Nonore Pao uwobe, apostolodoge, Pao uwobe eimejerage ere tugeragu ei tuiegare tabo. Du kejere ereadodure ewiegai Pao rore puduiboe jamedu boeji. 5Macare iage, duwugere fariseudogere emage marigudu tumeartorure Pao jitu otodai, ere turagojedo, egore umoduie turugadu boewo judeukare emawuge ewiri kado jamedu, uwo nono Moisés ure boe eroiagudo du reore. 6Icare apostolodoge, mare nowu Pao uwobe ia eimejerage, ere tudo pui tumagowo nowu inoduji, inoba umode duji. 7Emago raire pui, dukejere icare Pedrore turagojedo, akore ei Iwiemage, taerduware jii paru pijie Paore tugeragu ii tabiji ireadoduwo tuwadaruji judeukare emawuge ewiegai ma, emeartoruwo ji. 8Emare jorduware ime ewaboji, dukoiare ure turodo nono tumeardu kurii ei du kodiwore, ure Aroe Pemegarewu maku etai, umagai maku pagai du reore. 9Aiwore ei taiwo magai pai du reore, ure ewabo pemegado emeartorure ji kodi. 1 Kode, kodiba tagomare Pao ji? Tare jorduwadowuge enoredudo paomage eroiwakare jiboe tabo, paroiwakare jiboe tabo, kodiba? 1 Pagire pameartorure paginorudoduie Pagimejera Jesus Cristo o boe pemegarewu koia duji. Oinore umode etai jamedu. 1 Eiamedu biapagare Pedro bataruji tumago bokwa tabo. Du keje icare ewiapagare Barnabé mare Paulo ereadodui tuwiegai Paoi tudowuje ekera tabo judeukare emawuge etaiwu turo pemegarewu kurirewu jameduji. 1 Emago akedu kejere icare, Tiago akore Iwiemage tawiapagado: 1 Oino maigodu Simão Pedro readodure pawiegai Pao aiwoi judeukare emawuge eiduji, tuwo tuwobedo emage. 1 Ica, awu inodu ure nono profetadoge ewadaru padui bapera kejedu reore: 1 Awu inodu otobiji imode ikirimi, imode Davi uwai buturewu rakojedo pugeje, imode uwai kobo rogu boe pemegado, imode rakojedo. 1 Ma, rakoje kimomodeu ime ekoduwo Aroe Eimejera bogai, boe emagore ikie bogai bukejewu boe epadui pumekejedu jamedu boe ekoduwo bogai jamedu. 1 Oinore Pao akore, duwure awu jamedu towuje, jorduware jamedu boeji jii paru piji (Am 9, s). 1 Du kodi icare imeardaere uie turugadu pakawo judeukare emawuge ei tugirimi Pao ae tuibagi pugejewu emorora amagadudo. 2 Imeardaere uie turugadu pawo bapera atugodo etai ekawo makudure aroe eimejerage pagareuge etaiwu barege ekodu kowuje, eerebari kawo, ekawo akere bitowu barege ekodu, eku, kowuje. Oino tu je. 2 Paga karega, padure bapera kejewu Moisés ure boe eroiagudodu makodu makodure Sábado jameduji bakurireuge eiamedu tada boe eiamedu padui pumekejedu ewiegai jii marigudu jii oino. 2 Du kodi icare apostolodoge, Pao uwobe eimejerage, Pao uwobe eiamedu boe eerdu pemegare tuwo ia ime etawuje tubiji, etuwo Paulo apo, Barnabé apo, Antioquia kae. Ere etawujewuge reo judas, iei Barsaba cedu, mare Silas, duwuge kurireugere emage tumedage etada. 
Jerusalém pijiwu boe eroiagudu. 2 Ere reko pudabowu bapera atugo reo: - Apostolodoge cegi, Pao uwobe eimejerage cegi, cegimadu nure judeukare emawu Antioquia tadawu, Sria tadawu, Cilícia tadawu cewiemage tagai. 2 Cemeardure boe egoi ia uture cebijiwuge ei tumago maere tai, tui tamorora amagadudo dutabo. Mare cegire cekare etudo tawogai. 2 Du kodi icare cere cedo pui, cere ia ime etawuje cebiji cewo etudo tawogai, cemeardu kurire jiwu Barnabé, Paulo mage ebo. 2 Duwuge ere tumagu tuwidoduwo Pagimejera Jesus Cristo ie koia. 2 Icare cere Judas mare Sila etudo ebo tawogai, duwuge ereadodumode nowu inoduji tawiegai. 2 Aroe Pemegarewu apore ceerdu pemegare cekawo tagoredudo iaboe iaboe tabo, mare awu inodu tabo tu je: 2 Tagogwagekawo makudure aroe eimejerage pagareuge etaiwu barege ekoduji, takawo akere bitowu barege ekodu, eku kowuje, tagera keadu kawo jamedu. Umode turugadu tawo inoduboe pijido. Cegimadu nure tawogai. 3 Du kejere icare nowugere tugimadudo epiji, icare eture toro Antioquia kae, torore icare ere Pao uwobe eto pui, icare ere bapera maku etai. 3 Emagore baperaji, dutabore eiamedu jekarere, icare emeardu awadure pudui pugeje. 3 Icare Judas, Silamage, duwugere profetadogere emage jamedu, emago awadure nowu Pao uwobei, tui eerduwado, tui emeardae awadudo pudui jamedu dutabo. 3 Meri makakare ei nono, dukejere Pao uwobe ere tugimadudo ebo pugeje, boe butugu tabo. Icare ere tugirimi tuibagi cewu ure tududo torowuge etae pugeje. 3 (Boekarema. Silas jordu pemegare tumuguwo nono, Judas rema ure tugirimi Jerusalém kae tuibagi). 3 Paulo mare Barnabé emugure Antioquia tada jamedu. Ere boe eerduwado, ere Pao bataru kogado ia tumedage makareuge ebo. 
Paulo mare Sila emeru rekodajiwu. 3 Meri makakare pugeje dukeje, Paulo makore Barnabe ji, akore Pawo pagirimi, paerduwo pawiemagei pugeje, nowu pare Pao bataru kogado tadawu bakurireuge eiamedu boe ekao. Paerduwo inoba ere, epemegare, iarema epegare du bogai. 3 Boekimorema, Barnabé aidure tuwo João iei Marcos cedu ko pudabo. 3 Paulorema meardaere boroie, paga karega, marigudu, emugui Panfília keje dukeje, João uturadu Paulo mare Barnabé epiji, ukare tugerabraredo ei emaragodae keje. 3 Du kodi icare Paulo, Barnabé emeardaekare pureore, icare ere tudo tuginoi. Icare Barnabé uture Chipre kae, ika kurirewu tabo, ure Marcos reko pudabo. 4 Paulorema ure Silas reko pudabo, icare Pao uwobe emagore Pao ji eparu tabo, icare uture jamedu. Merure Síria moto kae, Cilícia moto kae, tui Pao uwobe emeardu awadudo pudui dutabo. 

Paulore tumeduiado Timoteoce. 1Aregodure Derbe bakurirewu kae dukejere uture Listra bakurireuto. Nonore icare ia ure jorduwadowu iei Timóteo cedu mugure nono. Uce Judéia cristãorodo rema, uo Grécia kejeu rema. 2Awu imedu pemega remawu nure Listra, Icõnio kejewu Pao uwobe eegai. 3Du kodi icare Paulo aidure koduwo pudabo, mare ure biri kado jao, judeudoge eigoia, eiamedu jorduware uoie Grêcia kejewuie ure ema kodi. 4Ekodure kaewu bakurireuge etada ere boe eerduwado emeartoruwo apostolodoge mare Pao uwobe eimejerage ere boe eroiagudu Jerusalém tadaduji. 5Oinodu tabore Pao uwobe ere tubewudo tumeartoru tabo, ere cidodudo gu gu meri jameduji. 6Du kejere ere pagado Frígia moto kajeje, Galácia moto kajeje, mare ekodukare Asia moto kae, Aroe Pemegarewu aidukare kodi. 7Etaregodui Mísia moto kae dukeje, etaidure tugoduwo Bitínia moto kae, mare Pagimejera Jesus Utaroe Pemegarewu aidukare jamedu. 8Du kejere icare ere pagado goro goro tabo Mísia moto kajeje, icare ere turawuje Tróades bakurirewu padui pobo maerewu okwai du kae. 
Ere pagado Macedônia kae. 9Ia boeco jire Paulo unuiaore jordure ia Macedônia pijiwu imedu rakojei tuiegai, okwamagudi pudui duji, akore Amode pagado pobo maerewu okwa bakowu kae, amode akera braredo cei. 1 Awu unuiao akedu kejere icare akore cei cegoduwo toro Macedônia kae, ceerduware Pao makoi cewogai, cewo tuwadaru kogado nonowuge ewiegai duji kodi. 
Emugure Filipo bakurirewu tada. Lídia ure tumagu Pao ai. 1 Du kodi icare, nowu Tróade bakurirewu pijire icare cere cedaredo ika kurireuto, cegodure kuri toro Samotrácia kae, dupijire cegodure Necápoli kae. 1 Du pijire cegodure pugeje Macedônia kejewu kurire tumedage ekoriwu bakurirewu iei Filipo cedu kae. Awu Macedônia moto mugure Roma kejewuge ero kuda. Meri makakare cei nono. 1 Icare, nowu Sábado meriji, cere cedawuje nowu bakurirewu o baiporo piji toro pobo okwato, cemeardaere toroie pemegamode cenogwamaguduwo Pao ji kodi. Nonore icare cemugure, dutabore cereadodure ia areme etui pui nonodu biegai. 1 Ia emage ui mitodu, iei Lídia cedu, Tiatira bakurirewu pijiwudo, duwudore aroia akirodo tabo, pagudure Pao ji, biapaga nure cei, Paore uwabo jado biapaga pemegawo Paulo bataruji. 1 Du kodi icare ao pegododure, uwobe jamedu, dukejere okwamagudure cei, akore Tameardaemode imeartoruie Pao ji ma, taremo iwaito, tamugudo itabo. Icare ure cerodo ino rugadu. 
Braere Paulo mare Sila etugu baicoreuto. 1 Boekimorema, ia meri keje, cedui pagogwamagudure Pao ji kejewo kae dukeje, ia nogwaredu aregodure cedogi, brae etugareredo nure ema, duwudo, Paokare emawu iei Piton cedu utaroe meture tada, du kodire jorduware boe biareuji, dutabore ure cimejerage eno diiero maka makado. 1 Icare uture ceregodaji, Paulo rekodaji, tagoi oino dutabo: - Awu imere Aroe Eimejera Kurirewu utugaregere emage duwugere taerduwado baru kaewu awaraji. 1 Mako makore awu inoduji meri makaguragare tu tu tu je. Du inodu otobiji, Paulo korigodure ji, ure tuie kirimi bogai, icare makore nowu aroeji, akore Jesus Cristo ie tabo imago nure ai: atawuje piji. Kuri je dukejere icare ure tudawuje piji. 1 Boekimorema, nowu imejerage ere boe pa tumodukae tugeragu o diieroji pugeje duji. Du kodi icare ere tugeragu Paulo ji, Sila ji, ere erego toro brae eimejerage ere tudo pui tuwo tugogado boeiwo kae. 2 Du kejere ere brae eimejerage eerdudo ei, tagoi oino dutabo: - Awu imere judeudogere emage, enure pago bakurirewu tadawuge etago turugoduwo, enure boe eerduwado erowo nono Roma pijiwuge cegi cedaidukare, ceroiwakare jiboe reore. 2 Du kodi icare nowu bakurirewu tadawuge ere turagojedu turugoduwo ei. Icare brae eiemejerage ere boedo ekudae tawuje tuwo iwara to ei. 2 Ere iwara to ei dutabore ere ecebae kuricigodo, dukejere ere etugu baicoreuto, egore jeture eiwuji jetu pemegawo ei. 2 Nowure icare meartorure tugimejerage ewadaruji dukoiare ure etugu baicoreuto toro upo kae, ure ewure gogudo iku meriri tabo, ure nowu meriri iku kogudo ipo kajeje pugeje tuku. 2 Boekimorema, boeco oia keje, Paulo mare Sila enogwamagudu nure Pao ji, era nure Pao o roia pemegareuji; meture baicorewu tadawuge ewiapagare ei. 2 Kuri je dukejere icare, moto amagadu kuricigore, du kodire nowu baicorewu bure amagadure jamedu. Icare baiporodoge ere tuiado, mugure baicorewu tadawuge ewure kajejewu iku meriri ure tugiwuje jamedu. 2 Icare nowu jeture eiwu imedu jetadure, jordure baiporodoge ei tuiado duji, icare meardaere meture baicorewu tadawuge eregoduie marigudu duji. Icare ure toriga rairewu tawuje tuwo tuwido. 2 Macare Paulo oiogwarire ji, akore Akaba akogorido! Cemugure woe ceiamedu tabo. 2 Du kejere, nowu jeture eiwu makore jorugu bogai, icare ure turemo nowu baito, ure tuwu tai je Paulo mare Sila ewure paru. 3 Du kejere ure turagojedo, ure erego baawadu kae, unorare ei, akore Ikimejerage, inoba iromode iwo ikinorudo? 3 Icare egore ji Ameartorudo Pagimejera Jesus Cristo ji, dutabore amode akinorudo, aki awobe eiamedu tabo. 3 Icare ere Pao bataru kogado ji, uwobei jamedu. 3 Icare nowu boeco mitoduji, ure jetu pemegare ei, ure ecebae kabi. Kuri je dukejere icare ere ao pegodo jamedu. 3 Du kejere ure erego toro tuwai kae coboji, ure eke pemegado, icare jekare kuricigore, tuwobe eiamedu tabo, icai tumeartorui Pao jitu koia. 3 Barogwatore icare brae eimejerage ere ia tugobaigarege emagodo ji. Nowu ime etawuje, etudo. 3 Icare nowu jeture baicorewu jiwu imedu readodure Paulo biegai, akore Nowu ikimejerage emagore iwiegai iwo taginorudo, du kodi icare tadawuje, tadudo boe butugurewu tabo. 3 Macare Paulo akore Roma kejewugere cegi, du kodi karega ere iwara to cei boe eegai, icare ere cedugu baicoreuto tukai tugogado cei dutabo. Macare oino ere cedo cedawuje oino podu tabo. Umodukare ino! Etuwo mato cedae, ewo cegiwuje tugera tabo ewo cedawuje awu piji. 3 Icare nowu tugobaigarege ereadodure nowu bataruji nowu brae eimejerage ewiegai, duwugere epagudugodure tumeardui Roma kejewugeie emage. 3 Icare eture toro etae, emagore ei butugu tabo, emagore ewo tuwudugugo pudui, enogwamagudure ei etuwo nowu bakurirewu piji. 4 Icare ere tudawuje nowu bakurirewu piji, dukejere icare ere turemo Lídia uwaito, du tadare eerdure tuwiemagei, ere emeardu awadudo pudui pugeje, dukejere eture nowu bakurirewu piji. 

Paulo mare Sila emugui Tessalônica kejedu. 1Ere pagado Anfípoli bakurirewu kajeje, dukejere ere pagado Apolônia bakurirewu kajeje, icare etaregodure Tessalônica bakurireuto. Nonore judeudoge ia eno sinagoga mugure. 2Icare Paulo uture etae turorewoji, icare makore ei, emagore ji, emagore pui puibagi, sabadore ei pobe ma jewu metuia bokware. 3Readodure ewiegai, ure eerduwado Pao o bapera tabo uie turugadu Cristowo tuiwodo dukeje tuiewoduwo bireuge epiji duji. - Awu ireadodure tawiegaiwu Jesus, emare Cristo rema. Oinore akore ei. 4Icare ia emage emeartorure Pao ji, ere tumedagedo Paulo, Sila magece. Ia judeukare emawu makareuge duwugere emeartorure Pao ji marigudu, mare ia areme kurireuge, ere tumedagedo emage jamedu. 5Icare judeudoge ekorire ei, ere ia ime eto pui dutabore icare ere boedo turagojedo turugoduwo ei. Icare eture Jason uwai kae, ere turemo to, tuiemarui ewogai tuwo emagu boe etai ewo ewido. 6Mare eerdukare ei nono, du kodi icare ere tugeragu Jason ji, ia Pao uwobe ebo, icare ere erego toro brae eiemejerage eegai egore Awuge ere boedo turugoduwo pui boe jamedu boe keje. Icare emugure oino woe. Icare Jason ure tugeragu ei tuwai tada. 7Eiamedu etonare pagimejera kurirewu Cesar ji, tui ia eimejera kurirewu mugudo mugato, dure Jesus reno. 8Awu tuwadaru tabore ere boe ekorigo, ere eiemejerage ekorigo. 9Macare Jason mare ia uwobe ere diiero maku etai, dukejere ere etudo. 1 Icare, boeco aregodure dukeje, Pao uwobe ere Paulo mare Sila etudo Beréia bakurirewu kae. Etaregodure to dukejere icare ere turemo judeudoge ere tudo pui tumagowo Pao bataruji tadawu baito. 1 Awu judeudoge epemega kodure nowu Tessalônica tadawuge epemega kori, du kodi icare ere tugeragu Pao bataruji taidu kuricigo tabo. Eemarure Pao o bapera keje umode ino rugadu du bogai. 1 Makareuge emeartorure Pao ji, ia judeukare emawu areme kurireuge emeartorure jamedu, ia ime makareuge emeartorure jamedu. 1 Macare nowu Tessalôica kejewu judeudoge ere boe pa Pauloie Pao bataru kogado Beréia keje duji, dukoiare icare eture toro tuwo nowu boe erugo ji pugeje. 1 Du kodi icare Pao uwobe ere Paulo utudo nowu piji toro pobo maerewu okwa kae. Sila mare Timóteo emugure nono. 1 Uture Paulo apowuge ere reko Atenas bakurirewu kae, dupijire ere tugirimi tuibagi, icare emagore Sila mare Timóteo ewiegai Paulo bataruji, etuwo tuwogai kuri je. 
Paulo uwadodae Atenas kejedu. 1 Paulo paga nure tumedage ewogai Atenas bakurirewu keje, du tonajire icare kiarigodu kuricigore tuiordui boe emugui Paokare emawuge ekuda duji kodi. 1 Meri jameduji mako makore judeudogei, meartorure Pao jiwu judeukare emawugei, jordure ji bororo jiwugei jamedu. 1 Ia jorduwareuge, epicureuge, estoicodoge emagore ji. Iage egore Kaba jiba awu mako paga pagarewu akoino? Iage egore Readodu nure Aroe Eimejerage maiwugei rakudu. 1 Du kodi icare ere tugeragu ji, ere reko toro pudabo, jorduwareuge ewai kae, icare egore ji amagodo kakoduwu bataru maiwu jiba akagoino? 2 Cemeardure aiabiji jiboe ure tuginoi ceegai. Cedaidure ceerduwawo kaboba jiba akagoino. 2 Paga karega, Atenas kejewuge, aregodure Atenas kaewuge, erokare ia turo, mare etaidure tuiorduwawo kakoduwu bataru maiwu jiboe egoino tu je. 2 Icare Paulore turagojedo nowu jorduwareuge ewai oiabiji, akore Atenas kejewu ime, inure boe pa tameartoru kuricigoi Aroe Eimejerage eiduji. 2 Imerure tago bakurirewu kao, dutabore iordure tare tabujodo jiwu tagoroei, icare itaregodure ia tago Aroe Eimejera muga kae dukejere atugododure oino: - Boe eerduwakare jiwu Aroe Eimejera ai. Oino. Ica, tare tabujodo ji taerduwakai jitu tabowu Aroe Eimejera jire ireadodu nure tawiegai. 2 Ure awu moto towuje, ure mugure kejewu boe jamedu boe towujewu Pao Kurirewu rema. Ore awu moto, awu baru rema. Mugukare ime ere towujewu baidoge etada. 2 Makokare boewo tugerabraredo pudui, okeakare iaboe bogai iaboe bogai. Emare ure boe eiamedu jedo, ure ake arego boe eiamedu ja piji, ure boe jamedu boe maku boe etai. 2 Ure ime eiamedu botudo ia imedu mito tu je dupiji, emuguwo awu moto jamedu boe kao. Ure eno joru, eno moto ure remagu etai. 2 Aidure boe eiamedu boe eemaruwo Pao Kurirewu bogai, etaregoduwo ae, eerduwo ji. Ica, Pao Aroe Eimejera mugu jaekare pai. 2 Paga karega, tadare pamugure, tadare pamagadure, tadare paragojere. Umagai ia tageroia epa akore pagi jamedu uwobere pagi. 2 Kode Pao Kurirewu uwobere pagi dukeje, pameardaemodukare Pao Kurireuie nono meriri ekurewu, iarema meriri kigadurewu, iarema imere towuje tuiorduwa tabowu tori mori kurirewu reore. 3 Mare Pao Kurirewu aiwokare ime eerduwakai puduidu kodiwoji. Oino mako nure padure boe jamedu boe kejewu ime eiamedu bogai ewo tugirimi pudae tuibagi. 3 Jorduware tumode tugogado awu moto kejewu ime eiamedu boe ji du kejewu meriji. Aidure tuwo tugogado ime eiamedu boe ji ia imedu mito tu jewu maragodae tabo. Ure awu inodu awadudo boe eegai, tui nowu imedu jewodudo bireuge epiji dutabo. 3 Icare emeardure makoi boe ewodumodeduji dukeje, ia emage ewadarurerure ji, iage egore Pi ji jao, ia boe keje cemeardumode awu akoinoduji pugeje. 3 Du kodi icare Paulore tudawuje epiji. 3 Boekimorema, ia ime enogwaceradu Paulo jaogwai, emeartorure bataruji, duwuge etada Dionísio jorduwa rakarewu mugure, mare ia aredu iei Dêmaris mare iage emugure jamedu. 
Paulo mugui Corinto kejedu. 1Nowu inodu rekodajire icare Paulore tudawuje Atenas bakurirewu piji, icare uture Corinto bakurirewu kae. 2Nonore jordure ia judeu iei Aquila cedu, Ponto pijiwu, oreduje apo duji, Awuge etaregodure maigodu Itália piji. Brae eimejera kurirewu iei Cláudio cedu ure judeudoge eiamedu edo tudawuje Roma piji kodi. Icare Paulore tumedagedo emage. 3Emaragodaere pureore, du kodi icare mugure ebo, maragodu nure ebo jamedu (Ere aroia bai towuje brae ewaice). 4Sábado jameduji mako makore sinagoga bai tada, ure tubewudo tuwo judeudoge, gregodoge emeartorudo. 5Du kejere icare Sila, mare Timóteo etaregodure Macedônia moto piji. Icare Paulore tumagu tuiamedu tabo tuwo Pao bataru kogado, mako makore judeudoge ewiegai Jesusie ure Cristo rema duji. 6Nowugerema emeartorukare, emago pegare ji, du kodi icare ure tugudae aroia jukodo ei, akore ei Tagu butuwo taiogi. Ikera rorogodukare. Ica, awu otobiji iemarumode judeukare emawuge ewogai. 7Icare ure tudawuje nowu piji, ure turemo ia judeukare emawu meartorure Pao jiwu iei Tito Jetororewu cedu uwaito, uwai mugure nowu sinagoga bai meki. 8Du inodu tabo ia imedu iei Crispo cedu, nowu sinagoga bai kejewuge eimejera, meartorure Pao ji uwobe apo du kodire, Corinto bakurirewu tadawu ia makareuge emeardure Paulo bataruji, emeartorure jamedu, icare etao pegododure. 9Icare ia boecoji Pao makore Paulo ji unuiao pemegarewu tada, akore Apagudu kaba, amagodo boe ji, amago bokwa kaba. Ica, iragojere akabo. 1 Iaboe iaboe emodukare tuburedo ai tuwo akogorido, iwobe emagare awu bakurirewu tada du kodi. 1 Paulo rakojere nono joru mito, ari ikera awubodure mito taci ikera awubowuto, unure boe eerduwado Pao bataruji. 
Paulo rakojei brae eimejera jekaidu. 1 Nowu Acaia moto kejewuge eimejera Galião rema, dutabore nowu judeudoge ere turagojedo tuiamedu tabo Paulo togi. Icare ere tugeragu ji, ere reko brae eiemejera ae, egore 1 Awu imedu ure boedo tubujodo ia Aroe Eimejera ukai nono judeudoge eroiagudu reoreduji. 1 Icare Paulo aidure tumagowo, macare nowu brae eimejera Galião makore judeudogei, akore Awu inodu umode ia boe ero pegarewu rugadu dukeje, umode turugadu iwiapagawo tai. 1 Mare taerduwa reno, taroiagudu reno, du kodire tagire tamode tagogado ji. Itaidukare iwo ikogado awu inoduji. 1 Icare ure etudo nowu bai piji. 1 Du kodi icare eiamedure tugeragu Sostenes ji, nowu sinagoga kejewuge eimejera, ere boe to ji nowu brae eiemejera jekai. Du tabore nowu brae eiemejera Galião makokare iaboeji. 
Pauloi tugirimi Antioquia kaedu. 1 Paulo mugure Corinto tada biega tu je kimo, dukejere ure tugimadudo nowu Pao uwobe epiji, icare uture ika kurirewu tabo Síria moto kae. Priscila, mare Aquila ekodure apo jamedu. Mare etaregodumode Síria kaedu otodai, Paulo rakojere jao Cencréia ba kurirewu tada tuwo tao rawuje, ia boe keje makore Pao ji oinoie turomode pudui du kodi. 1 Du kejere etaregodure feso bakurirewu kae du tadare ure nowuge ei pobedu mugudo nono. Emare ure turemo sinagoga baito du tadare makore nowu judeudogei. 2 Awuge enogwamagudure ji muguwo nono ebo kimo, mare aidukare. 2 Imadure ebo tuberabiji, akore Imode ikirimi tawogai Pao aidumode dukeje. Du kejere icare uture nowu feso piji. 2 Uture jii Cesaréia moto kae, icare ruture Jerusalém bakurirewu kae, cimaduwo nowu Pao uwobe ebo, dupijire kuri je ure turawuje Antioquia kae. 2 Nonore mugure biega tu je, dukejere uture pugeje ure pagado Galácia moto kajeje, icare ure pagado Frígia moto kajeje, tui Pao uwobe emeardu awadudo pudui dutabo. 
Apolo maragodae feso kejedu. 2 Du tonajire icare ia judeu iei Apolo cedu, ia Alexandria pijiwu imedu, mako pemegarewu, jorduwa kuricigore Pao bataru jiwu imedu, aregodure feso bakurireuto. 2 Emare jorduwa rakare Pao utawaraji, mako kuricigore tumeardae pemegarewu tabo Jesus jiboeji, jorduware João o boe etao pegoji tu rugadu kodi karega. 2 Du kodire makore nowu sinagoga bai tada tubagudu bokwa tabo. Icare Priscila, Aquila emeardure ji, du kodi icare ere ko pudabo ere Pao utawara awadudodu pemegado jekai. 2 Icare aidure tuduwo Acáia moto kae, du kodi icare feso tadawu meartorureuge ere meardu awadudo pudui, ere aidudo, ere bapera atugodo nowu Acáia kejewu meartorureuge etai ewo tugeragu ji. Tumugui toro dutabore ure tugera braredodu kuricigodo nowu meartorureugei Pao o boe pemegarewu koia. 2 Ure tumago rakado judeudoge ewadaru jipagi boe eegai, tui eerduwado, Pao o bapera tabo, Cristoie ure Jesusce duji. 

Feso kejewu Joãore jorduwadowuge. 1Apolo mugui Corinto bakurirewu tada du tonaji, Paulore pagado mugure cobojiwu moto kajeje, icare aregodure feso bakurireuto. Nonore jordure ia meartorureugei, unorare ei, akore 2Nowu tameartorure boetoji du kodiboe keje, Aroe Pemegarewu makudure tagai? 3Icare egore ji Boro. Mare cemeardukare Aroe Pemegareuie ure duji jamedu. 3. Icare Paulo akore Kode, kakoduwu boe etao pegododu taboba tagao pegore? Egore João o boe etao pego tabore cedao pegododure. 4Icare Paulo akore Joãore boe etao pegodo boe eedorore tabowu boe etao pego tabo, makore boe ji emeartoruwo aregodumode turegodajiwu imeduji, duwure Jesus rema. 5Emeardure awu inodu jitu kejere icare etao pegododure Pagimejera Jesus ie tabo. 6Icare Paulore tugera bu ewugeje, dukejere Aroe Pemegarewu ure turawuje ewugeje. Icare emagore boe ewadaru tuginoiwuji, emagore Pao bataruji jamedu. 7Nowu ime ere pagera pudogidure ere pobe pugeje. 
Pao uwobe ei tuguo feso bakurirewu tadadu. 8Icare Paulore turemo sinagoga baito du tadare readodure Pao bataruji tubagudu bokwa tabo, Arire pobe ma jewu metuia bokware duji, ure eerduwado Pao o boe pemegareuji. 9Mare ia emage emeartorukare, ewabo rakare, emago pega kuricigore Pao bataruji boe eegai, du kodi icare Paulore tuiaedo ei. Icare ure meartorureuge eto pui pudabo, ure eerduwado meri jameduji, ia imedu iei Tirano cedu uwai tada. 1 Oinore ure jorui pobedu keje. Du kodire Asia kejewuge eiamedu boe, judeudoge, judeukare emawuge emeardure Pao bataruji. 1 Paore turo kurirewu towuje towuje Paulo iera tabo. Du kodire ere jore Paulo jiwu kigadurewu aroiarogu, mare ia aroia boe reko kogodureuge etai. 1 Du keje epemegagodure, Aroe pegareure tudawuj tumedure tadawuge epiji jamedu. 1 Boekarema, ia judeudoge, duwugere Aroe pegareuge ewarigu boe epiji jamedu, emerure nono, icare ere tumeardae tawuje tuwo Aroe pegareuge ewarigu Jesus ie tabo Aroe pegarewu meture tadawuge epiji. Icare egore Aroe pegarewu dogei Cenure tado etadawuje Paulo readodure jiwu Jesus ie tabo. 1 Rore oinowugere ia sacerdote judeu iei Scevas cedu ore nure emage. 1 Macare Aroe pegarewu akore ewadaru jipagi, akore Iorduware Jesus ji, iorduware Paulo ji, tagirema, kakoduwuge tagiba? 1 Du tabore nowu Aroe pegarewu meture tadawu imedu ure taredo ewugeje, ure etogorido, dukoiare eregodure nowu bai piji, togoridodu tabo, tugudae aroia mega mega rogu tabo. 1 Awu bakaru aregodure nowu mugure feso bakurirewu tadawu judeudoge eiamedu boe, gregodoge eiamedu boe etae. Icare eiamedu pagudugodu kuricigore. Kodi icare ere Pagimejera Jesus ie kurido. 1 Icare makareuge etaregodure tumagowo turo pegareuji. 1 Ia makareuge emaragodure Aroe pegareuge ebo, duwugere to bapera arego, ere kowu boe eiamedu jekai. Nowu baperadoge emori kuricigore kodi karega. 2 Oinore Pao bataru ure tugidado, ure taododu kuricigodo. 
Paulo mearudae. 2 Du kejere Paulo aidure tuduwo Jerusalemto, mare umode pagado Macedônia moto kajeje, Acáia moto kajeje jao. Icare akore Imugumode toro (Jerusalém keje) dukeje umode turugadu ituwo Roma bakurirewu kae jorduwo ji. 2 Ure tumedage Timóteo mare Erosto ei pobedu etudo Macedônia kae, pudumire mugure eiageje Asia moto keje jao. 
Meriri kigadurewu epage erugodui Paulo jidu. 2 Nowu du kodi ia boe pegarewu ure tuguo Pao bataruji. 2 Ia imedu meriri kigadurewu epa iei Demétrio cedu duwure aroe eimejerago pagareudo iei Diana cedu uwai meriri kigadurewu rogudoge etowuje, dutabore ure tumedage edo tugeragu mori kuricigoreuji. 2 Icare ure nowu tumedage meriri epage eto pui, akore ei Taerduware pai pageragu du kuricigoie diieroji awu pamaragodae morice duji. 2 Macare taerdure, tameardu nure awu Paulo akoi makareuge ewiegai, imere towujewu aroe eimejerageie, aroe eimejerage kaegae. Ure awu feso tadawuge eiamedu boce kodi emeartorudo tagoino duji. 2 Awu imedu pemegakare pai, pamaragodae umode tubegado. Boe emeartorumodukare pagimejerago Diana Kurireudo uwaiji pugeje. Cewu Asia kejewuge eiamedu, moto kejewuge eiamedu ere tubujodo jekaiwu pagimejerago Diana biegamode pugeje. 2 Kodi icare, awu bataru koiare ure enogorawu boe kori tabo, du kodire enoiogwarigodure, egore feso kejewuge eimejerago Diana kuricigore. 2 Icare nowu bakurirewu tadawuge eiamedu boe ere turagojedo eregodure nowu bai kurirewu kae, ere tugeragu Caio ji, Aristarco ji, duwugere Paulo metagere emage, Macedônia moto pijiwugere emage. 3 Paulo aidure tuwo boe eerdudo pudui, mare metage etaidukare rowo ino. 3 Ia Asia kejewuge eiemejarage duwugere tumeduiado ema marigudu, ere bakaru maku bogai jamedu utukawo nowu bakurirewu kae. 3 Nowu boe etui puidu pega remawu nure: enoiogwarire jice woje, jice woje, mare eiamedu jorduwakare kodiba turagojere nono duji. 3 Du kejere ere ia judeu iei Alexandre cedu tawuje tubiji, metage ere tugera jodo keje tuwo rakojedo boe etogea keje makowo boe ji. Icare Alexandre ure tugera awogado boe eegai tumagowo. 3 Mare boe eerdure judeuie ure emaduji, dukeje eiamedu oiogwarire jii je horare pobe duji, egore feso kejewuge eimejerago Diana kuricigo remawu nure. Oinore egore tu tu tu je. 3 Du keje, nowu bakurirewu tadawuge eimejera rekodajiwu aregodure tuwo boe ewudugugo. Akore feso tadawuge tagi, ime eiamedure eerduware awu feso bakureuie akarurewu Diana kurido, eiamedu boe eerduware Diana ureurewu meriri butuie baru piji duji. 3 Iaboe iaboe emodukare tuiorduwa bokwado awu inoduji, du kodire ure turugadu tawudugugoduwo, tarokawo ia taro tameardae bokwa tabo. 3 Awu tare tageragu jiwu ekare tagimejerago pegado, emago pega karega ure ji. 3 Kode, Demétrio iarema ia metage etaidure tumagowo iaboe rogu boeji iaboe ji ma, boe eimejerage ewai mugure nono, jadodure, eimejerage emugure nono jamedu, emode tugogado ei. 3 Tagaidure tamagowo iaboeji ma, boe eimejerage emode tugogado. 4 Boe puredumode pai boewo parego brae eimejerage etae awu ure tudowuje awuji oinono dukoia. Paga karega, boe kodiboe bokware awu boe enogo kuricigoi pui turugoduwo pui, tokiwo pui, togoriwo pui du bogai. 4 Nowu bataru koiare icare nowu boe etui puidu ure taodo, akedure. 

Paulo utui Macedônia kaedu, Grécia kaedu. 1Nowu boe enogoi puidu akedu keje, Paulore tumedage eto pui pudae, icare makore ei; dukeje imadure ebo tudui epiji toro Macednia kae dutabo. 2Merure nowu moto kao jii je, ure Pao uwobe eerduwado tumago kuricigo tabo, dukejere aregodure Grécia moto kae. 3Nonore rakojere arire pobe ma jewu metuia bokware. Uiagu taredo ika kurireuto tuduwo Sria moto kae, du tonajire judeudogere jorubo reko utawaraji. Du kodi icare ure tugirimi tuibagi Macedônia moto kae. 4Ia metage ekodure apo, duwugere Sápatro, Beréia moto pijiwu, Pitro onaregedu, mare Aristarco, mare Segundo, Tessalônica pijiwuge, mare Gaio, Derbe pijiwu, mare Timóteo, mare Títico, mare Trófico, Asia pijiwuge. 5Awugere eture cedododai, icare epagare cewogai Tróade bakurirewu keje. 6Cegirema cemugure nono jao. Icare, Páscoa akedu keje, cere cedaredo ika kurireuto, nowu Filipo bakurirewu piji toro Tróade kae etae. Nonore ceragojere semanare mito. 7Nowu semana boetojiwu meriji cere cedo pui cewo Pao o amirewu kowuje. Icare Paulore tuduiagu nowu piji nowu meri rekodajiwuji, du kodire mako makore nowu Pao uwobei, makore ei jii boeco oia kae tu... 8Jorugu makare nono cemugure tadawu bai tada. 9Boekimorema, ia iparedu iei Eutico cedu, muguradu ia baiporo koborigodu keje, icare unudure, Paulo mako tonaji. Nori kori remawu nure jokuji du kodire buture baire pobe ma awu metuia bokware dupiji moto kae, nori kori koia. Icare bire. Ere tugeragu ji bi inoduji. 1 Icare Paulore turawuje ae, ure tumegido bukeje, ure tugeragu ji tugana pobe dutabo, ure bu todogajeje, akore Tamorora amagadu kaba, jeere pugeje. 1 Icare ruture pugeje, dukejere mako raire ei pugeje jii barogwa kododu kae. 1 Nowu iparedu rema, ere reko, je inodu tabo, tuiegare kuricigo tabo. 1 Icare cere cedaredo ika kurireuto, icare cegodure Assos bakurirewu kae; Paulorema uture moto kajeje. Assos keje cebagare bogai, taidu rekodaji. 1 Nowu Assos bakurirewu kaere icare aregodure cedae, cere cegeragu ji ika kurirewu tada dutabore cegodure Mitilene bakurirewu kae. 1 Du pijire cegodure pugeje nowu pobo maerewu kajeje pugeje. Barogwatore icare cedaregodure Quios bakurirewu kae. Nowu meri rekodajiwuji pugeje cedaregodure Samos bakurirewu kae. Barogwato pugeje icare cedaregodure Mileto bakurireuto. 1 Paulo kiarire tuduwo feso bakurireuto, tumugu raikawo Asia moto keje, akere ji taregoduwo Jerusalém kae tuwo Pentecostes o peta ko. 
Paulo uwadodae feso kejewu codudoge ewiegaiwu. 1 Mare nowu Mileto mito dupijire makore feso tadawu Pao uwobe eimejerage ewogai. 1 Icare etaregodure ae, ere tuiamedu to pui, dukejere icare akore ei Taerduware inoba iro irore tai boe jaeduji jii ire iremo awu Asia moto kaewu boetojiwu meri otobiji. 1 Imaragodure Pao ai, ire iwiegado tu je dutabo, itoragudu tabo, judeudoge ere mugudo inaiwu jorubo oiagi. 2 Taerduware ikae umode turugadu tagaiboe iaboe iaboe pijido, ikare biado, mare ire awadudo tawiegai boe eegai tawai otoji duji. 2 Inogituware judeudogei, inogituware judeukare emawugei, ewo tugirimi tuibagi Pao ae, emeartoruwo pagimejera Jesus Cristo ji. 2 Oinore icare Aroe Pemegareure tumugudo ikeje ikoduwo Jerusalemto, mare iorduwakare iwo aidugirimode toroduji. 2 Iorduware tu jiboe reo aroe Pemegarewu ure ido boe pa itu iture kaewu bakurirewu jamedu kejeie, baicorewu, boe ecebae epagare iwogaiduji. 2 Mare ipagudukare iaboeji iaboeji, ipagudukare iwiwo. Umode turugadu iwo Pagimejera Jesusre maku inaiwu imaragodae akedudo, umode turugadu ireadoduwo o boe pemegarewu akaruji. 2 Oino iorduware taiamedu taboie, duwuge etoiagire imeru imerure ireadodui Pao o boe pemegareuji, taerdumodukare ii pugeje duji. 2 Du kodire inagoino tawiegai ia tagi tawogwamode ma, boe jomodukere iwugeje. 2 Paga karega, ikiarikare imagowo tawiegai Pao aidure jiboeji. 2 Taeto tai, taeto Aroe Pemegareure maku tagaiboeji. Aroe Pemegarewu ure boe eimejeragedo tagi taetuwo Pao uwobei, duwuge ure etaru Tonaregedu ku tabo. 2 Iorduware iiagejeie icare riedoge emode turemo tado, tuwo barege pemegareuge ewido. 3 Jamedu ime pegareuge emode turemo tadoda jamedu duwugere emode bakaru pegarewu kogado, tuwo Pao uwobe erego pudabo. 3 Tameardu awadudo tai, tawiagodu kaba jorure pobe ma awu metuia bokwaredu meriji boecoji inogituware tai tu tu tu je, itoragudu tabo, ikiarigodu tabo. 3 Oinore icare inure tamagu Pao ai, inure tamagu Pao o bataru pemegare ai, emare jorduware tuwo tarijodudo, roiware tuwo tamugudo pemegareuge etada. 3 Imagokare iaboeji meriri ekurewu bogai, meriri kigadurewu bogai du kare. 3 Taerduware awu ikera tabore imaragodure iwo ikerogudo, iwo ikudae rogudo, iwo imedage ekerogudo jamedu. 3 Jii je ire taerduwado uie turugadu pamaragoduwo, pawo pagerabraredo roiwakareugei du bogai, uwo nono Pagimejera bataru reore nowu ure boe makuwu jekare kodure nowu boe makudure aiwu jekare kori. 3 Awu tuwadaru rekodajire icare Paulore tubujodo mototo, okwamagudure Pao ji ebo. 3 Rakojere nonowuge eiamedu etoragudugodure, icare ere todomo Paulo kajeje, imadui puabo du tonaji. 3 Ekiarigodu kuricigore Paulo akore ei eerdumodukae pudui pugeje du kodi. Icare eture apo toro ika kurirewu kae. 

Paulo aregodui Tiro bakurirewu kaedu. 1Cedure epiji dukeje cere cedaredo ika kurireuto, dutabore cegodure Cós bakurirewu kae. Barogwatore icare cegodure pugeje Rodes bakurirewu kae, dupijire cegodure pugeje Pátara bakurirewu kae. 2Nonore ceerdure kodumode Fenícia kaewu ia ika kurireuji. I, care cere cedaredo to, dutabore cegodure cenodobiji. 3Icare ceerdure ia pobo aiare tabowu moto iei Chipre ceduji, okwacere woje cegana koborewu jaogwai; cegodure kori toro Síria moto kae. Icare cedaregodure ia bakurirewu mugui pobo okwai iei Tiro cedu kae. Nonore boe emode nowu ika kurirewu biorodo, du kodire cerudure moto kae nono. 4Nonore ceerdure ia Pao uwobei, du kodi icare cere cemugudo ebo merire ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto; Aroe Pemegarewu jore ewugeje, dukoiare enogituware Paulo ji rutu kawo Jerusalemto. 5Nowu merire ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowutodu akedure dukejere icare cegodure cedawaraji pugeje. Eiamedu rore taci cedabo tuwiremage ebo, tore ebo jii bakurirewu kujeto. Du kejere cere cebujodo nowu kugaru keje icare cenogwamagudure Pao ji. 6Du keje icare cegimadure ebo, icare cere cedaredo ika kurireuto, emage ere tugirimi tuwai kae. 7Cegodure ika kurirewu tabo nowu Tiro bakurirewu piji jii ia bakurirewu iei Ptolomaida cedu kae. Nonore cegimadure cewiemage ebo, icare cemugure ebo nowu meriji. 
Profeta Agabo akore Paulo jiboe Cesareia kejedu. 8Barogwatore icare cegodure pugeje, icare cedaregodure Cesareia bakurireuto pugeje. Du kejere cere ceremo Filipe uwaito. Emare Pao bataru epa rema, nowu diaconodoge ei sete ia emage nure ema. Icare cemugure uwai tada. 9Ore areme ere pobe puibiji duwuge emugukare imedu apo roga; emagere emago emagore Pao bataruji. 1 Cemugure nono meri makakare, dukeje ia profeta aregodure Judéia piji, iere Agabo. 1 Aregodure mato cewogai, dukejere icare ure tugeragu Paulo peagajejewu, dutabore ure tugeragogudo tabo, ure tuwure gogudo tabo, icare akore Oinore Aroe Pemegarewu akore Oinore judeudoge emode ore awu boe epeagajejewu iera gogudo, buregogudo, emode maku judeukare emawuge ekera kai toro Jerusalém tada. 1 Awu bataru koiare icare cegi mare mugure nonowu Pao uwobe cenogwamagudure ji rutu kawo Jerusalemto. 1 Mare Paulo akore Kodiba tagoragudure? Icare tare ikiarigodu kuricigodo! Ica, inure irugadu boewo ikeragogudo, boewo iwido jamedu Pagimejera Jesus ie koia. 1 Icare cewadaru iwakare rutu kawo toro. Du kodire cemagokare ji pugeje, icare cemagore Boewo nono Pao aidu reore. 1 Meri makakare dukejere icare cere cerugadu cemeruwo, icare cerudure Jerusalém kae. 1 Cesaréia tadawu ia pawobe ekodure cedabo, duwuge ere cerego ia Chipre pijiwu imedu iei Menason cedu uwai kae, nonore cenudumode. 
Paulo rakojei Jerusalém tadadu. 1 Icare cedaregodure Jerusalemto, dukejere pawiemage ere tugeragu cei tuiegare tabo taidu tabo. 1 Barogwatore icare Paulo uture cedabo Tiago uwai kae, nonore icare nowu Pao uwobe eimejerage eiamedure tudo pui nono cedaregodu kae. 1 Icare Paulo imadure ebo, icare readodure ewiegai Pao rore judeukare emawuge etai tugera tabowu jamedu jiboeji. 2 Emeardui awu inodu jamedu jitu koiare ere Pao kurido, icare emagore Paulo ji, egore Cemana, aerdu pemega nure, awu judeudoge makareuge duwugere emeartorure Pao bataruji tukai judeudoge eroiagudu pijido dutabo duji. 2 Emagere emeardure boe egoi akie are nowu mugure judeukare emawuge etadawu judeudoge eerduwado ewo tugera ra Moisés piji, akagoi ei: ekawo tore ewiri kado, erokawo nono judeudoge eroiagudu reore. 2 Inoba paromode? Eerduwamode akaregoduie rugadu. 2 Kode, arodo nono cemagomode ai du reore. Imere pobe puibiji woe, tuwo tumorido Pao ai. 2 Eko akabo, aedorodo ebo, mori maku eparu tabo tuwo etao rawuje. Du tabore eiamedu boe eerduwamode tumeardure jiwu aiboe boe kaegae, aki jamedu aroie nono judeudoge eroiagudu reore. 2 Judeukare emawu meartorureuge eiboe rema, cere bapera atugodo etai, ewo tugera ra tui mori maku aroe eimejerage pagareuge etai dupiji, ekawo ake todure towu barege eku ekodu kowuje, ekera keadu kawo jamedu. 2 Barogwatore icare Paulo kodure nowu ime ebo, icare ure tuiedorodo ebo, ure turemo Pao uwaito, nonore icare ure remagu umode mori maku tubaru tabowu eparu tabowu moriji. 2 Merire pagera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto dukeje, ia judeudoge etaregodui Asia moto piji, eerdure Paulo ji nowu Pao uwai tada, du kodire ere boe erugo ji. Ere tugeragu ji, icare enoiogwarire. 2 Egore Judeudoge, tagerabraredo cei! Mako pagare cewobei, Pao uwaiji, ceroiagudu boe jiwu imedu reo! Emareo! Unure Grécia pijiwu ime edo turemo Pao uwaito jamedu, tui pegado dutabo. 2 Egore oino, eerdure Trofimo, feso pijiwu, kodui apo bakurirewu tada duji, dukoiare emeardaere uie turemo Pao uwaito, kodire egoino. 3 Mugure nowu bakurirewu tadawuge eiamedu boe emorora amagadure, icare ere tudo puidu emagaguragare. Ere tugeragu Paulo ji, ere reko oino motoji Pao uwai piji toro baawadu kae, icare Pao uwai porodoge ere tumi pi tuku peragajeje. 3 Etaidure tuwo bito, mare iage ere tugobaigarege eimejera bie Jerusalém tadawuge eiameduie turagojedo turugoduwo. 3 Du kodire icare kuri je ure tugobaigarege mare ia tugobaigarege eimejerage eko pudabo toro rugodureuge etae. Awugerema, eerdui nowu tugobaigarege eimejera aregodui tudugarege eboduji dukeje kuri je, ere tugera ra tui boe to Paulo jitu piji. 3 Icare nowu tugobaigarege eimejera ure tuburedo Paulo ji, ure tugeragu ji, ure tudugarege edo ieragogudo meriri iku pobe dutabo. Icare unorare boe ji iogudubabao, kaboba jiba ro oino. 3 Eiamedu boe enoiogwarire jice woje, jice woje, du kodire roiwakare tuiorduwawo nowu boe enogoi pui dukoia. Du kodi icare ure tudugarege edo reko baicorewu rakareuto. 3 Icare Paulo aregodui bai kurirewu o escala kae dukeje, tugobaigarege ere tudugu ji tuietuwo ji boe ekorii ji tu piji. 3 Nowu boe makareuge ekodure rekodaji toiogwari tabo, tagoi oino dutabo: - Bito rugau. 3 Umode turemo nowu baicorewu rakarewu to dukeje, Paulo unoragodure nowu tugobaigarege eimejeraji, akore ji Awudugugo ii biegatu je, imagowo boe ji jao. Nowu tugobaigarege eimejera akore Aerduware gregodoge ewadaruji? 3 Nowu Egito pijiwu imedu, duwure boe erugo pui marigudu, icare ure rugodurewu ime ei quatro mil reko pudabo boe matadu kaewu aki kanao? 3 Icare Paulo akore judeu nure imi, Cilécia moto kejewu bakurirewu iei Tarso cedu pijiwu nure imi, inogwamagudu nure ai awo imagodo boe ji. 4 Icare nowu tugobaigarege eimejera ure makodo. Icare Paulo, turagojei nowu escala keje dupiji, ure tugera aogado boe ji, icare boe makodure pi tuku. Icare makore ei hebreudoge ewadaru tabo, akore.

Paulo uwadodae judeudoge ewiegaidu. - 1Imanamage, iwiemage, iogamage, tawiapagado iwadaruji: ireadodumode tawiegai kodiba iro oino. 2Emeardure makoi hebreudoge ewadaruji dukejere ewiapaga awadure ji. 3Icare akore pugeje Judeu nure imi. Cilécia moto kejewu bakurirewu iei Tarso cedu kejere iwodure, mare irijodure awu bakurirewu tada, nowu jorduwa rakarewu iei Gamaliel cedu bure paru iorduwadodure paomage eroji. Pao Kurirewu jaogwaire inogwacere tareore, tare tagogwacere Pao jaogwai jii oino jamedu, du reorere ire ino jamedu marigudu. 4Marigudu itonare Cristo metagei iwo ewido. Ire ikeragu meartorure Cristo jiwu imei, aremei, ire erego baicoreuto. 5Sacerdotedoge eimejerage mare boe eimejerage eerduware iro oinoduji. Ere bapera maku inai iwo reko Damasco kejewu judeudoge etae, icare iture nowu bakurirewu kae iwo ikeragu meartorureuge emugui toro duji, iwo erego Jerusalém kae boewo eedorodo. 6Boekimorema, ikodui awaraji, puredu tu Damasco bakurireuji, meri jetui pagaia keje dutabo, icare baru pijiwu ia urugureboe kuricigorewu ure itaiado pi tuku je. 7Icare iwudure moto kae, icare imeardure ia boe emagoi ii duji, akore Saulo, Saulo, kodiba akonare ii? Kodiba? 8Icare imagore ji Ioguduba akagoino, ikimejera? Icare nowu akoinoboe makore ii pugeje, akore Jesus Nazaré pijiwu imireo, cewu akonare jiwu imireo. 9Boekimorema, imedage eerdure urugureboeji, mare emeardukare nowu akoino iiboe makoji. 1 Icare imagore ji Ikimejera, inoba iromode? Icare akore ii Aragojedo, atudo Damasco bakurireuto, torore boe emode awiie inoba aromode duji. 1 Iordukare iaboeji nowu urugureboe kuricigorewu koia, du kodire imedage ere tugera kogudo ikera kajeje dutabore itaregodure Damascoto. 1 Ia imedu iei Ananias cedu, mako makore Pao jiwu imedu, duwu rore nono judeudoge eroiagudo du reore, nowu bakurirewu tadawu judeudoge eerdu pemegare jiwu imedu, 1 Aregodure itae, akore ii iwie Saulo, aeku pemegare pugeje. Du keje kuri je itaiwore. 1 Icare akore pugeje paomage eno Aroe Eimejera ure atawuje aerduwawo taidure jiboeji, aerduwawo Imedu Pemegareuji, amearduwo jabijiwu bataruji. 1 Ica, areadodumode ime eiamedu boe ewiegai aerdure jiboeji, ameardure jiboe jamedu boeji. 1 Kodi icare, amara tabo! Aragojedo, akao pegodo, awabo kigadudo aro pegarewu piji nowu Pemegarewu Imedu ie tabo. 1 Du kejere icare ire ikirimi Jerusalemto, icare inogwamagudure Pao ji uwai tada, du tonajire Paore ido ikinoi, ure iordudo boe pemegareuji. 1 Icare iordure Jesus makoi ii duji, akore amara tabo! Atudo Jerusalém piji, paga karega, awuge emeardumodukare areadodui iiboe jituji 1 Icare imagore Ikimejera, emage eerduware iie meartorure aiwuge etugu etugu baicoreuto, eerduware iie iwara to to ei duji. 2 Icare Estêvão ure tuiwodo akie koia dukeje, iragojere nono jamedu, ieture ure bitowuge ekudawu aroiaji. 2 Macare Jesus akore toro, imode atudo toro ia boe etae jaegiri. 
Paulo mugui baicorewu rakarewu tadadu. 2 Judeudoge emeardure jii je nowu bataru kae, dukeje icare enoiogwarire, egore Nowu imedu tawuje nowu piji, umodukare turugadu tuiewo. 2 Du keje icare enoiogwari kuricigore, ere tugudae aroia tawuje, ere moto urugudu barigu baruto boekori koia ji. 2 Du kodi icare nowu tugobaigarege eimejera ure tudugarege edo tugeragu ji ewo reko baicorewu rakareuto, ewo iwara to ji, ewo okoridodu kuricigodo, tuiorduwawo kodiba boe enoiogwarire boe kori koia ji du bogai. 2 Icare enure kogudo barogo biri bukigu tabodu kejere Paulo unorare ia tugobaigarege eimejera mugui nonodu ji, akore Umodukana turugadu boewo boe to ia Roma kejewu imeduji, brae eiemejerage ekai tugogado jitu otodai? 2 Icare nowu tugobaigarege eimejera meardure awu bataru jitu keje kuri je, uture tugimejera ae, ure bie, akore Inoba aromode? Awu imedu Roma kejewu nure ema. 2 Icare nowu brae eimejera uture mato Paulo ae, akore ji Roma kejewu akinao? Amagodo. Paulo akore U! 2 Icare nowu brae eiemejera akore Ire Roma kejewudo imi mori kuricigo tabo. Icare Paulo akore Ica, Roma kejewu nure imi iwodure dupiji. 2 Du keje kuri je, nowu umode okoridowuge ere tuiaedo ji pi tuku. Nowu brae eiemejera morora amagadure, paga karega, ure tudugarege eedo kogudo Roma kejewui ema dutabo. 3 Barogwatore icare, nowu brae eiemejera aidure tuiorduwa birigoduwo kodiba rakuduie judeudoge emago pegare ji. Ure iera kiwuje, icare ure sacerdotedoge eiemejerage eto pui. Icare ure Paulo arego etae. 

Paulo rakojei boe eimejerage eegaidu. 1Icare Paulore tuioku kidudo nowu judeudoge eimejerage ei tu... Icare akore Imanamage, imire imerure Pao jekai iwabo pemegarewu tabo, imeardae pemegarewu tabo jii awu meri kae. 2Macare nowu sacerdotedoge eimejera iei Ananias cedu, ure mugure mekiwuge edo tugera to okwaji. 3Icare Paulo akore ji imedu roarodurewu, Pao umode akogorido jamedu. Amugure awo akogado ii paroiagudu rekodaji, macare akonai paroiagudu jitu tabore are boedo itogorido. Kodiba? 4Icare mugure nonowuge egore Awadaru pegare Pao bure joia kurireuji. 5Icare Paulo akore Iwiemage iorduwakare Pao burejoiaie ure emaduji. Paga karega, Pao o bapera keje atugododure oino amago pega kaba awobe eimejerajii. 6Paulo jorduware nowu judeudoge eiemejerageie tuginoi duji. Iage fariseudogere emage, iage saduceudogere emage. Du kodi lcare akore tumago raka tabo Imanamage, fariseu nure imi, fariseudoge etonaregedu nure imi. Ica, imeartorure bireuge eewodumode tuwi piji pugeje duji, dukoiare boere tugogado ii 7Awu bataru keje, nowu fariseudoge mare nowu saduceudoge etokire pui, emagore pui puibagi, icare nowu boe eimejerage etonare pui. 8(Paga karega, saduceudoge egore bireuge ewodumodukae, tupadoge bokwae, aroedoge bokwae; fariseudogerema emeartorure nowu boe jameduji). 9Du kodi icare ia boe enoiogwari kuricigorewu ure tuguo. Icare ia fariseudoge, ere turagojedo, emago rakare, egore Ceerduwakare awu imedu ia ro pegareuji. Ia Pao o tupa, iarema ia Aroe emago kana ji? 1 Icare nowu emagoi puidu nowu etokii puidu icare rakagodure. Du kodi icare nowu brae eimejera pagudugodure emode Paulo roto oino pa je duji, du kodi icare ure tugobaigarege edo turawuje, ewo Paulo aru epiji, ewo reko baicorewu rakarewu kae. 1 Nowu boecoji icare Paore towadudo Paulo jekai, akore ji Ameardu awadudo ai, areadodure ii Jerusalém tadadu reorere umode turugadu areadoduwo ii pugeje Roma bakurirewu tada jamedu. 1 Barogwa kododu tabore icare ia judeudoge ere tudo pui, emagore pui togwagemodukae iaboe boeji, tugudumodukae iaboe boece, tumode Paulo bito duotodai. 1 Nowu makore oinowuge ere nono ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure du reore. 1 Icare eture nowu sacerdotedoge eiemejerage etae, egore ei Cemagore Pao jekai, cenogwagemodukae iaboe boeji jii cemode Paulo bito du kae. 1 Kode, tagi mare pagimejerage tamagodo brae eiemejeraji uwo Paulo reko mato tawogai. Tamagodo ji tamode tagoga pemagado ji pugeje. Cegirema, umode tuburedo mato dukeje, cemode cedo cerugadu cewo bito. 1 Boekimorema, Paulo utuie ia onaregedu, urade nowu emeardae pegarewu pawuje, du kodi icare kodure toro baicorewu rakarewu kae, ure Paulo bie. 1 Awure icare makore tugobaigarege eimejera bogai, akore ji Awu iparedu reko toro akimejera ae, aidure tumagowo ji iaboeji. 1 Icare ure reko nowu brae eimejera jekae, akore ji Nowu meture baicorewu tadawu iei Paulo cedu okwamagudure ii iwo awu iparedu reko mato aegai, aidure tumagowo ai iaboeji du kodi. 1 Icare nowu brae eimejera ure tugera kogudo nowu iparedu iera kajeje, ure reko jice baiporo kae, akore ji Kaboba jiba akaidure amagowo ii? 2 Akore Judeudoge emagore pui barogwatoie togwamagudumode ai awo Paulo reko judeudoge eimejerage eegai pugeje, ewo tugogadodu pemegado ji. 2 Akirema, awiapaga kaba ewadaruji. Paga karega, ia ime ere ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogiduredu, duwuge emode tuwiado awara okwai tuwo bito. Ere togwatugu Pao jekai togwagemodukae iaboe oeji, tugudumodukae iaboe boece jii tumode bito duotodai. Enure turugadu, epagamode awadaru bogai tu je. 2 Icare nowu brae eimejera ure nowu iparedu utudo, akore ji mako kaiagu iaboe boe ji tuie bie pudui duji. 
Paulo rekodudodui Cesaria kaedu. 2 Du keje icare makore tugobaigarege eimejerage ei pobedu bogai, akore ei.
Tamode tugobaigarege ei 2 0 cedu edo turugadu etuwo Cesaréia kae, awu boeco kajeje. 2 Tamode kawarudoge edo turugadu Paulo bogai jamedu, dure tamode reko pagimejera Félix ae. Taetu pemegado ji. 2 Ure ia bapera atugodo tagoi oino dutabo: 2 Cludio Lísia ikimadu nure pagimejera kurirewu Félix awogai. 2 Judeudoge ere awu imedu ieragogudo, eiagu bito, dukejere icare itaregodure ae ino tugobaigarege ebo, icare iordure Roma kejewuie ure ema duji, du kodire ire inorudo ekera piji. 2 Du keje icare itaidure iorduwawo kaba kodiba ere tuiagu bito, du kodire ire reko judeudoge eimejerage eegai, ewo tugogado ji, 2 Icare imeardure eie tuiagu bito turoiagudu koia, mare ia ro pegarewu bokware ewo bito, iarema ewo tugu baicoreuto. 3 Mare dukejere icare ia boere iwie ia judeudogeie tudo turugadu tuwo bito rugadu, du kodire icare ire boedo reko toro akae, imagore onare jiwugei etuwo akae jamedu. Urugadu. Amugu pemegado. 3 Icare, nowu boecoji nowu tugobaigarege ere tugeragu Paulo ji, nowu tugimejera mako rekodaji, icare ere reko toro Antipátride kae. 3 Barogwatore icare ere maku kawaru epage etae, ewo reko tododai, pudumire icare ere tugirimi tuibagi tumuga kae pugeje. 3 Etaregodure Cesaréia bakurireuto dukeje, ere bapera maku nowu brae eimejera ai, ere jordudo Paulo ji jamedu. 3 Icare makore nowu bapera atugoji, dukejere icare unoragodure ei kakoduwu moto kajeba. Egore cilécia moto kejewu reno. Icare akore 35 Iwiapagamode ai, onare aiwuge etaregodumode dukeje. Icare ure edo Paulo jetu otorogado judeudoge eimejera Herodes uwai kurirewu tada. 

Brae eimejerage ere tugogado Paulo ji. 1Merire pagera awubodure durekodajire icare nowu sacerdotedoge eimejera kurirewu ure turawuje nowu kae, ia codureuge ebo, ia boe eroiagudu epa iei Tertulo cedu kodure ebo. Etaregodure dukejere, eture nowu brae eimejera kurirewu ae, tumago pegawo Paulo ji biegai. 2Emagore Paulo bogai tuwo tugogado ji. Icare nowu Tertulo mako pegare ji nowu brae eimejera jekai, akore Akire are boe pemegado cei, are boe butugudo cei. Aro koiare boe ero pegarewu makarewu kadodure ceno moto keje. 3Ceerduware aro oinoduji, boe jamedu boeji jii je, boe jamedu boe keje, akarurewu Félix, du kodire cenure tukutaido ai. 4Macare itaidukare boe koriwo ai jii je du kodire inogwamagudu nure ai awiapagawo iwadaruji jao. 5Ceerdure awu imeduji, pega remawure, ure boe erugo pui boe jamedu boe keje, judeudoge etada. Nazareudoge ia eimejera nure ema. 6Uiagu Pao uwai pegado jamedu, macare cere cegeragu ji. 7(Cedaidure cewo cegogado ji, ceroiagudu rekodaji, mare nowu brae eimejera iei Lísias cedu aregodure, icare ure tugeragu cegera piji turaga tabo taci je, icare ure onare jiwuge cedudo mato aegai). 8Ica, aki mitodu anoramode ji, dutabore aerduwamode cemagore ai jiboeji jamedu boe ema remawuie. 9Icare nowu judeudoge ere tuiodo nowu turoiagudu epa bataru keje, egore oinoie ure rugadu. 1 Du keje icare nowu brae eimejera ure tugera amagadudo Paulo bogai, icare Paulo akore.
Iorduware joru makaguragare aetui awu moto jitu duji, du kodire imagomode iparu tabo aegai ipagudu bokwa tabo, imeartorui ai dutabo. 1 Boe rakamodukare ai aerduwawo meri kodukae ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwurekotodu kori irudui Jerusalém bakurireuto dupiji. Irudure toro, inogwamaguduwo Pao ji. 1 Iaboe iaboe eerdukare ii inogirui iaboeji iaboeji; eerdukare ii boe erugo Pao uwai tada duji, iarema sinagoga tada, iarema bakurirewu tada. 1 Jamedu eroiwakare tuwo aerdudo tumago pega nure iiboeji. 1 Imago nure oino aegai ikodure paedogamage eno Aroe Eimejera utawaraji, imeartorure atugododure Moisés o bapera kejeboeji, profetadoge eno bapera kejeboe jamedu boeji, ikodui emagore tuginoiwu oino jiwu bakaru rekodaji. 1 Ipaga nure Pao ji epagamagai jitudu reore, pemegareuge, pegareuge eewodumode pugeje duji. 1 Kodire inure idurudo ikoduwo imeardae pemegarewu tabo Pao jekai, ime eegai jamedu. 1 Joru makaguragare dukeje, itaregodure iwobe etae, makudu pagare etaiboe rogu tabo, makudumode Pao uwai tada boe tabo jamedu. 1 Icare iroi nono dukeje, eerdure ii ipemegado Pao uwai tada duji, mare boe ekare tago, boe erugodukare pui nono. 1 Eerdure iiwu, ia judeudoge etaregodui Asia pijiwugere emage, emagere etaregodumode aegai emagowo iiboeji, eerdure iro pegareuji rugadu dukeje, kodi karega. 2 Mare mugure oinowuge emagowo awiegai eerdu rakuduie ia iro pegareuji nowu ere irego judeudoge eimejerage eegai dukeje. 2 Imagore tu jiboe imago raka tabodu reo bireuge eewodumodedu koiare judeudoge eimejerage ere tugogado ii taegai. 2 Boekare. Nowu brae eimejera Félix jorduwa birigodure emeartoraeji, du kodire ure nowu judeudoge eimejerage etudo jao, akore Nowu boe eimejera Lísias aregodumode mato dukeje imeardu birigodumode tai. 2 Icare ure nowu tugobaigarege eimejerado tugedo pemegado Paulo ji, akore ji jetuwo ji butugu tabo, ukawu metage ei tugerabraredo jitudu pijido. 2 Meri makakare dukeje, nowu brae eimejera Félix aregodure toreduje Drusila apo, duwudo judeudore ema. Makore Paulo bogai, icare biapagare makoi boe emeartorui Jesus Cristo jituduji. 2 Du kejere Paulo makore ei boe emodukae pu pegado, pu barigududo, boe ekera keadukawo pudui, ia meri keje Pao umoduie tugogado boe ji, du kodi icare nowu Félix pagudugodure, icare akore Paulo ji Urugadu jao, atudo jao, ia kodiboe keje imagomode awogai pugeje. 2 Upagare jamedu Paulo umoduie diiero maku pudai du bogai, du kodire mako makore bogai tu tu tumagowo ji. 2 Jorure pobe durekodaji, brae eimejerage ere Félix tawuje nowu moto piji, ere Pórcio Festo mugudo mugato. Boekimorema, nowu Félix aidure tuwo judeudoge eegaredo, du kodire ure Paulo mugudo baicorewu tada tuiageje. 

Paulo makoi brae eimejera kurirewu César bogaidu. 1Meri pobe ma jewu metuia bokware dukeje, nowu brae eimejera Festo aregodure nowu moto kae, icere ruture Jerusalém bakurirewu kae. 2Nonore icare nowu sacerdotedoge eimejerage mare judeudoge kurireuge eture ae, emago pegare Paulo ji biegai. 3Enogwamagudure ji tuwo boedo Paulo reko mato Jerusalém kae pugeje. Paga karega, etaidure tuwo tuwiado awara okwai tuwo bito. 4Mare Festo akore Paulo muguie baicorewu tada Cesaréia bakurirewu keje, pudumie tudumoduie toro meri makakare dukeje. 5Icare akore ei Kode, ia kurireuge tagi tamode tarawuje itabo, icare nowu imedu ia ropegareure dukeje, tamagomode iiegai toro. 6Icare mugure nono kimo meri ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto rakudu dukejere icare ure turawuje Cesaréia bakurirewu kae, icare makore Paulo bogai. 7Paulo aregodure ae, dukejere icare aregodure Jerusalém pijiwu judeudoge ere taiado apo, enogirure Paulo ro pegarewu makaguragareuji, mare enogiru paga nure. 8Paulo rema, mako makore tubaru tabo, akore Iro pega bokwa. Iro pegakare judeudoge eroiaguduji, iro pegakare Pao uwaiji, iro pegakare Roma kejewu brae eimejera kurireuji. 9Mare nowu brae eimejera Festo aidure tuwo judeudoge eegaredo, du kodi icare makore Paulo ji, akore.
Akaidure aruduwo Jerusalém kae ewo tugogado ai iegai? 1 Icare Paulo akore Roma kejewu ia brae eimejera jekaire imugure, du kodi icare umode turugadu boewo tugogado ii toro Roma bakurirewu keje. Iro pegarewu bokwa judeudogei, akire aerduware. 1 Iro pegarewu umode ei, ewo iwido rugadu ma, ipagudumodukare iwiwo. Mare awu ereadodure jiwu iro pegarewu bokware dukeje, iaboe iaboe eroiwamodukare tuwo imagu mako pegare iiwuge ekera kai. Itaidure ituwo Roma kejewu brae eimejera kurirewu César ae. 1 Du keje icare Festo makore jao tumedage ebo, icare akore ji Amagore César bogai, du kodi icare atumode César ae. 
Brae eimejera Festo makoi judeudoge eimejera Agripa biegai Paulo jiboeji. 1 Meri makakare dukeje, nowu judeudoge eimejera Agripa ure turawuje toreduje Berenice apo toro Cesaréia bakurirewu kae, tugimaduwo Festo apo. 1 Icare emugu raire nono, dutabore icare Festo readodure nowu judeudoge eimejera biegai Paulo jiboeji. Akore Félix ure ia imedu mugudo baicorewu tada tuiageje. 1 Icare iture Jerusalémto dukeje, nowu sacerdotedoge eimejerage mare judeudoge codureuge etaregodure tumago pegawo ji iwiegai, enogwamagudure ii iwo boedo bito. 1 Icare imagore ei Roma kejewuge ceroiwakae cewo boedo iaboe iaboe ewido, cemode nowu bitodumodewu udo turagojedo mako pegare puduiwuge eegai tumagowo tubaru tabo duotodai. 1 Icare etaregodure mato. Icare nowu barogwato kuri je inure iwiapagawo ei, icare ire itugarege edo nowu imedu reko mato jamedu. 1 Icare nowu onare jiwuge etaregodure mato iegai, mare emago emagokare ia imeardaere ro pegare jiboeji. 1 Emago pegare pui tumeartorure jiboe koia. Emagore pui ia birewu imedu iei Jesus cedu jiboeji, duwure Paulo akore jewoduie. 2 Du kodi icare irore ta... Iorduwakare inoba iromode ji nowu tagoino dukoia. Du kodire inoragodure ji aidurakuduie tuduwo Jerusalemto boewo tugogado pudui toro. 2 Macare Paulo akore taiduie tuduwo Roma kejewu cegimejera kurirewu César ae. Du kodi icare ire Paulo mugudo baicorewu tada jii imode boedo reko toro César ae du kae. 2 Icare nowu judeudoge eimejera Agripa akore nowu brae eimejera Festo ji Imi jamedu itaidure imearduwo nowu imedu bataruji. Icare Festo akore Barogwato ameardumode ji. 
Paulo rakojei judeudoge eimejera Agripa jekaidu. 2 Barogwatore icare nowu Agripa aregodure toreduje Berenice apo, tuguri kuricigo tabo, ure turemo nowu brae eimejera uwaito, ia brae eimejerage ebo, mare nowu bakurirewu ia brae kurireuge ebo jamedu. 2 Icare Festo akore Akarurewu judeudoge eimejera Agripa, awiapagado. Mugure woewu boe taiamedu, tawiapagado. Taerdu nure awu imeduji oino, du judeudoge eiamedu emago emagore, enoiogwarire bitoduwo. Emagoino woe, emagoino Jerusalém tada jamedu. 2 Mare iemarure inoba rore du bogai, icare iordukare ia roji bitoduwo. Mare makore tudumoduie César ae, dukoiare ire imeardaedo rekoduwo toro César ae. 2 Mare iwo bapera atugodo cegimejera kurirewu Roma kejewu bogai tabowu ro pegarewu bokwa. Du kodire ire arego woe taegai, akarurewu tagimejera jekai, taerduwo ia ro pegareuji ma, iwo bapera atugodo ji. 2 Paga karega, iegaire umodukare turugadu iwo boedo reko toro ireadodukai onare jiwuge emagore jiboe jitu tabo. 

Paulo uwadodae Agripa biegaidu. 1Icare nowu judeudoge eimejera Agripa akore Paulo ji Amagodo aparu tabo. Icare Paulore tugera onado boe ji, akore 2Iegare nure, paga karega, imagomode iparu tabo cegimejera kurirewu Agripa aegai, nowu judeudoge emagore ii jiboe jamedu boeji. 3Paga karega, aerdu birigodure judeudoge eroji, mugure pumegiwu emeartoraeji jamedu. Du kodi icare inogwamagudu nure ai, awiapagawo awudugu tabo iwadaruji. 4Judeudoge eerduware iro oino duji jii negedurogu imi dupiji, eerdure ii ino moto keje, bakurirewu tada jamedu. 5Marigudu eerduware inogwacei fariseudoge eiaogwai duji, duwuge emeartoru raka kodure ia judeudoge emeartoru raka kori. 6Macare oino ipaga nure Pao akore paedogamagei tumoduie maku pagaiboe jitudu bogai, du kodire emago pegare ii aegai. 7Padure pumekejewu pawobe ei pagera pudogidure ere pobe pugejedu epaga nure Pao akoinodu bogai, tumaragodui Pao ai boecoji meriji jii je. Awu ipagare bogaiboe koiare judeudoge emago pegare ii. 8Imi jamedu imeardaere marigudu umoduie turugadu iwo itonado du kuricigodo Jesus jituji. 1 Oinonore irore rugadu Jerusalém tada. Ire makarewu iwiemage etugu baicoreuto, sacerdotedoge eimejerage ei tuwadaru maku inai dutabo. Icare sacerdotedoge eimejerage ere boedo ewido dukeje, ire iiodo ewadaru keje jamedu. 1 Iture eregodaji itonai ei dutabo nowu sinagogadoge ekao, irorerure ei iwo ewarigu tumeartorure jiboe piji. Nowu ikorigodure eiwu itodure gu gu gu je, icare itonare ei, iture eregodaji jii moto tuginoiboe kae. 1 Du kodire iture Damasco bakurirewu kae, sacerdotedoge eimejerage eno bapera tabo. 1 Du tabore icare, ikimejera kurirewu, itu nure awaraji meri pagaia keje, dutabore baru pijiwu ia urugureboe aregodure, nowu urugureboe kodure meri joku urugu kori, urugu ure tumaedo iiogi, imedage eiogi. 1 Boekimorema, ceiamedu buture mototo kuri tuku je. Icare imeardure ia boe akoi ii duji, hebreudoge ewadaru tabo, akore Saulo, Saulo, kodiba akonare ii, kodiba? Rakare ai awo awure to meriri ototo. 1 Icare imagore ioguduba akiba akagoino, ikimejera? Icare Pagimejera akore Akonare jiwu Jesus imireo. 1 Mare aragojedo! Inure ikuo akai iwo itugaredo aki awadoduwo boe etai awu aerdure jiboe jamedu boeji. Imode ikuo akai pugeje iwo aerdudo makaguragareboeji du jire areadodumode boe etai jamedu. 1 Ire akinorudo judeudoge epiji, judeukare emawuge epiji. 1 Inure atudo etae, awo eeku jado, ewo tugirimi boeco piji urugureboe kae, ewo tugirimi boe pegarewu piji Pao ae ma, tumeartorui ii dutabo turo pegarewu okwawo, emuguwo pemegareuge etada. 1 Nowu kodiboe pijire, ikimejera kurirewu Agripa, imeartoru bokwakare nowu iordure jiwu baru tadaboeji. 2 Ire Pao bataru kogado Damasco kejewuge ewiegai boetoji, dukejere ire kogado Jerusalém tada, dukejere ire kogado judeukare emawuge ewiegai, ewo tuiedorodo, ewo tugirimi Pao ae, turo pemega tabo. 2 Awu iro oino dukoiare icare judeudoge ere tugeragu ii, ere tuiagu iwido. 2 Mare Paore tugera braredo ii, dukoiare iragoje kimore jii oino. Moisés mare profetadoge egore umoduie tudowujeboe du jire imago imagore biegareuge ewiegai, kurireuge ewiegai. 2 Du reo Cristo umoduie tuiwodo, jewodumoduie bireuge epiji boetojiwu, dutabore umoduie urugureboe awadudo judeudoge etai, judeukare emawuge etai jamedu. 2 Nowu Paulo akoinodu kejere icare Festore tumago rakaguragado, akore Akaora bai baire, Paulo, aerduwa kuricigo dukoiare ure ameardae pegado. 2 Icare Paulo akore ji Itaora pegakare, akarurewu Festo, mare boe jokoduwu, boe jetororewu jire inagoino. 2 Ica, awu cegimejera kurirewu Agripa, duwu jekaire inagoino ipagudu bokwa tabo, jorduwa birigodure inagoino jamedu boeji. Iorduware inagoino jiboe iaboe iaboe biadodukae joku piji, paga karega, iaboe iaboe ukare tudowuje boe biarewu tada. 2 Ikimejera kurirewu Agripa, ameartorure profetadoge ewadaruji? Iorduware ameartoruie ure duji. 2 Icare Agripa makore Paulo ji: - Boce kodi anure cristaodo imi, kodi karega. 2 Icare Paulo akore Inogwamagudu nure Pao ji uwo ado nono ireore, mare tu aki karega, meardure iwadaru jiwuge eiamedu boe ewo tudo nono ireore, mare awu ikeragogui oino dutabo karega. 3 Icare nowu judeudoge eimejera, nowu brae eimejera, nowu Berenice, mare mugure nono ebowu jamedu boe, ere turagojedo. 3 Icare ei tudawuje du tonaji emagore pui, egore Awu imedu ukare iaboe iaboe towuje bitoduwo. 3 Agripa akore Festo ji jamedu Awu imedu okwamagudumodukare tuduwo César ae ma, uia turugadu boewo kiwuje uwo tuginorudo. 

Paulo kodui Roma kaedu. 1Nowu brae eimejera aidure cegoduwo Itália moto kae dukeje, ure Paulo mare ia ieragogudodureuge emagu ia tugobaigarege eimejera iei Júlio cedu ai, duwure nowu brae eimejera kurirewu uwai tadawu nure ema. 2Icare cere cedaredo ia Adrumeto bakurirewu pijiwu ika kurireuto, du kodumode Asia moto okwaji, icare ure meriri aogado moto piji. Ia imedu iei Aristarco cedu, ia Macedônia moto kejewu bakurirewu iei Tessalônica cedu pijiwu imedu, kodure cedabo jamedu. 3Barogwatore icare cere cedaredo jao Sidônia bakurirewu okwai, icare nowu ika kurirewu tadawuge eimejera Júlio, turo pemegai Paulo ji dutabo, ure udo tudaru tumedage ewai kae, tuwo tugeragu taidure jiboeji. 4Du pijire icare cere ceremo pobo maereuto, icare cegodure pobo aiare tabowu moto iei Chipre cedu okwaji, bakuru aregodure cedogi du kodi. 5Cere pagado Cilícia mare Panfília eno pobo maerewu kajeje, icare cedaregodure ia Lícia moto kejewu bakurirewu iei Mira cedu kae. 6Nowu ika tadawuge eimejera jordure ia Alexandria bakurirewu pijiwu ika kurireuji du kodure Itália moto kae, icare ure cedo cedaredo to. 7Cero butugure ceno ika kurirewu tabo meri makaguragare jii cegodure Cnido bakurirewu kae. Nonore icare bakuru ukare cedo ceburedo to. 8Icare cerore pobo aiare tabowu moto iei Creta cedu okwaji, puredu tu moto joi pobotodu iei Salamina ceduji. Cero kodu pegare nowu moto okwaji, dukejere cedaregodure okwa iei Bons Portos cedu kae, puredu tu ji Laséia bakurirewu mugure. 9Boere marigudu, boere todorogado pudui du kejewu boe ure marigudu. Boe ekodui nowu ika kurirewu tabodu pegagodure. Du kodire Paulore tumedage ewie nowu inoduji, akore 1 Imedage, iordu nure awu cegodui tabodu pegagoduie ure cei, ikaji, ika oredure tabo boeji. 1 Mare nowu tugobaigarege eimejera meartorure ika epaji, ore ika cewuji, mare Paulo bataruji karega. 1 Jamedu nowu ikadoge epa pegare emuguwo keje nowu biaku keje, du kodire boce kodi eiamedu meardaere umoduie turugadu tuwo tugirimi pobo maereuto, epagare turegodumode Creta moto tadawu bakurirewu iei Fênice cedu kae du bogai, tumuguwo tada nowu biaku tonaji; paga karega, mugure meri rutu jaogwai, bakuru aregodure to. 
Bakuru rakarewu koiare ure emeru pegadodu. 1 Sul jaogwaiwu bakuriri aregodure, du kodire emeardaere tumoduie turowo nono taidu reore. Icare ere meriri aogado pobo piji, ekodure pobo okwaji, puredu tu nowu pobo aiare tabowu moto iei Creta ceduji. 1 Boekimorema, boe raikare durekodaji nowu pobo aiare moto tabowu pijire ia aroe medobo aregodure, du iere Europa pijiwu Aroe Medobo. 1 Nowu ika kurirewu roiwakare nowu bakuru rakareuji, du ure tumugudo keje taci; cere udo cerego rugadu taci. 1 Ure cewarigu kuri ia pobo aiare tabowu moto biegarewu iei Clauda cedu kae, dukejere icare cere cemugudo, nowu ika kurirewu o boe ewurejoia keje. Icare cere jetu otorogado. 1 Du kejere ere bukigu kurirewu upodo nowu ika kurirewu tabo, boe jokodu kadu kawo (nowu pobo butoborewu ukawo bowuje, ukawo pegado). Icare epagudure nowu ika kurirewu jomode Sirte kejewu kugaru uporuto duji. Du kodi icare ere ao jiwu aroia rawuje, ere bakurudo turego toro boeto. 1 Barogwatore icare bakuru rakaguragare kimo, du kodire ere ika kurirewu oredure taboboe barigu barigu poboto. 1 Rekodajiwu meriji pugeje cere ia ika epa meriridoge ewarigu ewarigu poboto jamedu cegera tabo rugadu. 2 Boe raire du tonaji meri joku aregodukare kuiejedoge ewogware jamedu. Bakuru rakaguragare kimo. Cebagakare cemode ceginorudo du bogai pugeje. 2 Boe raicigore cekai boe ko dutabo, durekodajire icare Paulore turagojedo boe etoiado, icare akore Iwiemage, tawiapagamode iwadaruji takawo tadawuje Creta piji ma, pawudumodukare awu boe pegareuto, pamodukare awu pagoroe barigu barigu, kodi karega. 2 Ica, oinore icare inure taerduwado: tagidado, tabagudu kaba, ia tagi ia tagi tawogwamoduka. Ikare okwamode mito tuje. 2 Awu boecoji, imaragodure aiwu Are Eimejera, du ore imi jamedu, ia o tupare towadudo iiegai, akore ii 2 Apagudu kaba, Paulo, umode turugadu akoduwo Roma kejewu César ae. Paore awu kodure akabowuge emagu akai, ewo tuginorudo. 2 Du kodi icare, imedage, tabagudu kaba. Imeartorure boemode nono Pao o tupa akore iwiegai du reore. 2 Cewarigududodumode ia pobo aiare tabowu moto kae. 2 Cemugure pobo maerewu iei Adriático cedu kajeje boecore pobe puibiji durekodaji, boekimorema, boeco oia kejere icare nowu ika kurirewu epage ere boe pa tuburedugoduie ia moto kae duji. 2 Icare ere meriri barigu poboto bukigu tabo tuiorduwo pobo koji; ure pagera pudogidure ure ino pugeje. Otobi ji pugeje biegatu je, boe ekana remagudure, ure pagera pudogidure pagera awubodure turegodaji pugeje. 2 Du kodi icare epagudure tumode ika to ia toritoduji; du kodire ere meriri motudurewu ui pobe puibijidu barigu poboto ika upo jaogwai, tuiedu rakawo ji, nonore epagare jii barogwa kododu kae. 3 Kuri je nowu ika kurirewu epagere turegoduiagu, du kodire ere tuiagu nowu ika kurirewu je kejewu meriri motudurewu barigu poboto mare ero arodu nure, ere nowu ika biegarewu rawuje, ere tumugudo keje poboto turegoduwo tada. 3 Paulorema ure nowu ika kurirewu tadawu tugogobaigarege eimejera bie, ure tugobaigarege ewie jamedu, akore Nowu ime emugumodukare ika kurirewu tada ma, taroiwamodukare tawo taginorudo. 3 Du kodi icare nowu tugobaigarege ere nowu ika biegarewu iku kado, ere udo tuwududo. 3 Barogwa kododu tabore icare Paulore eiamedu edo tudugu tudo, ure edo iaboe rogu boe kowuje, akore ei Merire pagera pudogidure ere pobe puibiji tuwugeje 3 tanudukai, takai ia ko dutabo. Oinore icare inogwamagudu nure tai tawo iaboe rogu ko, tawo tadurudo. Ica, ia tagaorogu okwamodukare tagaora piji rugadu. 3 Awu tagoinodu tabore icare Paulore tugeragu ia amireuji, mako pemegare Pao ji eiamedu jekai, dukeje icare ure bowuje, ure togwage paru to. 3 Awu ro oinodu kejere icare eiamedure tudugu tudo, ere togwage paru to jamedu. 3 Eiamedure 2 6 nowu ika tada. 3 Icare ekuredure, dukeje ere nowu ika kurirewu barigodudo, tui trigo barigu poboto dutabo. 3 Du kejere icare, meri awadure dukeje, nowu ika epage ere boe pa tuiorduwakae nowu motoji. Icare eerdure ia pobo maerewu ui turemo mototo duji, kugarubo padure nowu pobo okwaji. Etaidure tuwo nowu ika kurirewu jodo to, turoiwamode dukeje. 4 Icare ere nowu meriri motudurewu eceba bukigu kado kado, ere pijido toro poboto, ere ika bure kiwuje, ere ika aroia jeture ipo towu jado, icare nowu ika puredugodure nowu kugaru okwa kae. 4 Boekimore, nowu ika kurirewu jeture ia kugaru ao otoreuji. Nowu ika jore kugaruto, tudure to, dukeje ukare tudawuje piji, dutabore nowu ika upore tubegado, ure tuwowuje nowu pobo rakarewu koia. 4 Icare nowu tugobaigarege etaidure tuwo nowu iera kogureuge ewido ma, eregodukawo poboji. 4 Mare owu eimejera iei Júlio cedu, aidure tuwo Paulo inorudo, dukoiare makore ei erokawo ino. Icare akore jorduware tugurugoduwowuge ei ewo tuwarigu boetoji poboto etuwo kuri toro moto kae. 4 Iagerema etaregodure moto kae tubadui ira keje dutabo, iage etaregodure moto kae tubadui nowu ika kobo rogu boe ewugeje dutabo. Oinore icare eiamedu etaregodure moto kae tuie tabo, tubemega tabo. 

Paulo rakojei pobo aiare tabowu iei Malta cedu kejedu. 1Icai cei ceginorudo dukeje, cere boe pa nowu pobo aiai tabowu moto ieie Malta, oino. 2Nowu moto kejewu boe eetu pemegaguragare cei, ere ia jorugu kurirewu mugudo, du oiadodare ere cemugudo, paga karega, bubutu nure, biaku nure. 3Icare Paulore tudugu jerigi upo kuda tuwo barigu joruto, du tonajire icare ia awagu eworirewu, rekodure joru pijidu, ure taredo ta, okwa jore tuku ierato. 4Nowu boe eerdure nowu awagu bararei Paulo kanajura jituji, dukeje emagore pui, egore Boe jokodu awu imedu ure boe ewido, paga karega, ure tuginorudo pobo pegarewu piji, mare Pao aidukare jewo. 5Ure tugera jukodo awagu apo joruto boe puredukai pudui dutabo. 6Nowu boe emeardaere kana bokumoduie dukejere bimode kuri je duji. Mare epaga raicigore bogai dukejere ere boe pa boe puredukae ji rugadu duji. Du kodire ere tumardae kirimi, egore Aroe Eimejera nure ema rugadu rabodu. 7Nowu oiei, nowu moto kejewu ia imedu iere Públio cedu o baidoge emugure. Awu imedu ure tugeragu cei tuwaito, merire pobe ma jewu metuia bokware, jetu pemegare cei. 8Boekimorema, nowu Publio uo kogodure, padure tuba keje, biri uru nure, kuri kugudure jamedu. Paulo uture ae, okwamagudure Pao ji paru tabo, ure tugera bu ao keje, icare ure pemegago. 9Awu Paulo roi oinodu kejere icare, nowu pobo aiare tabowu moto kejewu kogodureuge eiamedu etaregodure ae, epemegagodure jamedu, du kodire eetu pemegaguragare cei. 1 Icare cedui nowu piji dukeje, ere cedaidure jiboe jamedu boe maku cenai. 
Ekodui Malta piji Roma kaedu. 1 Arire pobe ma jewu metuia bokware dukeje, cere cedaredo ia Alexandria pijiwu ika kurireuto, duwu muguradu nowu pobo aiare tabowu moto keje nowu biaku tonaji. Dioscorodoge eie mugure ika kurirewu keje. 1 Cedaregodure Siracusa bakurireuto, dukeje icare cere cewuredo tada, du tadare cemugure merire pobe ma jewu metuia bokware. 1 Du pijire cegodure oino pobo okwaji jii cedaregodure Régio bakurireuto du kae. Barogwatore icare, Sul jaogwaiwu bakuru aregodure, dutabore cegodure. Icare merire pobe dukeje cedaregodure Pozzuoli bakurireuto. 1 Nonore ceerdure ia cewiemagei, duwugere etaidure cemuguwo pudabo merimode ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto. Du keje cegodure Roma bakurirewu kae. 1 Roma kejewu pawiemage ewiedure marigudu cedaregodumode duji. Du kodire etaregodure cedogi jii ia bororo iei Apia cedu kae, ia boe eda iei Três Tabernas cedu kae. Icare Paulo jordure ei dukejere ure tudugu tudo pugeje, jekarere Pao ji. 
Paulo roi Roma kejedu. 1 Icare cedaregodure Roma bakurireuto dukeje, tugobaigarege ere Paulodo tumugudo ewai tada, ia tugobaigare jeture ji. 1 Merire pobe ma jewu metuia bokware dukeje, Paulo makore nowu judeudoge kurireuge ewogai, etuwo pudae. Ere tudo pui ae, dukeje icare akore ei Imanamage, iro pegakare boe ji, iro pegakare paedogamage eroji, du kodi karega icare boere tugeragu ii Jerusalém tada, ere imagu Roma kejewuge ekera kai. 1 Awugere icare tui tugogado ii dukeje, etaidure tuwo ikinorudo, eerdukare ia iro pegareuji iwiwo kodi. 1 Mare judeudoge ekiarire, du kodire inogwamagudure César bogai, mare itaidukare imago pegawo iwobei. 2 Kodire imagore tawogai, imagowo tai, paga karega, Israeldoge epagare bogai boe koia boere ikera kogudo awu meriri iku tabo. 2 Icare egore ji Ia bapera aregodukare cewogai Judéia piji iaboe tabo, ia cewiemage etaregodukare nowu moto piji jamedu tumago pegai ai dutabo. 2 Mare cedaidure aki rugadu amagowo cewiegai ameardae jiboeji. Paga karega, ceerduware tu jiboe reo boe etona etonare nowu boe ji boe jamedu boe keje. 2 Icare ere ia meri remagu tumagowo pui. Du kejere makareuge etaregodure bogai nowu mugure tadawu baito. Meri jamedu jire emagore pui meri rutu piji jii meri butu kae. Paulo readodure ewiegai Pao o boe pemegareuji, ure tubewudo Moisés mare profetadoge ewadaru tabo tuwo emeartorudo Jesus ji. 2 Iage emeartorure bataruji, iagerema emeartorukare. 2 Eerdu pemegakare pu meardaere puibagi, du kodi icare eture, du kodire Paulo akore ei Boe jokodu Aroe Pemegarewu akore taomagei profetadoge eiabiji 2 Atudo nowu boe etae, amagodo ei tawiaja tabore tameardumode, mare taerduwamodukare; taeku tabore taerdumode, mare tamodukare boe pawuje. 2 Paga karega, awu boe ewabo rakare, ere tuwiaja mi, ere tuioku mi, tukawo tuiedorodo ma, ikawo epemegado (Is 6, s). 2 Du kodi icare, taerduwado: awu Pao o boe pemegarewu makudumode judeukare emawuge etai. 2 (Du kejere icare judeudoge ere tudawuje nowu piji tumago rakai pui dutabo). 3 Paulo mugure nowu ture aruwu bai tada jorure pobe. Nonore ure tugeragu jemarure tuwogaiwuge eiamedu boe ji. 3 Readodure brae ewiegai Pao o boe pemegareuji, ure boe eerduwado Jesus jiboeji, turaga tabo, taidu tabo rugadu, iaboe iaboe emagokare ji rokawo ino. 

Boe eimadu. 1Imi, Paulo, imode awu bapera atugodo. Jesus Cristo burejoia nure imi, Pao ure apostolodo imi, ure tugeragu ii iwo bakaru pemegarewu kogado du bogai. 2Marigudu Pao makore to profetadoge eiabiji awu bakaru pemegarewu umode tudowuje duji, duwugere awu inodu bu bapera pemegarewu keje. 3Kejere boe emagore Pao Onaregedu Pagimejera Jesus Cristo jiboeji, duwu brae eimejera Davi otojiwu nure ema, imedui pudumi du reore. 4Aroe Pemegareure boe edo boe pa Aroe Eimejera Onaregeduie Jesus Cristoce duji, jewodui bireuge epiji dukoia. 5Pagimejera Jesus Cristo, koiare ure apostolodo imi, imaragoduwo tumaragodaeji, iwo awu moto kejewu boe erego emeartoruwo ji, ewiapagawo ji. 6Awuge etadare tamedure jamedu, Roma kejewuge, Jesus Cristo makore tawogai jamedu. 7Taiamedu boe, Roma kejewuge, Pao meardu kurire tai, togewo tagi du bogai. Pao Aroe Eimejera, Pagimejera Jesus Cristo o boe pemegarewu boe butugurewu jetuwo tagabo. 8Iegare kuricigore Aroe Eimejera ji, Jesus Cristo tada, taigoia, mare paga karega, moto kejewuge eiamedu boe eegare nure tameartoraeji. 
Paulo aidure tuduwo Roma bakurirewu kaedu. 9Pao Aroe Eimejera, imaragodure aiwu iwabo jamedu tabo Tonaregedu o bakaru pemegarewu keje, jorduware imagoi pudui tabaru tabo duji. 1 Inogwamagudure tu tu tu ji tuwo itudo tawogai, taidumode dukeje. 1 Itogea kuricigore iorduwo tai, iwo ia baru tadawu boe pemegarewu maku tagai, tameardu awaduwo tai du bogai. 1 Mare pawo pu meardu awadudo puibagi, pameartorae mitodu jitu koia. 1 Iwiemage, itaidure taerduwawo itaidu rakare iorduwo tai du bogai duji, itaidure imaragodu pemegawo tagabo, imaragodu magai ia ao pegokareuge ekao du reore, mare jii oino iroiwakare ituwo tawogai roga. 1 Imaragodure boe eiamedu boe etai grécia kejewuge etai, Grécia kejewukare emawuge etai, jorduwareuge etai, jorduwakareuge etai jamedu. 1 Du kodire ire irugadu iwo bakaru pemegarewu kogado Roma kejewuge tawiegai jamedu. 
Boe emeartorae. 1 Ipogurumodukare inagoi bakaru pemegarewu jituji. Paga karega, ro rakaguragarewu nure ema tuwo meartorureuge eiamedu einorudo, Judéia kejewuge boetoji, rekodaji Judéia kejewukare emawuge. 1 Mare paga karega, kejere Pao o boe jetororewu ure towadudo taregodui boe emeartorae piji, tui boe erego boe emeartorae kae, padumagai bapera pemegarewu kejedu reore pemegarewu imedu jemode tumeartorae kodi . 
Meartoru bokwareuge ero pegarewu. 1 Boe jokodu, Pao kodu kagirire ure boe rakarewu biado turo pegarewu koiawu imei. 1 Paga karega, ure boe eerdumode puduiboe awadudo eegai. 2 Awu moto towujedure durekodaji, boe eerdukare jiwu Pao jiboe: ro raka, Aroe Eimejerai pudumidu, boe eerduware ji ure towujeboe koia. Du kodire boe emodukare tuiorduwa bokwa bokwado. 2 Boe eerdui Pao jitu tabo, ekare akaru kurido, ekare tukutaido ji, dure karega, emeardae pegare, ewabo mugure boeco tada. 2 Egore tuiorduwa rakaguragae, mare etaora bai baire. 2 Ewiapagakare Aroe Eimejera remawuji, mare ewiapagare aroe eimejerakare emawugei, ime ereoreugei, barege ereoreugei, kiege barege ereoreugei. 2 Du kodire Paore emagu nowu ewabo aidure jiboe kai, du kodire ere tugodu pegado. 2 Ere Pao bataru jetorogodurewu maku tuwadararodae jipagi, ere tubojodo Paore towuji boeji, du jire ewiapagare, ekare tubujodo Pao remawuji, ewiapagakare ji. Duwu jire boe eegaremode jii je. Oino godu. 2 Du kodire Paore emagu poguru bokwareboe kai areme ere tumagu turowo nono eromodukare jiboe kai. 2 Ime ero pegare pui jamedu, tui toreduje pijido dutabo, ere tumagu puai, du kodire ere tugodu pegado turo pegarewu morice. 2 Etaidukare tuiorduwawo Pao ji, du kodire ure emagu tumeardae pegarewu kai, turomodukare jiboeji. 2 Enogorobadure boe pegarewu awadu tabo, boe ero pegajagurewu awadu tabo, boe etaidui pu oroe jitu tabo, boe erorerae pegarewu tabo, boe eimaredui pui dutabo, boe ji pu bito dutabo, boe erugodui pui dutabo, boe ewadarodae tabo, boe emeardae pegarewu tabo, etonare Pao Aroe Eimejera ji. 3 Emago pegare pui, enogirure pui, ekodu kagirire pui, ere tojarodo pudui, ero pegarewu awadure, ewiapagakare tuomagei. 3 Etaora bai baire, ewadaru riki bokwa, enogudu bokware tumedage ebo. 3 Ero kigodure awu turo oino jiboeji icare eiore rore oinowugei jamedu, eerduware Pao akoe inodu bitodumode, kodi karega. 

Paoi tugogado boeidu. 1Imeduia, are akogado amedagei? Nowu inodu tabo aro pega nure rugadu. Are akogado amedagei mare arore nono ero reore, dutabo are boe pegado ai akaobiji. 2Paerduware Pao jetorogodui tui tugogado nowu rore oinowuge ei duji. 3Mare aki are akogado amedagei, aroi nono ero reore, ameardaekana amode akinorudo Pao umode tugogado ai dupiji? 4Amodukana Pao pemegaguragai paidu redugodudo?
