Aorare ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto, ukigare ikera pudogidure, aogejewure ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto. 4Ure to jodo baru tadawu makarewu kuiejedoge ewugeje, ure ewarigu moto kae. Nowu aroe etarigo reorewu ure tuburedo nowu aredu kuri butugodureudo otodai, tuwo onaregedu kowuje kuri butu keje. 5Kuri buture ia imedu rogu apo, emare jetumode boe eiamedu boe ji tugedui iwara meriri jitu tabo. Mare nowu onaregedu rekodudodure baruto Pao ae, tumuga kae. 7Icare nowu aredu rekodure boe makodureuto, Paoi tugera pemegado jitu kae, okwagemode nono, kudumode nono merimode 1 0 ce duji. 7Aroedoge erugodure pui baru tada. Tupadoge eimejera iei Miguel cedu rugodure tudugarege ebo nowu aroe tarigo reoreuji. Nowu aroe barogo pegarewu rugodure tudugarege ebo jamedu. 8Mare awuge ekare tumorido. Du kodire eeda bokware pugeje baru tada. 9Du kodi icare nowu aroe barogo pegarewu, nowu mariguduwu awagu iei Aroe pegareuge eimejera cedu, ure moto kejeboe eiamedu boe ewarigu turo pegareutodu, barigududodure moto kae nowu tudugarege ebo. 1 Imeardure iaboe emago rakaguragai baru tada duji, akore Icare Pao ro rakarewu ui paginorudodu aregodure nowu tonaregedu Cristo ro raka tabo. Mare paga karega, mako pegare pawiemage eiwu, mako pegare ei meriji boecoji Pao jekaiwu barigududodure. 1 Mare awugere tumorido ji Cordeiro ku koia, egoi bataru jitu koia. Ewiapagakare pudui, tui tumagu tuwi kaedu kai. 1 Kodire, aki baru, aegaredo, mugure baru tadawuge eiamedu boe, taegaredo. Mare tagi, moto, pobo, tameardu awadudo tai. Paga karega, Aroe pegareuge eimejera ure turawuje tagae, boekori rakaguragai pudui dutabo, jorduware boe puredugodui pudui du kodi. 1 Nowu aroe tarigo reorewu jordui tuwarigudodui moto kae duji dukeje ure tudugu tudo nowu kuri buture negedurogu apowu aredu bogai turugoduwo ji. 1 Mare aroeceba ikodo kuricigorewu makudure nowu aredu ai tugoduwo boe makodureuto, nowu tumugumodewo kae. Kejere okwagemode jorumode pobe ma jewu metuia bokware padumode taci ia oiado. Nonore mugu jaemode nowu awagu aora piji. 1 Nowu awagu owearigodure pobo tabo nowu aredu bogai, aredu okwawo nowu poboto. 1 Mare moto aregodure tuwo tugerabraredo nowu areduji, ure togwa jado tuwo nowu awagu owearigodure tabowu pobo okwado tudo. 1 Du kodi icare nowu awagu korigodu kuricigore nowu aredu bogai, du kodi icare rugodure mugure awu moto kejewu orei, biapagare Paore boe eroiagudujiwuge ei, iedure Jesus bataru jiwuge ei. 1 Ure tumugudo kugaru padui pobo maerewu okwai dukeje. 

Barege ei pobedu. 1Icare iordure ia barogo ui tudawuje pobo maerewu piji duji. Nowu barogo ukigadogere ikera pudogidure, aoradogere ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto, boe etaogajejeboere nono ikera pudogidure ukiga boe oto keje, boe emago pegaidu padure aora boe keje. 2Nowu iordure jiwu barogo ure nono aigore; burere nono riedoge ewurere, okware nono adugo agarewu okware. Nowu aroe tarigo reorewu ure tuduru maku ai tumuga tabo, turo rakarewu tabo. 3Boe ecebae ui boe ewidodu padure ia aora keje, mare ecebae bitudodure. Du kodi icare boe eiamedu boe epagudugodu kuricigore, ekodure nowu barogo apo, 4ere tubujodo cewu aroe tarigo reoreboeji, ure turoraka maku nowu barogo ai kodi. Ere tubujodo nowu barogoji jamedu, tagoi: - Ioguduba umode nono awu barogore? Ioguduba rugodumode ji? 5Boe emago pegarewu korirewu makudure ai. Nowu romode oinodu makudure ai, ari ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure pobe taci pugeje duji. 6Du kodi icare ure tuia barido tumago pegawo Pao ji, tumago pegawo Pao ieji, Pao uwaiji, eedure baru tadawuge ei jamedu. 7Ro raka makudure ai rugoduwo pemegareugei, uwo tumorido ei. Ro raka makudure ai boe eiamedu boe ji, boe ewadaru padui pumekeje duji, boe eno moto padui pumekeje duji. 8Icare cewu ie padukare nowu Cordeiro jiworewu o bapera jerewu keje, jii boe toduidu oto piji mato, mugure awu moto kejewuge emode tubujodo ji. 9Biajarewu biapagamode awu inoduji. 1 Aidure tuwo tumedage ewarigu baicoreutowuge, ewarigudumode baicoreuto jamedu. Umode tumedage ewido toriga rairewu tabowuge ewimode toriga rairewu tabo jamedu. Awu inodu tabore pemegareuge emode turokogado tuduruji tumeartoraeji. 1 Icare iordure ia barogo rutui moto piji duji. Ukigare pobe, ia Cordeiro reore, mare makore nono aroe tarigorewu mako reore. 1 Ro pegare nono boetojiwu barogo ro pega reore, meardae, jordae rekodaji. Ure moto, moto kejewuge edo tubujodo cewu umode bitowu ucebae biturewu boetojiwu barogoji. 1 Ure turo tago rakarewu towuje. Ure joru udo turawuje baru piji boe eiamedu boe eegai jamedu. 1 Ure jeture moto kejewuge eto pui nowu turore betojiwu barogo jekai dutabo, tui boe edo nowu boere okorido toriga rairewu tabo mare pemegagodure pugejewu boetojiwu barogo ureoredu towuje dutabo. 1 Makudure ai tuwo boetojiwu barogo ureoredu utaroedo, makowo du bogai, uwo ukare tubujodo nowu barogo ureoredu jiwuge ewido. 1 Ure boedo kruca bu boe eiamedu boe ekana pemegarewu keje, eri keje: biegareuge, kurireuge, oroe kurireuge, marenarure emawuge, boe etugerekare emawuge, boe etugaregere emawuge. 1 Ukare nowu barogo ie iarema ie oto pa padukare ewugejewuge edo boe aru iarema boe maku. 1 Jorduwa rakarewu jorduwamode awu inoduji. Mearduwarewu iemarumode nowu barogo oto pa bogai, paga karega, ia imedu o oto pa rema kodi. Awu oto pare 6 6 rema. 

Cordeiro oge pemegareuge. 1Itaiwore Cordeiro rakojere torekari iei Sião cedu aogeje. Apore boe ei 1. 0 cewuge etaregodure, ie padure eeri keje, Uo ie padure eeri keje jamedu. 2Du tonajire icare imeardure ia baru tadaboe eragoduji, eragodu ure nono ia pobo makareuge eiaruru reore, ure nono biaruru rakarewu jaruru reore. Nowu imeardure jiwu boe eragodu ure nono cítara epage ei to cítara akodo du reore. 3Eragodure ia turagodure jiboe maiwuji, nowu Pao muga otodai. Iaboe iaboe eroiwakare turagoduwo eragodure jiboeji, mare tu cewu 1. 0 cedu, duwugere etarudodure moto piji tu rugadu. 4Awugere ekera keadukare aremei, iaboe iaboe jetukare etaroeto kodi. Emagere ekodure Cordeiro apo kodurewu jamedu boe kae. Etawujedure ime epiji, makudure boetijiboere emage Pao ai, Cordeiro ai. 5Boe eerdukare ewadararodaeji eiabiji; ero, emago pegarewu bokwa Pao jekai. 
Tupadogere boe ji tugogadodu awadudo. 6Icare iordure ia tupa kodui baru oia jiduji, iedui bakaru maiwu akedu bokwareuji tuwo kogado moto kejewuge etai, padure pumekejewu boe eiamedu boe etai. 7Ure tumago rakaguragado tagoi oino dutabo: - Tabagududo Pao ji, ie kurido. Icare boe aregodure umode tugogado boe ji du kae. Tabujodo cewu ure baru, moto, pobo maerewu, pobojari boe towujewuji. 8Ia tupa kodure rekodaji, tagoi oino dutabo: - Bakurirewu iei Babilônia cedu buture, buture, ure moto padui pumekejedu boe ekududo turo pegareuce, tuboguru bokwareuce kodi. 9Ia tupa kodure eregodajiwu akore tumago raka tabo Iaboe emode tubujodo barogoji, iarema ureoreduji, iarema etaidumode o kruca paduwo tuieri keje, iarema tugera keje ma, 1 eerduwamode Pao kodu kagiriae remawuji. Jorubo ekurewu o joru umode eerdudo tujebaeji, baru tadawu tupadoge eegai, Cordeiro jekai. 1 Nowu ecebae uredudu rutumode baruto boe jameduji jii je. Ure tubujodo barogo jiwuge, barogo ureoredu jiwuge, barogo ie kruca makudure aiwuge, etamudodumodukare meriji, boecoji jii je. 1 Awu inodu koiare pemegareuge eduru awadudodure, cewu rore nono Paoi boe eroiagudu jiwuge, meartorure Jesus jiwuge. 1 Imeardure iaboe emagoi baru piji duji, akore ii Awu inodu bu bapera keje aroe Pemegarewu akore u! Eiwo aidugiri nure ewire Pao iera kejewuge, ewo tamudo tumaragodaeji. Ero, ego, kodumode eregodaji. 
Boe ji jepara jodo parera iguru enari kejedu. 1 Itaiwore kimo: ia boetugu kigadurewu kejere ia Imedu Onaregedureboe mugure keje. Ia meriri ekurewu kogure aogajeje, iedure ia jepara o micigireuji. 1 Ia tupare tudawuje Pao uwai piji tumago rakaguraga tabo cewu mugure boetugu kejewu ae, akore Aebara jodo, boe kado. Icare boe aregodure pudae boewo boe kado, moto kejeboe kurodure kodi. 1 Icare mugure nowu boetugu kejewu ure tuiebara jodo, icare moto kejeboe kadodure. 1 Icare ia tupare tudawuje baru tadawu Pao uwai piji. Uiebara o micigireure jamedu. 1 Icare ia tupa, cewu jeonare joru jiwu, ure tudawuje altar piji, makore tumago raka.
Guragarewu tabo cewu uiebara o micigirewu ae, akore Aebara o micigirewu jodo boe keje, awu moto kejewu parera iguru ekenari kado, ekenari kurodure kodi. 1 Icare tupare tuiebara o micigirewu jodo moto keje, ure parera iguru kado, ure ekenari barigu boemode tuwure jodo kejeboeto, mare tagoino dutabore, Pao kodu kagirae jire akoino. 2 Boere tuwure jodo keje bakurirewu kujei, dukejere boe eku ure tadawuje piji. Nowu boe eku aregodure jii kawarudoge eia tadawu meriri kae, ure tumaedodu kuricigodo moto joki. 

Pao jiwu jora kurirewu. 1Iordure iaboeji kimo baru tada, ia motu rakaguragareboeji: tupadoge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowotodu ekedure boe ecebae boiwu ui ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto duji. Eigoiare emode Pao kodu kagirae oto bu nowu boiwu boe ecebae tabo. 4Iordure ia pobo maerewu ui nono meriri kuru reoreboeji, joru padure oiei. Ure tumorido barogo pegarewu jiwuge, ure tumorido nowu barogo ureoredu jiwuge, ure tumorido nowu barogo ie oto pa jiwuge eragojere nowu pobo maerewu meriri kururewu bukeje tugedui Pao o citaradoge ei dutabo. 3Eragodure Pao utugare Moisés o joraji, Cordeiro o joraji, egore Ure tumorido boe jamedu jiwu Pao baru tadawu, aró, akago kuricigo remawu nure; jeture moto padui pumekejedu jamedu boe jiwu Pao, boe jetororewu, boe jokodurewu nure akawarace. 4Pagimejera, ioguduba pagudumodukare akieji? Aki mito tu jere apemegare. Moto padui pumekejedu jamedu boe etaregodumode tuwo tubujodo ai, boe eerdu awadumode are akogado jiboeji. 5Awu inodu rekodaji, iordure Pao bataru meture tadawu ira mugure tadawu Pao uwai ui tuiado duji. 6Nowu Pao uwai pijire tupadoge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowotodu ere tuiebu tugedui nowu boe ecebae ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto duji. Aroia pemegarewu kigadurewu meture ei, aroia boarewu meriri ekurewu kogure emorora kajeje. 7Cewu jereboe ei pobe puibijidu ia ure ruwobo meriri ekureuge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowotodu maku nowu tupadoge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowotodu etai, enorogobadure Pao jere jii jewu kodu kagirae tabo. 8Icare nowu Pao uwai korobadure aregodure Pao urugu pijiwu ro raka pijiwu jeredudu tabo. Iaboe iaboe eroiwakare tuwo turemo nowu Pao uwaito, nowu tupadoge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowutodu eroi boe ecebae tabo boe ji kimodu otonaji. 

1Icare imeardure iaboe emago padui templo pijiduji. Akore oino nowu tupadoge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto duji: - Tadudo, tawo nowu Pao kodu kagirae metui nowu ruwobodoge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowotodu tadadu redo moto joki. 2Du kodi icare nowu boetojiwure meture turuwobo tadaboe redo moto joki, icare ia boe enogurodudae pegarewu ure tudowuje cewu barogo pegarewu kruca padure kejewuge eiogi, ure tubujodo ure nono reoredu jiwuge eiogi. 3Rekodajiwure meture turuwobo tadaboe redo pobo maerewu joki. Pobo maerewu ure tudo nono bireboe eku reore. Meture tadaboe eiamedu boe ewire. 4Eregodajiwure meture turuwobo tadaboe redo pobodoge eiogi, pobojari boe joki. Ere boekudo pudumi. 5Icare imeardure jeture pobo jiwu tupa akoi: - Jetororeboe nure aki, akire boetojiboere aki, Pemegarewu nure aki, oinore are akogado boe ji. 6Ere pemegareuge eku, ere profetadoge eku redo, kodire are ekududo boekuce jamedu. Oinore ure turugadu ei. 7Icare imeardure iaboe emagoi altar piji duji, akore U! Ema rugadu! Pagimejera Pao roiwa rakarewu, ai akogado boeidu rikire, jetorore. 8Pobepuibijiwure meture turuwobo tadaboe redo meri joku joki, joru makudure ai uwo ime ekowu. 9Icare boeru rakareure ime ekowu, emago pegare Pao ieji, ui boe ecebae rodo boe eiduji. Etaidukare tuwo tuiedorodo, etaidukare tuwo ie kurido. 1 Pagera awubodureure meture turuwobo tadaboe redo barogo pegarewu muga joki. Icare boecodure jeture jiwuge eiogi, utugarege ere toedo tugeruji tujebae kori koia. 1 Emago pegare baru tadawu Pao ji, boe korii pudui dukoia, ekare tuiaedo turo pegarewu piji. 1 Eregodajiwure meture turuwobo tadaboe barigu pobo kurirewu iei Eufrates cedu joki, icare pobo biture tuwo awara jado meri rutu jaogwaiwu boe eimejerage kurireuge etai. 1 Icare iordure ia aroe pegareuge ei pobe ma jewu metuia bokware duji, ere nono ruiere, ere tudawuje nowu aroe tarigo ja piji, nowu barogo pegarewu ja piji, nowu paga pagawu profeta ja piji. 1 Aroe Aroe pegarewu reuge nure emage, ere turo tuginoiwu towuje, eture moto jamedu kejewu boe eimejerage ewogai, tuwo eto pui, ewo tudo turugadu turugoduwo nowu Pao ro rakarewu o meri kurirewu aregodumodedu keje. 1 Pao akore Ca! Iwogureboe aregodu reorere itaregodumode. Jiwo aidugirireure umode tugudae pado pemegado, merumodukare tuwiri kedo tabo, umodukare boe eerdudo tuboguraeji. 1 Ure eto pui ia boe eeda keje. Hebreudoge ewadaru tabo iere Armagedon (boe ewadaru tabo boe Eimejerage Ewire Kejeboe). 1 Kodure boigodu eregodajiwu ure meture turuwobo tadaboe barigu baru otoji, icare ia boe emago rakarewu aregodure nowu Pao muga piji, akore Ure turugadu. Oino. 1 Icare boe jeragudure, boe emagore, boiarurugodure, ia moto amagadu kurireure, boekare ino jii boe eedui moto kejedu paru piji. 1 Nowu bakurirewu remawu kadodure tuiado pobe ma jewu metuia bokware. Moto padui pumekejedu kejewu bakurireuge ewudure. Pao biabuture nowu bakurirewu iei Babilônia cedu keje tuwo udo turokogado tugodu kagirae korireuce. 2 Pobo aiare tabowu moto jamadu boe eregodure. Torekaridoge eiamedu boe ewogware pi tuku je. 2 Poborirewu kuricigorewu buture baru piji ime ewugeje. Ime emago pegare Pao ji ui tujebaedo poborirewu ceduji, awure pega jokodure kodi. 

Babilônia ucebae. 1Icare cewu iedure turuwobo jiwu tupadoge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowutodu, ia emage, uture mato itae, akore ii Mato, imode aerdudo mugure pobo maerewu aogejewu aredu ro pegareudo ucebaeji. 2Awu moto kejewu boe eimejerage ero pegare apo. Ure moto kejewuge etaora bai baido, tui ekududo tumeardae pegareuce dutabo. 3Icare ure irego itaroe tabo toro boe makodureuto. Iordure ia aredu mugui ia barogo pegarewu kujagurewu keje duji; boe enogirudodae pegarewu padure jamedu keje; aoradogere ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto, ukigadogere ikera awubodure. 4Nowu aredu ukudae kujagu rakareure meture ji, oroere meriri ekureuce, tori mori kuricigoreuce, tori motureuce; iedure ia ruwobo meriri ekurewu okorobadui turo, tago, tagemo pegarewu tabo duji. 5Ia boe ekie bioreure padure jeri keje: - Babilnia, bakurirewu kurirewu, awu moto kejewu boe ero pegarewu boe emeardae pegarewu jamedu boe etuje. 6Iordure nowu aredu joku pegai pemegareuge eku tabo, ure tuiwodo Jesus aiwuge eku tabo duji. 7Mare nowu tupa akore oino ii kodiba apagudugodure? Imi rugadure imode aerduwado nowu aredu kodiboeji, nowu aoradogere ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto, ukigadogere ikera pudogidure, oredure nowu aredu apowu barogo pegarewu kodiboeji. 8Aerdure jiwu barogo pegarewu ure marigudu, ukare pugeje, mare jepadumode jewoduio piji, utumode tuwogwadodu kae. Mugure awu moto kejewuge, ie padure bapera jerewu keje boe paru pijiwuge, eebogodu kuricigomode tuiordui barogo pegarewu ui tuguo pugeje duji. 9Mare oino, ure turugadu boewo tumeardae tugu. Nowu barogo aoradogei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowutodu, ere nono torekodudogei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto, du ewugejere nowu aredu mugure. 1 Nowu barogo aoradogei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowutodu, ure nono brae eimejerage ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto jamedu. Ei ikera awubodu reoreuge ewudure marigudu, ia rakoje kimore, boigoduwu aregodukare roga, mare aregodu keje rakoje raigirimoduka. 1 Nowu barogo pegarewu ure marigudu mare ukare pugejewu, ure ikera awubodure pobe ma jewu metuia bokware ikera awubowutowu brae eimejera rema. Ia nowuge emeduia nure ema, utumode tuwogwarewo kae. 1 Ca! Cewu aerdure jiwu ukigadoge ei ikera pudogiduredu ere nono ia brae eimejerage ei ikera pudogiduredu remage, duwugere eetukare boe ji roga, mare eedumode boe ji kobori tu je nowu barogo pegarewu apo. 1 Emeardaemode nono pu meardaere, ewo turo raka maku barogo pegarewu ai. 1 Erugodumode Cordeiro ji, mare Cordeiro umode tumorido ei, emare boe eimejerage eimejera rema, boe eimejerage kurireuge eimejera kurirewu nure ema kodi. Nowu jeture apowuge, makore ewogaiwuge, ure tugeragu ji pudaiwuge, meartorure jiwuge, emode tumorido apo jamedu. 1 Nowu tupa akore ii pugeje.
Aerdure jiwu pobodoge aredu mugure kejewuge ere nono moto padui pumekejewuge ereore, boe makareuge ereore, boe ewadaru padui pumekejewuge ereore. 1 Nowu aerdure jiwu barogo ukigadoge ei ikera pudogiduredu ekodu kagirimode nowu aredu pegareudoji. Emode ukudae tawuje piji, emode biri kedodo, emode kodu kowuje, emode kowu joru tabo. 1 Paga karega, Paore etaidudo erowo tumeardae reore, erowo puapo ewo tugerabraredo barogo pegareuji jii boe kodui Pao bataru rekodajidu kae. 1 Aerdure jiwu aredu ure nono bakurirewu kurirewu reore, dure jeture moto kejewu brae eimejeragei. 

Babilônia buturedu. 1Nowu inodu rekodaji, iordure ia tupai turawuje baru pijiduji, du ro rakaguragare, ure moto urugudo tuiorugu tabo. 2Ure tumago rakaguragado tagoi oino dutabo: - Buture. Babilônia kurirewu buture. Aroe pegareuge eeda, aroe pegareuge eiari, kiege pegareuge eiari nure ema pugeje. 3Paga karega, moto padui pumekejedu eiamedu boe ekudure ro ako pegarewu kodu kagiraece, moto kejewu brae eimejerage ero pegare apo, awu moto kejewu ure akirodo boejiwuge ere toroe kuricigodo oroe kuricigorewu tabo. 4Imeardure ia boe emago ji pugeje, akore Iwobe, taebu piji, tarokawo nono ro pega reore, takawo metagedo tagi ucebae keje. 5Paga karega, ro pegarewu itodure, aregodure baruto, Pao biabuture ro pegarewu keje. 6Ro magai tai du reorere taromode ji jamedu, ro pegarewu mori maku ai tao kae. Ure tagududo towu ruwobo, okorawu, maku ai pugeje tao kae. 7Umagai boe eerdudo toroe kurirewu jitu reore, tamode ucebae, oragudu, maku ai jamedu. Paga karega, akore oino tuwabo keje imugure boe eimejerage emuga keje boe eimejeragoi imi dutabo, mare oredu birewu aredu reore karega, imarenarudumodukare iaboe keje iaboe keje. 8Du kodire awu ucebae boe aregodumode ae meri mitoduji: boe ewi, boe etoragudu, boe eke boi jidu, jorumode akedudo, mare paga karega, ure tugogado jiwu Pagimejera Aroe Eimejera ro rakare. 9Ro pegare apowu awu moto kejewu brae eimejerage etoragudu kuricigomode bukeje, erdui jeredudui tudawuje piji dukeje. 1 Eragoje jaemode ji tubagudu koia ucebae roi jituji, egomode: - Iai, iai! Babilônia bakurirewu! Babilônia bakurirewu! Boe raigirikare boe ji tugogado ai dutabo! 1 Awu moto kejewu baare akiró tabowuge etoragudumode etogeamode bukeje jamedu, ure akirodo enoroe jiboe bokware pugeje kodi. 1 Enoroe meriri ekurewu, meriri kigadurewu, tori mori kuricigorewu! Tori moturewu, aroia kigadurewu, aroia kujagurewu, aroia kurukururewu, aroia kujagu rakaguragarewu, awu ira boe rorewu jamedu boe, enoroe barege eto rakarewu, enoroe ira mori kuricigorewu, enoroe meriri kujagurewu, meriri koadurewu. 1 Enoroe tori kororogodurewu, ia enoe roreboe padui pumekejedu jamedu boe, bokadoboe rorewu, eke boe parera kuru, boe kaguru, eke iro boe, eguiee jamedu boe, eguiee ovelhadoge, kawarudoge, eno imarido boe, etugarege boe, ime boe. 1 Akagemore jiboe rugadu akedure akoe kuri inodu, boe urugu boe akedure, aerdumodukare inoduji pugeje. 1 Ure akirodo awu inodu boe jiwuge emode tuburedodu jaedo tubagudu tabo ucebaece, etoragudumode etogeamode, tagoi oino dutabo: - 1 Jiwo pegarewu bakurirewu kurirewu! Ure aroia pemegarewu, aroia kujagurewu, aroia kurukururewu upodo pudabo, ure cenawudo meriri ekurewu tabo, tori mori kuricigorewu tabo, tori moturewu tabo. 1 Mare awu oroe kuri inodu jamedu boe akedure pi tuku je. Ure ika kurirewu redowuge eiamedu boe, pobo maerewu kaowuge eiamedu boe, ika kurirewu epage eiamedu boe, maragodure pobo kaowuge eiamedu boe ere tuburedodu jaedo ji. 1 Etaiwoi jeredudui tudawuje nowu joru cei nowu bakurireuto dupiji du kae, egore.
Kakoduwu bakurirewu ure nono awu bakurirewu kurirewu reore? 1 Ere moto rugudu tugu taoto, toragudu tabo, tumago tabo: 
Jiwo pegarewu bakurirewu kurirewu! Ure ika kurirewu epage eiamedu boe enoroe kuricigodo toe kurirewu tabo. Mare akedure pi tuku je. 2 Aki, baru, aegaredo ji, tagi jamedu, pemegareuge, apostolodoge, profetadoge, taegaredo ji, paga karega, Paore tugogado ji tui tamorido dutabo. 2 Icare ia tupa ro rakarewu ure tugeragu ia tori kurireuji, ure barigu pobo maereuto, akore Oinore Babilônia bakurirewu kurirewu barigudumode, boe eerdumodukare ji pugeje. 2 Boe emeardumodukare awugeje iera akore citara jiwuge ekera akoji, urareuge eraji, okwa akoreuge enogwa akoji pugeje. Boe eerdumodukare atoda ia maragodureboeji pugeje, boe emeardumodukare atoda pugeje ure boe a kududowu tori akoji pugeje. 2 Jorugu ja urugumodukare awugeje pugeje, boe emeardumodukare awugeje uwirerewu, ukogereudo emago ji pugeje. Paga karega, ure akirodo akoroe taboboe awu moto kejeboe eimejerare emage moto padui pumekejedu eiamedu boe ere tuwogwado boeto aro pegarewu koia. 2 Awugejere boe eerdure profetadoge ekuji, pemegareuge ekuji, cewu bitodure moto kejewuge eiamedu boe ekuji. 

Baru tadawu jora. 1Oinodu rekodaji imeardure baru tada ia makareboe eragoduji. Egore Paegarewo. Pao ore boe einorudae, urugureboe, rorakareboe. 2Paoi tugogado boeidu rikire, jetorogodure. Ure tugogado cewu aredu kurireudo, ro pegareudoji, duwudo ure moto pegado turo pegarewu tabo. 3Ure tugogado ji tudugarege eku mori bogai. Du kejere icare eragodure pugeje, egore Paegarewo, nowu aredu pegareudo uredudu rutumode baruto boe jameduji jii je kodi. 4Du keje icare cewu Paopegadogei ikera pudogidure iwure pudogidure pobepuibiji pugejedu, cewu jereboe ei pobepuibijidu ere tubujodo Pao ui tumugudo nowu mugurewu keje duji, egore Oino rugadu! Paegarewo! 5Nowu muga piji iaboe emago aregodure, akore Tagi taiamedu boe, Pao utugarege biegareuge, kurireuge tabagudui cedu, tarago ji. 6Awu inodu keje imeardure ia makareuge eragoduji, eiarurure nono pobo makareuge eiarurure, ure nono boiaruru rakareuge eiarurure, egore Paegarewo, Pagimejera Pao ro rakarewu jeture boe ji kodi. 7Paegarewo, paegare kuricigowo, pawo akaru kurido. Paga karega, nowu Cordeiro iera makudumode aredu aidu puredugodu nure, nowu iera makudumode aiwudo ure tudo turugadu kodi. 8Boere jeonado aroia pemegarewu motureuji, awu aroia jebatodure pemegareuge ero pemegareuji. 9Du kejera akore oino ii Awu inodu bu bapera keje returudodure ewogaiwuge eerduwo Cordeiro iera makudui aredu aidu jiwuge eiwo aidugiri nure. Icare akore oino ii kimo Awu Pao bataru boe rikirewu nure ema. 1 Iwudure bure paru iwo ipujodo ji, mare akore oino ii Aro kaba ino! Pao utugare nure imi areore, amanamage emeatorure Jesus bataru jiwuge ereore. Pao jire amode apujodo. Boe jokodu Jesus Cristo bataru jire profetadoge emagore. 
Cristo ui tumorido barege pegareuge eidu. 1 Iordure kimo baru jaji: ia kawaru kigadurewu jepadure piji. Mugure kejeboe iere Boe Rikirewu, Boe Jokodurewu; boe jetororewu tabore ure tugogado boe ji, rugodure tonare jiwugei. 1 Joku jeragudure. Boe etaogajejewu makare aogajeje, ia boe eerduwakare jiwu boe ekie padure keje, ema mitotu jere jorduware ji. 1 Ia aroia, boekure jokiwure, meture ji. Iere Pao o Bataru rema. 1 Baru tadawu tugobaigarege emugui kawaru kigadureuge ewugejedure ekodure apo, aroia kigadurewu moturewu meture ei. 1 Ia toriga rairewu ore puibijiwure aregodure ja piji, uwo padure pumekejewu meartorukareuge etogorido tabo. Umode tuwure jodo boere tuwure jodo parera kejeboe okorobadui Pao kodu kagirae tabo dukeje. 1 Opore apowu aroia keje, upeagajejewu keje, atugododure oino boe eimejerage Eimejera, boe eimejerage kurireuge Eimejera Kurirewu. 1 Icare iordure ia tupa rakojei meri joku bukeje duji, akore tumago raka tabo kodure baru otojiwu kiege baregei: - Tado pui mato, Paore tagogwage kuricigomode jiboe udo turugado du kae. 1 Tawo brae eimejerage ekodu kowuje, tawo tugobaigarege eimejerage ekodu, ro rakareuge ekodu kowuje, tawo kawarudoge ekodu, mugure ewugejewuge ekodu kowuje, tawo boe etugarekare emawuge, boe etugare emawuge, biegareuge, kurireuge ime ekodu kowuje. 1 Iordure cewu barogo pegareuji, iordure awu moto kejewu boe eimejerage ei tudo pui to tugobaigarege ebo, turugoduwo cewu mugure nowu kawaru kejewu tugobaigarege ei jamedu du bogai. 2 Mare cewu barogo pegarewu ieragogudodure, cewu profeta pegarewu apo, dure ure turo tuginoiwu towuje tui cewu barogo pegarewu kruca padure ewugejewuge, ure tubujodo ure nono reoredu jiwuge eekuri pagado dutabo. Ei pobedu ewarigudodure jorubo ekurewu ure nono kuruga reoreboe uruto. 2 Cewu mugure kawaru kejewu ure iage ewido cewu aregodure tuiabijiwu tariga rairewu tabo. Kiege barege eiamedu boe ere tuguredudo nowuge ekodu tabo. 

Aroe tarigorewu jeonare jiboe. 1Icare iordure ia tupai turawuje baru piji duji, iedure jewoduio baiporo epaji, iedure ia meriri iku rairewuji. 2Ure tugeragu nowu aroe tarigoreuji, nowu mariguduwu awagu, duwu Aroe pegareuge eimejara rema, ure iera gogudo jii jorumode mil cedu kae. 3Ure barigu jewoduioto, ure baiporo mi baiporo epa tabo, ure ia kruca bu baiporo keje, ukawo boe epadui pumekejedu eekuri pagado pugeje, jii jorumode mil cedu akedumode du kae. Awu inodu rekodaji ieragoga kiwujedumode biega tu je. 4Iordure boe emuga boeji, kejere umode tugogado boeiwuge emugure, cewu itoru kadodure egoi Pao bataruji, Jesus bataru jitu koiawuge etaroe rabodu, cewu ukare tubujodo barogo pegarewu jiwuge, ureoredu jiwuge, kruca padukare eri kejewuge, ekera kejewuge eiamedu boe rabodu, eedodu maidure, eeture boe ji Cristo apo jorure mil ceduji. 5Cewu ia bireuge emodukare tugirimi tuibagi, eewodumodukare jii jorumode mil cedu akedumodedu kae. Dure boetojiwu boe eewodu reno. 6Cewu rakojere jewodure ca boetojiwuge ebowu, pemegare, jiwo aidugirire. Boe ewi rekodajiwu ro rakamodukare ji, mare Pao burejoiadogemode emage, Cristo burejoiadoge mode emage, etumode apo boe ji jorumode mil ceduji. 7Jorumode mil cedu akedu keje, Aroe pegareuge eimejera umode tudawuje tuwaicorewu piji. 8Umode tudawuje tuwo boe padui pumekeje moto okwajidu (Gog, Magog) eekuri pagado du bogai. Umode eeto pui turugoduwo. Emagaguragamode nono pobo maerewu tadawu kugaru reore. Emode taodo moto joki, emode bakuredo pemegareuge eedaji, Pao meardu kurire jiwu bakurireuji. 9Mare ia jorure tudawuje baru piji, ure erugadu kowu. Nowu ure ekuri pagadowu Aroe pegarewu, barigududodure ia jorubo ekurewu kuruga uruto; 1 cewu barogo pegarewu meture tada marigudu nowu profeta pagarewu apo duto. Du tadare ewudugugodumodukare boekoriji meriji, boecoji, boe jameduji jii je. 
Paoi tugogado boe jamedu boe jitu. 1 Icare iordure ia boe emuga kurirewu urugureuji. Iaboe ure tumugudo keje. Baru, moto eregodure je piji, icare boe eerdumodukare eedumode kejeboeji. 1 Iordure bireuge kurireuge, biegareuge eragojei nowu muga otodai duji. Baperadogere tuiado, ia baperare tuiado jamedu, bapera jerewu. Boere tugogado bireugei, boe padu magai nowu bapera kejedu reore, ero boe rekodaji. 1 Pobo maereure meture tudodawuge emagu. Du reorere meture boe ewi tadawuge, moto tadawuge emagudure jamedu. Boere tugogado ei, ero boe rekodaji. 1 Boe ewi, bireuge eeda moto kudawu, barigududodure kuruga joruto. Nowu kuruga joru boe ewi rekodajiwu nure ema. 1 Cewu ie padukare bapera jerewu kejewu, barigudure kuruga joruto. 

Baru tadawu Jerusalém. 1Icare iordure ia baru maiwuji, ia moto maiwuji, mare boetojiwu baru, boetojiwu moto ewogware, pobo maerewu bokware pugeje. 2Iordure bakurirewu pemegarewu Jerusalém maiwu ui turawuje baru piji duji, ia aredu magai tugera pemegado pudui toredu togidu reore. 3Du tonajire imeardure ia boe emago kurirewu aregodui nowu boe mugurewu piji duji. Akore Pao mugui ime ebowu uwai reo. Mugumode ebo, uwobemode emage. Pao rugadure rakojemode ebo. 4Umode eeguru rugadu kabi. Boe ewimodukare pugeje, boe emarenarudumodukare pugeje, boe enoiogwarimodukare pugeje, boe ecebaemodukare pugeje, mariguduboe akedure kodi. 5Icare cewu mugure tumuga kejewu akore Ca! Imode boe jamedu boe maidudo pugeje. Akore oino kimo awu inodu boe bu bapera keje, mare awu bataru boe remawu boe jokodu nure ema kodi. 6Akore oino pugeje: - Ure turugadu! Alfa nure imi, Omega nure imi. Dure oino boe paru boe oto nure imi. Imode pobo jari pijiwu po jerewu makudu pagado pobo boire jiwu ai, kuduwo ce. 7Awu jamedu boe makudumode umode tumoridowu ai. Uomode imi, itonaregedumode ema. 8Uru barigodureuge, poguru bokwareuge, ropegareuge, ure tubujodo boe pega jiwuge, batararodureuge eiamedu boe, jorubo ekurewu urukori rakarewu, rekodajiwu boe ewi, makudumode etai. 
Baru tadawu bakurirewu motu. 9Du keje icare cewu tupadoge ei ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowutodu eedure turuwobo boe enorogobadui boiwu boe ecebae tabodu ia emeduia aregodure, akore oino ii Mato, imode aerdudo Cordeiro mugumode apowu areduji. 1 Ure irego itaroe tada ia torekari rico rairewu ao kae, ure iordudo bakurirewu pemegareuji, aregodure baru pijiwu puredu Pao pijiwu Jerusalemji. 1 Meture Pao urugu tada duji. Nowu urugu ure nono meriri kururewu tori moturewu reore. 1 Motori okwatorurewu ricoraireure padure oiei, baiporodogere ikera pudogidure pobe taci ikera awubowuto. Tupadogei ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwurekotodu eragojere nowu baiporodoge ewugeje tuietu tabo ei. Israeldoge etuwobe ei ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwurekotodu ekie padure nowu baiporodoge ewugeje. 1 Baiporodogere pobe ma jewu metuia bokware meri rutu jaogwai, ecerae eiaogwaire baiporodogere pobe ma jewu metuia bokware, tugarege eiaogwaire baiporodogere pobe ma jewu metuia bokware, meri butu jaogwaire baiporodogere pobe ma jewu metuia bokware. 1 Nowu motori padui bakurirewu oieidu bure jore toridogei ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwurekotodu keje, nowu Cordeiro utugarege ei ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwurekotodu ekie padure ewugeje. 1 Nowu makore iiboe iedure ia iwarameriri ekureuji, tuwo nowu bakurirewu baiporodoge, motori padui oieidu remagu tabo. 1 Nowu bakurirewu ure nono ia quadrado reore: raire nono boare. Kodi icare ure nowu bakurirewu remagu nowu to iwarameriri ekurewu tabo. Remagudure estadiodogei 1. 0 cedu reore. Rai, boa, rico ure nono pureore. 1 Ure nowu motori remagu jamedu, remagudure boe ekana ra ui 1 4 cedu reore. Oinore Tupare boe remagu boe eno boe remagudu tabo. 1 Nowu motori padure bakurirewu oieidu, tori moturewu nure jamedu boece. Meriri ekureure nowu bakurirewu rema, ure nono meriri kuru ri reoreboe reore. 1 Tori mori kuricigorewu padure pumekejewure padure nowu motori bure jore kejeboe keje. Boetojiwu torire jaspe rema, rekodajiwu safira rema, eregodajiwu calcedônia rema, calcedônia rekodajiwu torikuieje kawarurewu rema, 2 Eregodajiwu sardônio rema, sardônio rekodajiwure cornalina rema, cornalina rekodajiwure crisálito rema, rekodajiwure berilo rema, rekodajiwure topázio rema, rekodajiwure crisóparo rema, rekodajiwure jacinto rema, boigoduwure ametista rema. 2 Nowu baiporodogere ei ikera pudogidure pobe taci ikera awubowutodu todure tu tu mitotu jewu tori tabo. Nowu ewororore meriri ekurewu remawu rema, ure nono meriri kuru reore. 2 Iordukare ia uwaiji toda, mare paga karega, Pagimejera Pao ro rakareure boe ewai pemegareure ema, Cordeiro jamedu. 2 Nowu bakurirewu okeakare merijoku bogai, ari bogai, eruguwo ji, mare Pao urugure jore keje, nowu urugure Cordeiro rema. 2 Boe epadui pumekejedu emerumode uruguji. Moto kejewu boe eimejerage emode tugurireboe reko bogai. 2 Uwaiporodoge emodukare tumi boe jameduji, boecomodukare kodi. 2 Boe etaregodumode tuwo moto padui pumekejedu kurireboe reko bogai. 2 Ia pegareboe umodukare turemo to, ia ro pegarewu, batararodurewu umodukare turemo to, mare ie padure Cordeiro o bapera jerewu kejewuge tu rugadu emode turemo to. 

1Du keje icare nowu tupare iordudo ia pobo jerewu ui tudawuje Pao muga piji, nowu Cordeiro muga piji, du kigadure nono ia tori kigadure. 2Nowu bororo oiado, nowu pobo okwai, ia i jerewu rakojere, tudure ikera pudogidure pobe taci iwurekotodu, ari kodu reorere tudu boture mitotu tu je. Nowu i aru jorubokuru nure ema boe epadui pumekejedu etai. 3Nono, boe emago pegare jiboe bokwamode nono, mare kejere Pao muga mugumode, Cordeiro muga mugumode keje. Pao utugarege emode tubujodo ji. 4Eerdumode jeji, ie padumode eeri keje. 5Boecomodukare ei pugeje boe etogeamodukare jorugu bogai, meri joku bogai pugeje, Pao urugumode ei kodi, eedumode torodu oto padumoduka. 
Awu bapera ao. 6Akore ii: - Awu Pao bataru boe jokodu, boe riki nure ema. Pagimejera, Profetadoge etaroe eno Aroe Eimejera ure to tupa utudo mato uwo tudugarege eerdudo inoba boemode kuri je duji. 7Ica! Itaregodu puredugodu nure. Romode nono awu bapera kejewu bataru reoreuge eiwo aidugirimode. 8Imi, Joãore, imeardure iordure awu boe oinoduji. Imeardui, iordui inodu jitu rekodaji, ire ipujodo nowu ure inodu awadudo iwu tupa jokorai iwo Aroe Eimejerado ema. 9Mare akore oino ii Aro kaba ino. Pao utugare nure imi areore, meartorure awu bapera kejewu bataru jiwuge ereore. Pao jire amode apujodo ji. 1 Akore oino kimo Akaba padure awu bapera kejewu bataru biadodudo, mare boe puredugodu nure kodi. 1 Nowu jetorokarewu romode turo jetorokareuji kimo, ro pegarewu romode turo pegareuji kimo. Mare jetororewu ro jetororewu kodumode tao kae, pemegarewu pemega kodumode tao kae jamedu. 1 Itaregodu puredugodu nure; imode makuboe mugure itabo, iwo maku tu tu boe etai, ero reore. 1 Alfa nure imi, Omega nure imi. Dure oino: boetojiwu nure imi, boiwu nure imi; boe paru, boe oto nure imi. 1 Ure tugudawu kabi Cordeiro ku tabowuge eiwo aidugirimode, eonamode i jereuji, emode turemo bakurireuto baiporoji. 1 Nowu ure nono arigao reoreuge, ure jorubodo boeiwuge, poguru bokwareuge, ure tubujodo boe paga jiwuge, cewu batararodureuge eiamedu boe, eedumode baawadu keje. 1 Imi Jesus, ire ino tupa rojai tawogai uwo tawie Pao uwobe eiboe oinoduji. Davi ukwa rekodajiboe nure imi. Barogwa tabowu kuieje urugurewu nure imi. 1 Pao Utaroe Pemegarewu, Oreduje, egore mato! Meardure awu inodu jiwu akomode: - Mato! Jamedu. Pobo boire jiwu, mato! Meardae aidae pemegarewu imedu, mato, pobo jerewu makuduwo ai mori bokwa tabo. 1 Imagomode meardure padure awu bapera kejewu Pao bataru jiwuge ewiegai iaboe emode iaboe to ji ma, Pao umode padure awu bapera kejewu boe ecebae to pui bukeje. 1 Iaboemode iaboe tawuje piji ma, Pao umode jeonare jiboe padui bapera jerewu kejedu, ba kurirewu tadadu, aru piji. 2 Cewu akore oinowu akore pugeje U! Itaregodu marigumode. Oino rugadu. Mato! Pagimejera Jesus! 2 Pagimejera Jesus Cristo o boe pemegarewu jetuwo taiamedu boe apo. Oino godu.
